original: ba de dag ni phan tshun spangs nas gnas pa yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i yod pa dang med pa las rnam par grol ba phung po gsum pa ldog par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ba de dag ni phan tshun spangs nas gnas pa yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i yod pa dang med pa las rnam par grol ba phung po gsum pa ldog par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Because those two are mutually exclusive, impermanence and so on are not freed from existence and nonexistence, and a third possibility is not refuted.

original: tha dad du byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tha dad du byed pa ma yin no //
translated: They are not differentiated.

original: de lta yin dang 'jug pa dang ldog pa de dag las yod pa'am med pa gcig ldog pa gang yin pa de nyid zla bo gzhan yod pa yin te /
analyzed: de lta yin dang 'jug pa dang ldog pa de dag las yod pa'am med pa gcig ldog pa gang yin pa de nyid zla bo gzhan yod pa yin te /
translated: If that were the case, then from among those engaged and disengaged, that which is disengaged from existence or nonexistence is the existence of the other, its opposite.

original: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir mi rtag pa med pa las ldog pa ste med pa mi rtag pa'i bdag nyid yin pas skabs su bab pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la mi rtag par ci ltar 'grub /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir mi rtag pa med pa las ldog pa ste med pa mi rtag pa'i bdag nyid yin pas skabs su bab pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la mi rtag par ci ltar 'grub /
translated: Because that is the case, the opposite of the nonexistence of impermanence—that is, the nature of nonimpermanence—is not established as the property of the subject under consideration.

original: gal te phyogs la mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa nyid ma grub na /
analyzed: gal te phyogs la mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa nyid ma grub na /
translated: If the nonexistence of the property of the subject is not established,

original: 'o na de nyid kyi phyir shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i phyir phyogs @135a * //
analyzed: 'o na de nyid kyi phyir shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag dang ldan pa'i phyir phyogs @135a * //
translated: then because of that, the property of the subject is not established.

original: yin yang dngos po la bsgrub byas stong pa'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs su 'gyur ram ci /
analyzed: yin yang dngos po la bsgrub byas stong pa'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs su 'gyur ram ci /
translated: But since the probandum is empty of the thing, how could it be the counter-correlate?

original: phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs gcig par ni mi 'thad do zhe na /
analyzed: phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs gcig par ni mi 'thad do zhe na /
translated: It is not tenable that the correlate and the counter-correlate are the same.

original: cig shos kyis smras pa /
analyzed: cig shos kyis smras pa /
translated: The other says:

original: rnam grangs kyis te tshul 'ga' zhig gis phyogs kyang mi mthun pa'i phyogs su 'gyur ba yang yin te /
analyzed: rnam grangs kyis te tshul 'ga' zhig gis phyogs kyang mi mthun pa'i phyogs su 'gyur ba yang yin te /
translated: Sometimes, by way of a certain mode, the correlate becomes the counter-correlate.

original: mi 'dod pa cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: mi 'dod pa cung zad kyang med do //
translated: There is not the slightest undesirable consequence.

original: byas pa'am rtsol ba las byung bas sgra rtag par bsgrub pa na phyogs kyang mi mthun pa'i phyogs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byas pa'am rtsol ba las byung bas sgra rtag par bsgrub pa na phyogs kyang mi mthun pa'i phyogs su 'gyur ro //
translated: When proving that sound is permanent because it is produced or because it is an object of activity, the correlate becomes the counter-correlate.

original: 'o na mtshan nyid 'chol bar thal lo zhes dogs na /
analyzed: 'o na mtshan nyid 'chol bar thal lo zhes dogs na /
translated: Now, if you fear that it follows that the definition is confused,🔽we respond: The division of the definition is this: The probandum is that which is to be established by a reason, and the probandum is the property to be established.🔽The property to be established is that which is to be made known to the other party through a reason.

original: bshad pa / mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba ni rang gi ngo bo dang / rgol ba 'dod pa dang / mngon sum la sogs pas ma gsal ba ni phyogs yin la /
analyzed: bshad pa / mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba ni rang gi ngo bo dang / rgol ba 'dod pa dang / mngon sum la sogs pas ma gsal ba ni phyogs yin la /
translated: The property to be established is that which is to be made known to the other party through a reason.

original: bsgrub par bya ba med pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin no zhes 'di ni brjod zin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba med pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin no zhes 'di ni brjod zin te /
translated: The probandum is that which is to be established by a reason.🔽The probandum is the property to be established.🔽The probandum is that which is to be made known to the other party through a reason.🔽The probandum is that which is to be established by a reason.🔽The probandum is the property to be established.🔽The probandum is that which is to be made known to the other party through a reason.🔽The probandum is that which is to be established by a reason.🔽The probandum is the property to be established.🔽The probandum is that which is to be made known to the other party through a reason.🔽The probandum is that which is to be established by a reason.🔽The probandum is the property to be established.🔽The probandum is that which is to be made known to the other party through a reason.🔽The probandum is that which is to be established by a reason.🔽The probandum is the property to be established.🔽The probandum is that which is to be made known to the other party through a reason.🔽The probandum is that which is to be established by a reason.🔽The probandum is the property to be established.🔽The probandum is that which is to be made known to the other party through a reason.🔽The probandum is that which is to be established by a reason.

original: 'chol ba'i dogs pa ga la yod /
analyzed: 'chol ba'i dogs pa ga la yod /
translated: How could there be any doubt about the pervasion?

original: phyogs yin yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs su 'gyur ba ni thams cad kyi 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: phyogs yin yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs su 'gyur ba ni thams cad kyi 'dod pa yin te /
translated: And it is accepted by everyone that even a position can become a non-position.

original: 'di ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs su the tshom mi za ba yin na gtan tshigs brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs su the tshom mi za ba yin na gtan tshigs brjod pa yin no //
translated: For if there is no doubt that it is a non-position, then the reason has been stated.

original: de ga las she na /
analyzed: de ga las she na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir bsgrub par bya ba med pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bsgrub par bya ba med pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs te /
translated: Because the absence of the probandum is a non-position.

original: de rnam par bcad pa'i don du gtan tshigs su rab tu sbyar ba de'i phyir de lta yin no //
analyzed: de rnam par bcad pa'i don du gtan tshigs su rab tu sbyar ba de'i phyir de lta yin no //
translated: The reason is applied to the meaning of the exclusion of that, and that is why it is so.

original: gzhan yang phyogs la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa yod pa gang las phyogs kyang mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid yin pa'i skyon 'dir 'gyur ba gnod par byed pa'i tshad mas bsgrub bya rjes su 'gro bar bstan pa de ni gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang phyogs la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa yod pa gang las phyogs kyang mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid yin pa'i skyon 'dir 'gyur ba gnod par byed pa'i tshad mas bsgrub bya rjes su 'gro bar bstan pa de ni gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: Moreover, the existence of the arrangement of the position and so on is from where the position is also a non-position. This fault is to be refuted by the valid knowledge of the probandum. The concomitance is shown to be the reason.

original: gnod par byed pa'i tshad mas gtan tshigs kyi 'brel pa ston pa'i dus na ni phyogs la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ste dbye ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa'i tshad mas gtan tshigs kyi 'brel pa ston pa'i dus na ni phyogs la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ste dbye ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: When the valid means of knowledge that is the means of refutation demonstrates the relation of the logical reason, there is no classification of the property-possessor, etc.

original: ci ltar phyogs la sogs pa rnam par gzhag pa med ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar phyogs la sogs pa rnam par gzhag pa med ce na /
translated: How is there no classification of the property-possessor, etc.?

original: gang gi phyir mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos de phyogs la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba dang bral ba 'ba' zhig nyid mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa 'ga' zhig yod pa dang med pa dag tu 'jug pa dang ldog pa can te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos de phyogs la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba dang bral ba 'ba' zhig nyid mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa 'ga' zhig yod pa dang med pa dag tu 'jug pa dang ldog pa can te /
translated: Because that property such as impermanence, etc., which is free from the classification of the property-possessor, etc., is only impermanence, etc., it engages and disengages with existence and non-existence.

original: yod pa dang med pa can du bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa can du bstan pa yin te /
translated: It is taught to be existent and non-existent.

original: phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par dbye ba la ltos pa med pa kho nas dngos po la bsgrub par bya ba gtan @135b tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par dbye ba la ltos pa med pa kho nas dngos po la bsgrub par bya ba gtan @135b tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro ba'o //
translated: Because it is only independent of the classification of the property-possessor and the counter-example, the probandum is the pervasion of the logical reason in the property.

original: gang gi phyir don thams cad bsdus pa nyid kyis rjes su 'gro ba ni tshad mas bstan par nus pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir don thams cad bsdus pa nyid kyis rjes su 'gro ba ni tshad mas bstan par nus pa yin te /
translated: Because it is able to demonstrate by the valid means of knowledge the pervasion that includes all objects,

original: dngos po gcig la log na yang the tshom mi ldog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po gcig la log na yang the tshom mi ldog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because even if one thing is refuted, doubt is not eliminated.

original: de ltar 'ba' zhig rjes su 'gro ba dang ldan par bstan pa de rang nyid chos can la yod pa'i shugs kyis te /
analyzed: de ltar 'ba' zhig rjes su 'gro ba dang ldan par bstan pa de rang nyid chos can la yod pa'i shugs kyis te /
translated: Thus, the mere pervasion is taught, and the presence of the property of the subject is implied.

original: bsgrub bya'i chos med par de mi 'thad pas chos can des chos ci lta bu zhig dang rang nyid 'brel pa de lta bu'i chos dang 'brel par sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i chos med par de mi 'thad pas chos can des chos ci lta bu zhig dang rang nyid 'brel pa de lta bu'i chos dang 'brel par sgrub par byed do //
translated: Since it is not tenable that the reason is absent when the property to be proven is absent, the subject is established as having a property that is related to it in the same way that the reason is related to it.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa de'i phyir gtan tshigs su de'i shugs gzhan du mi 'thad pa'i yul rjes su thogs pa rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa'i 'og rol gyi rjes su 'byung ba can de ni phyogs zhes brjod do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa de'i phyir gtan tshigs su de'i shugs gzhan du mi 'thad pa'i yul rjes su thogs pa rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa'i 'og rol gyi rjes su 'byung ba can de ni phyogs zhes brjod do //
translated: Because that is the case, the reason is the power of the property of the subject, and it is not tenable that the power of the property of the subject is elsewhere. The object that is the domain of the power of the property of the subject is the pervasion. The teaching of the pervasion is followed by the statement of the example. That is called the position.

original: des na gang gi phyogs kyang mi mthun pa'i phyogs su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i phyogs mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa ga la yin ;
analyzed: des na gang gi phyogs kyang mi mthun pa'i phyogs su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i phyogs mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa ga la yin ;
translated: Therefore, how could the position that is not a dissimilar position be the position that is a dissimilar position, which would be the fault of “the position of the reason being the position of the counter-reason”?

original: gang gis phyogs rjes su 'gro ba'i phyi nas 'gyur ba des na phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas 'ongs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin gyi chos so //
analyzed: gang gis phyogs rjes su 'gro ba'i phyi nas 'gyur ba des na phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas 'ongs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin gyi chos so //
translated: Since it is the property of the subject that is the object of the cognition that follows the position, it is the property of the subject that is the object of the cognition that follows the position.

original: 'di ltar phyogs med pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar phyogs med pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin la /
translated: Thus, the absence of the position is the counter-position.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pa yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa yin te /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pa yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa yin te /
translated: And the absence of the counter-position is the non-counter-position.

original: des na de'i mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas 'ongs pa ni des na nges par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na de'i mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas 'ongs pa ni des na nges par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it is the property of the subject that is the object of the cognition that follows the position.

original: gtan tshigs ston pa'i dus na phyogs nges pa ni ma yin te rjes su thogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ston pa'i dus na phyogs nges pa ni ma yin te rjes su thogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: At the time of stating the reason, the position is not ascertained, because it is subsequent.

original: des na mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa nyid ni ston pa'i dus na med par shin tu yang gsal lo //
analyzed: des na mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa nyid ni ston pa'i dus na med par shin tu yang gsal lo //
translated: Therefore, the non-counter-position is very clearly not present at the time of stating.

original: 'brel pa ston pa'i dus dang gtan tshigs ston pa'i dus na 'brel pa nges la gtan tshigs yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'brel pa ston pa'i dus dang gtan tshigs ston pa'i dus na 'brel pa nges la gtan tshigs yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: At the time of stating the relation and the time of stating the reason, the relation is ascertained, because it is the reason.

original: des na rtags ma yin no //
analyzed: des na rtags ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not the reason.

original: sngar ni dam bca' ba sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyor ba khas blangs nas mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa nyid the tshom za bar brjod la /
analyzed: sngar ni dam bca' ba sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyor ba khas blangs nas mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa nyid the tshom za bar brjod la /
translated: Previously, having accepted the syllogism that precedes the thesis, it was said that the dissimilar class is doubtful.

original: da lta ni phyogs mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin par nges kyang rtags ma yin te /
analyzed: da lta ni phyogs mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin par nges kyang rtags ma yin te /
translated: But now, even though the dissimilar class is ascertained to be dissimilar, it is not the reason.

original: khyab pa'i dus na phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag med pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro /🔽@136a * // 'o na gtso bo ni yod pa yin te /
analyzed: khyab pa'i dus na phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag med pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro / @136a * // 'o na gtso bo ni yod pa yin te /
translated: The difference is that it is said that at the time of the pervasion, the similar and dissimilar classes do not exist.

original: de las bzlog pa gzhan las rnam bar grol ba'i phyir zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di rtags yin no //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa gzhan las rnam bar grol ba'i phyir zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di rtags yin no //
translated: Well, the reason “because it is the opposite of that” is a reason for the thesis “the primal substance exists because it is the opposite of that, free from other.”

original: ci ltar 'di ma grub pa'am khyab pa'i dus na med pa yin /
analyzed: ci ltar 'di ma grub pa'am khyab pa'i dus na med pa yin /
translated: How is it that at the time of the nonestablishment or the pervasion, it does not exist?

original: de las bzlog pa ni yod pa de las bzlog pa med pa /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa ni yod pa de las bzlog pa med pa /
translated: The opposite of that is the existence of the opposite of that.

original: gtso bo las gzhan pa'i gtso bo ni pha rol po med par 'dod zhes grags te /
analyzed: gtso bo las gzhan pa'i gtso bo ni pha rol po med par 'dod zhes grags te /
translated: The opponent asserts that the primal substance is the opposite of other primal substances.

original: de las gzhan pa'i med pa gang yin pa de las gtso bo rnam par grol ba de'i phyir yod par khas blangs te bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i med pa gang yin pa de las gtso bo rnam par grol ba de'i phyir yod par khas blangs te bum pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: But that nonexistence which is other than that is the existence of the principal, which is liberated from that nonexistence, and therefore it is accepted as existent, like a pot, etc.

original: 'di ltar dper na gtso bo med pa las gzhan pa'i med pa bum pa med pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de las rnam par grol ba'i bum pa yod pa de bzhin du gtso bo la yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar dper na gtso bo med pa las gzhan pa'i med pa bum pa med pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de las rnam par grol ba'i bum pa yod pa de bzhin du gtso bo la yin no //
translated: For example, that which is called the nonexistence of a pot, which is a nonexistence that is other than the nonexistence of the principal, is the existence of a pot, which is liberated from that nonexistence. It is the same with the principal.

original: rtags de la ni ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon 'di med do //
analyzed: rtags de la ni ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon 'di med do //
translated: This reason is not faulty in that it is unestablished.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: gzhan smos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan smos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it mentions another.

original: dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin pa nyid kyis ma grub pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin la /
analyzed: dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin pa nyid kyis ma grub pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin la /
translated: It would be unestablished because it is only a part of the meaning of the thesis.

original: de las bzlog pa gzhan las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba ni dam bcas pa'i don ma yin te /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa gzhan las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba ni dam bcas pa'i don ma yin te /
translated: But the opposite of that, which is called “liberated from another,” is not the meaning of the thesis.

original: gang gi phyir yod pa bsgrub par bya ba la khyad par dang bral ba yod pa las bzlog pa dang bral ba 'ba' zhig bsgrub bya'i chos su 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir yod pa bsgrub par bya ba la khyad par dang bral ba yod pa las bzlog pa dang bral ba 'ba' zhig bsgrub bya'i chos su 'gyur gyi /
translated: Because in the proof of existence, only the mere exclusion of the opposite of existence, which is devoid of any distinction, is the predicate of the probandum.

original: med pa 'ga' zhig nyid dang bral ba ma yin no //
analyzed: med pa 'ga' zhig nyid dang bral ba ma yin no //
translated: Nothing nonexistent is devoid of anything.

original: ri bong gi rva med pa ni rta'i rva med pa las rnam par grol ba yin yang de tsam gyis yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ri bong gi rva med pa ni rta'i rva med pa las rnam par grol ba yin yang de tsam gyis yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Although the nonexistence of a rabbit’s horns is devoid of the nonexistence of a horse’s horns, it is not existence.

original: de'i phyir gzhan smos pa 'ga' zhig las ldog pa ni gtan tshigs yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan smos pa 'ga' zhig las ldog pa ni gtan tshigs yin la /
translated: Therefore, the mere exclusion of something mentioned as other is the reason.

original: med pa tsam las ldog pa'i yod pa ni bsgrub bya yin no //
analyzed: med pa tsam las ldog pa'i yod pa ni bsgrub bya yin no //
translated: The existence that is the mere exclusion of nonexistence is the probandum.

original: des na bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag khyad par yod do zhe na /
analyzed: des na bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa dag khyad par yod do zhe na /
translated: Thus, there is a distinction between the probandum and the probans.”

original: tshad ma 'di la yang gzhan zhes khyad par bzung ba gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa yod pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid la gnod par byed do //
analyzed: tshad ma 'di la yang gzhan zhes khyad par bzung ba gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa yod pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid la gnod par byed do //
translated: In this inference, the distinction “other” that is grasped is undermined in the very proof of the existence of the object.

original: ci ltar gnod par byed ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar gnod par byed ce na /
translated: How is it undermined?

original: gang gi phyir gtso bo de med par khas mi len na ni gzhan smos par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gtso bo de med par khas mi len na ni gzhan smos par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: If you do not accept that the primal substance exists, then you cannot say that anything else exists,

original: don 'brel bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: don 'brel bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: because there would be no connection between the meaning of the words.

original: dper na ma tha ra'i bu bram ze yin na ma tha ra'i bu las gzhan pa'i bram ze la zan byin cig ces gzhan smos pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na ma tha ra'i bu bram ze yin na ma tha ra'i bu las gzhan pa'i bram ze la zan byin cig ces gzhan smos pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, if a brahmin is the son of a brahmin, then when you say, “Give food to the brahmin, but not to the son of the brahmin,” you are saying that something else exists.

original: de lta ma yin na ni bram ze la zan byin ces bya ba 'di tsam @136b nyid brjod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ni bram ze la zan byin ces bya ba 'di tsam @136b nyid brjod par 'gyur te /
translated: Otherwise, you would simply say, “Give food to the brahmin.”

original: ma tha ra'i bu la thal bar 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma tha ra'i bu la thal bar 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would not follow that the son of the brahmin is a brahmin.

original: des na gzhan smos pa ni 'dod pa'i yod pa la gnod par byed do //🔽grangs can pa dag 'dod pa la gnod pa spangs pa'i phyir smras ba /
analyzed: des na gzhan smos pa ni 'dod pa'i yod pa la gnod par byed do // grangs can pa dag 'dod pa la gnod pa spangs pa'i phyir smras ba /
translated: Therefore, the assertion that something else exists contradicts your assertion that the primal substance exists.🔽The Sāṃkhyas say that the assertion that the primal substance does not exist contradicts the assertion that something else exists.

original: gtso bo med pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ni phyir rgol ba pha rol po'i bsam pa yin te /
analyzed: gtso bo med pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ni phyir rgol ba pha rol po'i bsam pa yin te /
translated: The phrase “the primal substance does not exist” is the opponent’s opinion.

original: de'i bsam pa'i dbang gis de las bzlog pa gzhan las rnam par grol ba'i phyir zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de'i bsam pa'i dbang gis de las bzlog pa gzhan las rnam par grol ba'i phyir zhes brjod do //
translated: Because of that opinion, the phrase “because it is liberated from something else” is stated as its opposite.

original: gang gi phyir de'i bsam pa'i dbang gis yin pa des na gtan tshigs kyi don ni 'di yin te /🔽med pa gzhan gang yin pa de dang bral bar te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de'i bsam pa'i dbang gis yin pa des na gtan tshigs kyi don ni 'di yin te / med pa gzhan gang yin pa de dang bral bar te /
translated: The meaning of the reason is as follows.🔽Since you, the opponent, accept that the non-existence of something is different from that something,

original: de las gzhan nyid du phyir rgol ba khyed kyis khas blangs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de las gzhan nyid du phyir rgol ba khyed kyis khas blangs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: it is free from that non-existence, which is different from it.

original: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of that is as follows.

original: gzhan gyi gtso bo ci 'dra ba zhig tu med par 'dod pa de 'dra ba nyid kyi med pa la gtso bo yod par pha rol ba la bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi kho bo cag gi rang gi bsam pas de skad brjod pa ni ma yin no
analyzed: gzhan gyi gtso bo ci 'dra ba zhig tu med par 'dod pa de 'dra ba nyid kyi med pa la gtso bo yod par pha rol ba la bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi kho bo cag gi rang gi bsam pas de skad brjod pa ni ma yin no
translated: The non-existence of something is established for the opponent as the existence of the primal substance, but we do not say that because of our own belief.

original: zhe na / de la yang ste gtan tshigs kyi don de la don dam par med pa la phan tshun rnam par dbye ba ci zhig yod par 'dod de cung zad kyang mi srid pa nyid do //
analyzed: zhe na / de la yang ste gtan tshigs kyi don de la don dam par med pa la phan tshun rnam par dbye ba ci zhig yod par 'dod de cung zad kyang mi srid pa nyid do //
translated: Moreover, in that meaning of the reason, what is the mutual difference that is accepted in ultimate reality between the non-existence of something and the existence of the primal substance? Nothing is possible at all.

original: khyod kyis ni gang gi phyir gtso bo'i med pa ni med pa gzhan las tha dad pa de'i phyir yod pa yin no zhes brjod do //
analyzed: khyod kyis ni gang gi phyir gtso bo'i med pa ni med pa gzhan las tha dad pa de'i phyir yod pa yin no zhes brjod do //
translated: You say that the nonexistence of the primary nature is existent because it is different from other nonexistents.

original: med pa la ni tha dad pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: med pa la ni tha dad pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But there is no difference in nonexistence.

original: don dam pa'i tha dad pa nyid las ni yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don dam pa'i tha dad pa nyid las ni yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be existent if there were difference in the ultimate sense.

original: ci ltar rnam par dbye ba med ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar rnam par dbye ba med ce na /
translated: How is there no difference?

original: gang gi phyir rnam pa khyad par can dang ldan pa'i sngon po gcig gi rang bzhin rnam pa gzhan dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin ser po la ma dmigs pas /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam pa khyad par can dang ldan pa'i sngon po gcig gi rang bzhin rnam pa gzhan dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin ser po la ma dmigs pas /
translated: Because the nature of a single blue that possesses a particular aspect is not observed to possess another aspect, such as yellow.

original: 'di 'di las tha dad pa yin no zhes blos mthong ba de'i rang bzhin gzhan de las tha dad par rtogs pa yin na /
analyzed: 'di 'di las tha dad pa yin no zhes blos mthong ba de'i rang bzhin gzhan de las tha dad par rtogs pa yin na /
translated: If the mind sees “This is different from that,” it understands that other nature to be different from that.

original: ri bong gi rva la sogs pa dngos po med pa la de 'dra ba'i rnam par dbye ba de gang yod de /
analyzed: ri bong gi rva la sogs pa dngos po med pa la de 'dra ba'i rnam par dbye ba de gang yod de /
translated: But what difference like that exists in nonentities such as the horns of an ass?

original: rnam pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they do not have aspects.

original: rnam pa dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin tha dad pa yod na de lta bu'i rang bzhin can yang med par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam pa dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin tha dad pa yod na de lta bu'i rang bzhin can yang med par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If there were a nature that possessed aspects, then something with such a nature would not be nonexistent,

original: rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin de ni yod pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin de ni yod pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that nature that possesses different aspects is the characteristic of existence.

original: gal te don byed pa nyid yod pa ma yin nam zhe na bden te /
analyzed: gal te don byed pa nyid yod pa ma yin nam zhe na bden te /
translated: If you say, “But doesn’t perform a function exist?” it is true,

original: shes pa @137a * //
analyzed: shes pa @137a * //
translated: but that which is different from consciousness

original: las tha dad pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de dag ni rang gi rgyu dang shes pa'i rgyu yin pas don byed pa nyid do //🔽gal te don dam par med pa la rnam par dbye ba med na 'o na bum pa med do //
analyzed: las tha dad pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de dag ni rang gi rgyu dang shes pa'i rgyu yin pas don byed pa nyid do // gal te don dam par med pa la rnam par dbye ba med na 'o na bum pa med do //
translated: is a cause of itself and a cause of consciousness, and therefore it does perform a function.🔽If there is no division in what does not exist ultimately, then why do we say, “The pot does not exist,”

original: ri bong rva med do zhes 'jig rten gyi tha snyad ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ri bong rva med do zhes 'jig rten gyi tha snyad ci ltar zhe na /
translated: and “The rabbit’s horns do not exist” in conventional usage?

original: rnam par rtog pas zhes smos so //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas zhes smos so //
translated: We say “by conceptual thought.”

original: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pas bkod pa 'di dag bdag nyid tha dad pa med pa yin yang smra ba po dag rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa la gnas pa nyid brjod pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis rnam par dbye ba dang ldan pa lta bu tha snyad byed🔽pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pas bkod pa 'di dag bdag nyid tha dad pa med pa yin yang smra ba po dag rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa la gnas pa nyid brjod pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis rnam par dbye ba dang ldan pa lta bu tha snyad byed pa yin no //
translated: Although these things that are posited by conceptual consciousnesses are not different from themselves, speakers, who are themselves based on conceptual consciousnesses, make assertions that are distinguished by other and other expressions.

original: rnam par rtog pa dang de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sgra dag gis rnam pa gzhan zhig gis rnam par dbye ba dang ldan par byas pa'i rnam par dbye ba gang ci snyed pa de tham cad dngos po yod pa'i rten ma yin na /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sgra dag gis rnam pa gzhan zhig gis rnam par dbye ba dang ldan par byas pa'i rnam par dbye ba gang ci snyed pa de tham cad dngos po yod pa'i rten ma yin na /
translated: The conceptual consciousnesses and the terms that correspond to them distinguish things in some way, but all of these distinctions are not the bases of existent things.

original: gang gis med pa gzhan las ldog pa'i phyir de yod par 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gis med pa gzhan las ldog pa'i phyir de yod par 'gyur /
translated: How could nonexistence be established by the exclusion of other existents?

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: ha cang thal par 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: ha cang thal par 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because it would be absurd.

original: gang gis ci ltar kun du brtags pa de de ltar 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: gang gis ci ltar kun du brtags pa de de ltar 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes sngar bshad zin to //
translated: We have already explained above that it would be absurd to say that whatever is imagined exists in that way.

original: nyes pa gzhan yang bsags pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: nyes pa gzhan yang bsags pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: Another fault is incurred by the opponent, as follows:

original: dngos po pa'am dngos po ma yin yang rung ste gcig las gcig rnam par phye ba yod pa dang rjes su 'brel pa yod pas khyab pa ston pa ni thams cad du med pa 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po pa'am dngos po ma yin yang rung ste gcig las gcig rnam par phye ba yod pa dang rjes su 'brel pa yod pas khyab pa ston pa ni thams cad du med pa 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: Whether it is a real entity or not, the demonstration of pervasion by the existence of the distinction of one from another and by the existence of the relation of one to another is everywhere destroyed.

original: 'di ltar med pa rnam pa bzhi ni phan tshun tha dad par 'dod pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar med pa rnam pa bzhi ni phan tshun tha dad par 'dod pa yin la /
translated: Thus, the four kinds of non-existence are held to be mutually distinct.

original: bum pa med pa la sogs pa yang phan tshun ldog par tha snyad byed do //🔽rnam par dbye ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis kyang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bum pa med pa la sogs pa yang phan tshun ldog par tha snyad byed do // rnam par dbye ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis kyang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: And non-existence of a pot, etc. is also conventionally distinguished from each other.

original: med pa thams cad yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: med pa thams cad yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: And because of the reason of distinction, all non-existence would be existent.

original: gal te 'di ni 'dod pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'di ni 'dod pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: If this is accepted,

original: gal te yang 'dod pa de lta na yang med pa gzhan dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di ma grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: gal te yang 'dod pa de lta na yang med pa gzhan dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di ma grub pa nyid do //
translated: then even if it is accepted, the reason “because of being devoid of another non-existence” is not established.

original: gal te med pa gzhan 'ga' zhig yod na de'i phyir 'di de dang bral bar 'gyur pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te med pa gzhan 'ga' zhig yod na de'i phyir 'di de dang bral bar 'gyur pa yin na /
translated: If some other non-existence exists, then it would be devoid of that.

original: de med pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ma grub po //
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ma grub po //
translated: Therefore, the reason is not established.

original: rnam par dbye ba yod pa nyid 'ga' zhig tu ni yod pa nyid la la lar ni med pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba yod pa nyid 'ga' zhig tu ni yod pa nyid la la lar ni med pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: If you say that the existence of a difference is sometimes existence and sometimes nonexistence,

original: de ltar na yang rtags 'khrul bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na yang rtags 'khrul bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then the reason is still fallacious.

original: 'di ltar med pa gzhan dang bral @137b ba yod pa yin yang 'ga' zhig ni yod la gzhan ni med pa de'i phyir gnyi ga la yang rnam bar dbye ba mthong bas ma nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ltar med pa gzhan dang bral @137b ba yod pa yin yang 'ga' zhig ni yod la gzhan ni med pa de'i phyir gnyi ga la yang rnam bar dbye ba mthong bas ma nges pa nyid do //
translated: Thus, although existence is distinguished from nonexistence, some is existent and some is not. Therefore, since a difference is seen in both cases, the reason is still inconclusive.

original: de ni bden te /
analyzed: de ni bden te /
translated: This is true.

original: med pa las log pa 'ga' zhig ni yod pa ma yin la 'ga' zhig ni med pa yin no //
analyzed: med pa las log pa 'ga' zhig ni yod pa ma yin la 'ga' zhig ni med pa yin no //
translated: But some is not existent, and some is not nonexistent.

original: 'o na kyang gal te gtso bo med pa 'ga' zhig las log par gzung na de'i tshe yod par the tshom za bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na kyang gal te gtso bo med pa 'ga' zhig las log par gzung na de'i tshe yod par the tshom za bar 'gyur ro //
translated: But if the absence of the primal substance is apprehended as some existent, then it is doubtful whether it exists.

original: 'di ltar rta'i rva med pa las ldog pa yin yang de tsam gyis dngos po ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar rta'i rva med pa las ldog pa yin yang de tsam gyis dngos po ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, although the absence of a rabbit’s horns is distinguished from nonexistence, it is not an existent thing.

original: 'o na kyang rgol ba de'i mngon par 'dod pa 'ga' zhig ces bya ba med pa thams cad las tha dad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'o na kyang rgol ba de'i mngon par 'dod pa 'ga' zhig ces bya ba med pa thams cad las tha dad pa yin te /
translated: But still, the opponent’s assertion is that some non-existent is different from all non-existent things.

original: log pa yin na de ltar zhes bya ba yod par gyur na'o //
analyzed: log pa yin na de ltar zhes bya ba yod par gyur na'o //
translated: If it were non-existent, then it would be like that, if it existed.

original: med pa thams cad gtso bo'i ldog mtshams su 'dod de /
analyzed: med pa thams cad gtso bo'i ldog mtshams su 'dod de /
translated: All non-existent things are asserted to be the boundary line of the primal matter.

original: des na 'khrul pa med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des na 'khrul pa med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, there is no error. This is the meaning.

original: gal te de lta na 'o na ni de las tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba med pa gzhan dang bral ba'i phyir ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te de lta na 'o na ni de las tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba med pa gzhan dang bral ba'i phyir ni ma yin no //
translated: But if that is so, then it is not because it is different from that, but because it is free from another non-existent.

original: 'o na ga las she na ;
analyzed: 'o na ga las she na ;
translated: But then, how is it?

original: rgol ba de'i 'dod pa ste bsam pa kho na las yod pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: rgol ba de'i 'dod pa ste bsam pa kho na las yod pa nyid yin no //
translated: It is because of the opponent’s assertion, that is, his intention, that it exists.

original: med pa thams cad gtso bo'i ldog mtshams su gzung ba des na yod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: med pa thams cad gtso bo'i ldog mtshams su gzung ba des na yod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: All non-existent things are apprehended as the boundary line of the primal matter. Therefore, it is not existent.

original: 'on kyang 'dod pa tsam las yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'dod pa tsam las yin no //
translated: But it is only because of mere assertion.

original: 'di ga las she na /
analyzed: 'di ga las she na /
translated: How is this so?

original: bshad pa / yang yul gzhan dang 'brel pas 'dod pa gzhan du gyur pa yin na /
analyzed: bshad pa / yang yul gzhan dang 'brel pas 'dod pa gzhan du gyur pa yin na /
translated: It is said: If it is asserted that it is different due to being related to another object,

original: med pa thams cad las ldog pa'i ngo bo gzhan la yang de lta bu yin par te /
analyzed: med pa thams cad las ldog pa'i ngo bo gzhan la yang de lta bu yin par te /
translated: And the entity that is the opposite of all non-existent things is also like that.

original: yod pa nyid yin par 'dod pa ste mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa nyid yin par 'dod pa ste mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is asserted, that is, accepted, to be existent.

original: gal te gang la lar 'dod pa de nyid dngos po yod par byed pa de ltar na 'di go bar byed pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te gang la lar 'dod pa de nyid dngos po yod par byed pa de ltar na 'di go bar byed pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: If you assert that the existence of an entity is due to its being that which is desired in some place, then this would be a logical proof that establishes that.

original: de lta yin dang gang gi tshe ri bong gi rva med pa gzhan tham cad las ldog pa'i phyir yod do zhes brjod pa de'i tshe gtso bo zhin du ri bong gi rva yang yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin dang gang gi tshe ri bong gi rva med pa gzhan tham cad las ldog pa'i phyir yod do zhes brjod pa de'i tshe gtso bo zhin du ri bong gi rva yang yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were the case, then when you say that the nonexistence of the rabbit’s horns exists because it is the opposite of all other nonexistents, then at that time the rabbit’s horns would exist like the principal.

original: de ltar gyur na gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe dngos po med pa thams cad dngos po byed par 'gyur ro //🔽des na rgol ba'i 'dod pa nyid kyis dngos po med la ldog mtshams kyi rang nyid kyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe dngos po med pa thams cad dngos po byed par 'gyur ro // des na rgol ba'i 'dod pa nyid kyis dngos po med la ldog mtshams kyi rang nyid kyis ni ma yin no //
translated: If that were so, then when you assert that, all nonexistents would become existents.🔽Therefore, due to the opponent’s assertion itself, nonexistents would be existents, but not due to their own intrinsic nature.

original: de'i phyir rnam par dbye ba las ni yod pa nyid kyi yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par dbye ba las ni yod pa nyid kyi yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, due to the analysis, it is not the case that nonexistents are existents.

original: 'o na kyang de'i 'dod pa nyid las yin no //
analyzed: 'o na kyang de'i 'dod pa nyid las yin no //
translated: But it is just the desire itself.

original: gtan tshigs de'i phyir @138a * //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de'i phyir @138a * //
translated: Because of that reason.

original: gtan tshigs 'dir 'dod pa nyid la bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa rnam par gnas pa mthong ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'dir 'dod pa nyid la bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa rnam par gnas pa mthong ste /
translated: In this reason, the power to prove the probandum is seen to reside in the desire itself.

original: de'i phyir 'dod pa de nyid 'dod pa'i yul gyi dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi sgrub byed de go byed du brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dod pa de nyid 'dod pa'i yul gyi dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi sgrub byed de go byed du brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, that very desire is stated as the means of understanding the nature of the object of desire.

original: de'i phyir med pa 'di dag gi phan tshun dben pa gtan tshigs su bkod pas ci zhig bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir med pa 'di dag gi phan tshun dben pa gtan tshigs su bkod pas ci zhig bya ste /
translated: Therefore, what is the use of positing the mutual exclusion of these non-existents as the reason?

original: 'dod pa de nyid gtan tshigs su brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa de nyid gtan tshigs su brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: That very desire would be stated as the reason.

original: de nyid gtan tshigs su 'gyur mod ce na /
analyzed: de nyid gtan tshigs su 'gyur mod ce na /
translated: If it is said that it is indeed the reason,

original: 'dod pa de la bsgrub bya'i dngos po dang 'brel pa brjod dgos so //
analyzed: 'dod pa de la bsgrub bya'i dngos po dang 'brel pa brjod dgos so //
translated: in that desire, the connection with the probandum must be stated.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de lta ma yin na zhes smos te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes smos te /
translated: It is said otherwise,

original: 'brel pa med na gtan tshigs nyid du mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa med na gtan tshigs nyid du mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because without a connection, it would not be established as a reason.

original: de'i phyir 'di la dngos po'i nus pa cung zad kyang med la /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di la dngos po'i nus pa cung zad kyang med la /
translated: Therefore, it has not the slightest power to establish its object.

original: 'dod pa yang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir go bar byed pa ma yin pas 'di 'dra ba'i gtan tshigs thams cad ni ma nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dod pa yang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir go bar byed pa ma yin pas 'di 'dra ba'i gtan tshigs thams cad ni ma nges pa nyid do //
translated: And since the desire is unrelated to the reason, it does not make the reason understood. Thus, all such reasons are inconclusive.

original: 'dod pa tsam gyis de nyid can gyi gtan tshigs 'khrul pa nyid du brjod pa des ni ngas khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa tsam gyis de nyid can gyi gtan tshigs 'khrul pa nyid du brjod pa des ni ngas khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: We do not say that a reason that has the nature of mere desire is mistaken, because we accept that.

original: khyod kyis khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //🔽yu bu gnyi gas khas blangs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa dngos su 'dod pa rjod par byed pa 'khrul par brjod pa /
analyzed: khyod kyis khas blangs pa'i phyir ro // yu bu gnyi gas khas blangs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa dngos su 'dod pa rjod par byed pa 'khrul par brjod pa /
translated: You accept that.🔽Both you and I accept that.

original: gang zhig dngos su 'dod pa rjod par byed pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang zhig dngos su 'dod pa rjod par byed pa ma yin gyi /
translated: We do not say that a reason that is expressed as a desire is mistaken.

original: 'on kyang skyes bus dngos po'i rang bzhin rnam par gzhag par brtags pa la brten pa gang yin pa'i gtan tshigs de thams cad 'khrul pa dang bcas par brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang skyes bus dngos po'i rang bzhin rnam par gzhag par brtags pa la brten pa gang yin pa'i gtan tshigs de thams cad 'khrul pa dang bcas par brjod pa yin te /
translated: However, we say that all reasons that are based on the conceptual positing of the nature of things by a person are mistaken.

original: dper na mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dper na mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For example, because it is not a discordant side.

original: bsgrub par bya ba spyi'i phyogs ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba spyi'i phyogs ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: Because it is not a side that is not a universal of the probandum.

original: 'di ltar bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa'i tshogs ni bsgrub bya yin pas /
analyzed: 'di ltar bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa'i tshogs ni bsgrub bya yin pas /
translated: Thus, since the collection that is asserted as the probandum is the probandum,

original: de'i phyogs gcig nyid dang / phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs gang yang rung ba nyid dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa nyid 'dod pas phyogs su ma byas pa las 'ongs pa yang 'dod pas sprul pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyogs gcig nyid dang / phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs gang yang rung ba nyid dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin pa nyid 'dod pas phyogs su ma byas pa las 'ongs pa yang 'dod pas sprul pa yin te /
translated: it is asserted that it is a conjunct because it is either a part of it, or a side that is concordant with it, or not a discordant side.

original: de lta bu la sogs pa gtan tshigs skyes bus rnam par gzhag pa la bsten pa skyes bu'i 'dod pa dam par gyur pa yang 'khrul pa can du brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu la sogs pa gtan tshigs skyes bus rnam par gzhag pa la bsten pa skyes bu'i 'dod pa dam par gyur pa yang 'khrul pa can du brjod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, a reason that is based on a person’s presentation, such as this, is called mistaken, because it is a person’s assertion.

original: 'dis ni phyogs tsam @138b zhig bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni phyogs tsam @138b zhig bstan pa yin te /
translated: This is just an indication.

original: 'dis sbyor ba thams cad la brjod pa yongs su gyur pa gzhan nyid du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: 'dis sbyor ba thams cad la brjod pa yongs su gyur pa gzhan nyid du gyur pa ste /
translated: By this, all syllogisms are said to be a transformation of the expression, a change into something else.

original: des byas pa'i 'khrul pa'o //
analyzed: des byas pa'i 'khrul pa'o //
translated: The error that is produced by that.

original: 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes mi brjod kyi /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes mi brjod kyi /
translated: It is not said because of desire,

original: 'on kyang de las bzlog pa gzhan las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro zhes brjod do //
analyzed: 'on kyang de las bzlog pa gzhan las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro zhes brjod do //
translated: but rather because of being liberated from another, the opposite of that.

original: des na de las bzlog pa gzhan las rnam par grol ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i rtags yin no snyam du 'khrul par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na de las bzlog pa gzhan las rnam par grol ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i rtags yin no snyam du 'khrul par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the thought arises that the reason is a real entity because of being liberated from another, the opposite of that.

original: don dam par ni nges 'dod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'dir gtan tshigs kyi don yin te /
analyzed: don dam par ni nges 'dod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'dir gtan tshigs kyi don yin te /
translated: But in the ultimate, it is because of the desire to state, this is the meaning of the reason.

original: 'dod pas rnam par gzhag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pas rnam par gzhag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is established by desire.

original: de'i phyir sgra gzhan du gyur pas byas pa'i 'khrul pa spangs te'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra gzhan du gyur pas byas pa'i 'khrul pa spangs te'o //
translated: Therefore, having abandoned the error produced by the transformation of sound,

original: don rnam par gzhag pa'i tshul ni don dam pa ste /
analyzed: don rnam par gzhag pa'i tshul ni don dam pa ste /
translated: the method of establishing the object is the ultimate.

original: ci 'dir 'dod pas rnam par gzhag pa'i don yin nam /
analyzed: ci 'dir 'dod pas rnam par gzhag pa'i don yin nam /
translated: Here, is the object established by desire?

original: 'o na te dngos po'i dbang gis yin zhes bya ba tshul 'di'i rjes su 'brang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'o na te dngos po'i dbang gis yin zhes bya ba tshul 'di'i rjes su 'brang bar bya'o //
translated: Or is it by the power of entities? This method should be followed.

original: de de ltar gtan tshigs su 'dod pa rnams dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid du bstan pa na /
analyzed: de de ltar gtan tshigs su 'dod pa rnams dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid du bstan pa na /
translated: When the opponent has been shown that the reason is one part of the meaning of the thesis,

original: yang dag pa'i gtan tshigs dang bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig tu dgos par bya ba'i phyir smras pa /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i gtan tshigs dang bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig tu dgos par bya ba'i phyir smras pa /
translated: he says that the reason is one part of the meaning of the thesis in order to establish the meaning of the thesis.

original: sgra ni zhes bya ba ni chos can no //
analyzed: sgra ni zhes bya ba ni chos can no //
translated: Sound is the subject.

original: rtsol ba las byung ba zhes bya ba ni tshos can gyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba zhes bya ba ni tshos can gyi khyad par ro //
translated: Arisen from effort is the qualification of the subject.

original: mi rtag ste zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya'i chos bstan pa'o //
analyzed: mi rtag ste zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya'i chos bstan pa'o //
translated: Impermanent is the property to be proven.

original: rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs te /
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs te /
translated: Because it is arisen from effort is the reason.

original: 'di ci ltar dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ci ltar dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig ma yin zhe na /
translated: How is this not one part of the meaning of the thesis?

original: dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid spang bar 'dod pa de nyid kyi de kho na ston par byed do //
analyzed: dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid spang bar 'dod pa de nyid kyi de kho na ston par byed do //
translated: In order to avoid being one part of the meaning of the thesis, he teaches just that.

original: tha snyad kyi nye bar gzhag pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can de nyid de /
analyzed: tha snyad kyi nye bar gzhag pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can de nyid de /
translated: The subject to be established is the conventional basis.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i yul gyi tha snyad kyi nye bar gzhag pa de nyid sgrub par byed pa yin na dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin par brjod do //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i yul gyi tha snyad kyi nye bar gzhag pa de nyid sgrub par byed pa yin na dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin par brjod do //
translated: If it is the establishment of the very same object of expression of the convention of the conceptual consciousness, then it is said to be one part of the meaning of the thesis.

original: chos can de nyid sgrub par byed pa de yin no zhes bya ba ga las she na /
analyzed: chos can de nyid sgrub par byed pa de yin no zhes bya ba ga las she na /
translated: How is it that the very same subject is the establishment?

original: blo tha mi dad pa zhes smos te /
analyzed: blo tha mi dad pa zhes smos te /
translated: It is said that “the cognitions are not different.”

original: rtogs pa rnams gcig pa can gyi yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa rnams gcig pa can gyi yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the objects of the cognitions are the same.

original: rnam pa gcig pa nyid ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa gcig pa nyid ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why are the aspects the same?

original: blo gang zhig ldog pa tha mi dad pa gcig la brten pa ste //
analyzed: blo gang zhig ldog pa tha mi dad pa gcig la brten pa ste //
translated: Because the cognitions are based on the same difference.

original: @139a * // ldog pa gcig gi mthar thug pa'i phyir rnam pa gcig nyid yin no //
analyzed: @139a * // ldog pa gcig gi mthar thug pa'i phyir rnam pa gcig nyid yin no //
translated: Because they are based on the same difference, the aspects are the same.

original: dper na sgra mi rtag ste sgra yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na sgra mi rtag ste sgra yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, “Sound is impermanent because it is a product,”

original: khyad par bsgrub bya'i chos can du byas te /
analyzed: khyad par bsgrub bya'i chos can du byas te /
translated: The subject is taken as the predicate of the probandum.

original: spyi gtan tshigs su byed pa la ni bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi chos tha dad pa'i phyir go bya go byed mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: spyi gtan tshigs su byed pa la ni bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi chos tha dad pa'i phyir go bya go byed mi 'gal lo //
translated: In the case of a universal reason, the property to be established and the establishing property are different, so there is no contradiction between what is understood and what causes understanding.

original: 'dir yang khyad par chos can yin la spyi gtan tshigs yin te /
analyzed: 'dir yang khyad par chos can yin la spyi gtan tshigs yin te /
translated: Here, the particular is the subject, and the universal is the reason.

original: 'di ltar rtsol ba las ma byung bas bzlog pa'i khyad par chos can ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar rtsol ba las ma byung bas bzlog pa'i khyad par chos can ni ma yin te /
translated: Thus, the particular that is the opposite of what does not arise from effort is not the subject,

original: sgra tsam gyi mthar thug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra tsam gyi mthar thug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the mere end of sound.

original: bum pa dang sgra la sogs pa'i thun mong ba gtan tshigs kyang gzhan yin no //
analyzed: bum pa dang sgra la sogs pa'i thun mong ba gtan tshigs kyang gzhan yin no //
translated: The common reason for pot, sound, and so on is also different.

original: des na ldog pa gcig la brten pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des na ldog pa gcig la brten pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because it is not based on the same negation,

original: dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig ma yin pas go bya go byed kyi dngos por 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig ma yin pas go bya go byed kyi dngos por 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: it is not a part of the meaning of the thesis, so it becomes the thing that causes understanding and what is to be understood.

original: don 'di tshigs su bcad pas ston te /
analyzed: don 'di tshigs su bcad pas ston te /
translated: This meaning is shown by a verse:

original: khyad par dang spyi ni rtags dang rtags can yin te /
analyzed: khyad par dang spyi ni rtags dang rtags can yin te /
translated: The particular and the universal are the reason and the property-possessor,

original: chos tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are different properties.

original: dper brjod pa bshad pa ni dpe rna zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dper brjod pa bshad pa ni dpe rna zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of the example is called the example.

original: rtsol ba las byung ba'i sgra ni mi rtag ste /
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba'i sgra ni mi rtag ste /
translated: Sound that is produced by effort is impermanent,

original: rtsol ba las byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: because it is produced by effort.

original: yang na phyogs kyi khyad par nyid yin na'ang gnod med phyir te /
analyzed: yang na phyogs kyi khyad par nyid yin na'ang gnod med phyir te /
translated: Or, even if it is a distinction of the subject, there is no fault, because there is no contradiction.

original: mi 'gal ba'i phyir 'dir gtan tshigs yin te /
analyzed: mi 'gal ba'i phyir 'dir gtan tshigs yin te /
translated: Here, the reason is that there is no contradiction,

original: gtan tshigs las chos can tha dad pa ma grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs las chos can tha dad pa ma grub pa ma yin no //
translated: because the subject is not established as distinct from the reason.

original: gang gi phyir chos can tha dad pa de'i phyir rtsol ba las byung ba nyid de'i khyad par yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir chos can tha dad pa de'i phyir rtsol ba las byung ba nyid de'i khyad par yin no //
translated: Because the subject is distinct, the distinction of that, being produced by effort, is the reason.

original: khyad par yang grub pa'i phyir dang / bsgrub bya'i chos dang 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs nyid du mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: khyad par yang grub pa'i phyir dang / bsgrub bya'i chos dang 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs nyid du mi 'gal lo //
translated: Because the distinction is established and because it is related to the property to be proven, the reason is not contradictory.

original: des na don 'dod pa brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: des na don 'dod pa brjod pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the meaning is stated as desired.

original: gal te chos tha dad pa ma yin pa de lta na yang bsgrub bya'i chos can nam chos kyi khyad par ni gtan tshigs nyid du mi 'gal te /
analyzed: gal te chos tha dad pa ma yin pa de lta na yang bsgrub bya'i chos can nam chos kyi khyad par ni gtan tshigs nyid du mi 'gal te /
translated: Even if the property is not distinct, the distinction of the subject or property to be proven is not contradictory as the reason,

original: grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because it is established.

original: dper brjod pa smras pa ni dper na zhes bya ba'o //🔽gong bu 'di zhes bya ba ni chos can no //
analyzed: dper brjod pa smras pa ni dper na zhes bya ba'o // gong bu 'di zhes bya ba ni chos can no //
translated: The example is stated with “for example.”🔽The “ball” is the subject.

original: khva can zhes bya ba la rva ni de'i khyad par yin no //
analyzed: khva can zhes bya ba la rva ni de'i khyad par yin no //
translated: The “horn” is its qualifier.

original: des na rva can nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes de gtan tshigs nyid du mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: des na rva can nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes de gtan tshigs nyid du mi 'gal lo //
translated: Therefore, since it has a horn, it is not contradictory that this is the reason.

original: ngo bos ni gong bu khyad par can du gyur pa ma yin la /
analyzed: ngo bos ni gong bu khyad par can du gyur pa ma yin la /
translated: By nature, the ball does not become qualified.

original: rva can nyid ni rta ma yin @139b par bsgrub pa la gtan tshigs su yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rva can nyid ni rta ma yin @139b par bsgrub pa la gtan tshigs su yang 'gyur ro //
translated: And having a horn can be the reason to prove that it is not a horse.

original: de bzhin du rtsol ba las byung ba nyid grub pa'i rang bzhin bsgrub bya dang 'brel par rung ba ni chos can khyad par du byed pa yin zhing /
analyzed: de bzhin du rtsol ba las byung ba nyid grub pa'i rang bzhin bsgrub bya dang 'brel par rung ba ni chos can khyad par du byed pa yin zhing /
translated: In the same way, the suitability of the established nature to be connected to the probandum qualifies the subject.

original: grub pa'i rang bzhin de nyid kyis gtan tshigs nyid du grub pa yin no //
analyzed: grub pa'i rang bzhin de nyid kyis gtan tshigs nyid du grub pa yin no //
translated: And by that very established nature, it is established as the reason.

original: yang na ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa bsgrub bya'i dus su nye ba gang yin pa de nyid bsgrub bya'i chos can yin na /
analyzed: yang na ma 'brel pa rnam par bcad pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa bsgrub bya'i dus su nye ba gang yin pa de nyid bsgrub bya'i chos can yin na /
translated: Or else, in order to understand the exclusion of what is not related, the subject at the time of the probandum is that which is proximate to the proof.

original: rtsol ba las byung ba zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya rtogs par byed pa'i dus su yan lag min te /
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya rtogs par byed pa'i dus su yan lag min te /
translated: That which arises from effort is not a part of the time of understanding the probandum.

original: chos can gyi khyad par ma yin no //
analyzed: chos can gyi khyad par ma yin no //
translated: It is not a particular of the subject.

original: gang gi phyir rtsol ba las byung ba 'di ni chos can de mtshon nas ldog pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rtsol ba las byung ba 'di ni chos can de mtshon nas ldog pa yin no //
translated: Because this arising from effort is the exclusion of that subject.

original: 'di ltar rtsol ba las byung ba nyid ni rtsol ba las byung ba mthong ba'i sgra gang yin pa de mi rtag pa yin no zhes sgra de nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo nye bar mtshon pa'i don du gzung ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar rtsol ba las byung ba nyid ni rtsol ba las byung ba mthong ba'i sgra gang yin pa de mi rtag pa yin no zhes sgra de nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo nye bar mtshon pa'i don du gzung ba yin no //
translated: In this way, that which arises from effort is the sound that is seen to arise from effort. That is impermanent. That sound itself is apprehended for the purpose of indicating its own nature.

original: khyad par gang zhig bya ba gzhan nye bar mtshon pa la don byas zin pa de ni bya ba'i dus su gdon mi za bar nye bar gnas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par gang zhig bya ba gzhan nye bar mtshon pa la don byas zin pa de ni bya ba'i dus su gdon mi za bar nye bar gnas pa ma yin te /
translated: Any particular that indicates another action has already fulfilled its purpose. It is not necessarily present at the time of the action.

original: dper na gos dkar po can du mthong ba gang yin pa de khrid de shog shig ces bya ba la /
analyzed: dper na gos dkar po can du mthong ba gang yin pa de khrid de shog shig ces bya ba la /
translated: For example, when someone says, “Bring the man with the white cloth,”

original: gos dkar po ni gdon mi za bar khrid nas 'ong ba'i bya ba'i nang du 'du ba ma yin pa bzhin no ;
analyzed: gos dkar po ni gdon mi za bar khrid nas 'ong ba'i bya ba'i nang du 'du ba ma yin pa bzhin no ;
translated: the white cloth is not necessarily included in the action of bringing the man.

original: de bzhin du khyod kyis chos can nye bar mtshon pa la don byas zin pa'i rtsol ba las byung ba nyid kyi dam bca' ba'i don chos dang chos can gyis spyi 'dzi pa'i dus su nang du 'du ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du khyod kyis chos can nye bar mtshon pa la don byas zin pa'i rtsol ba las byung ba nyid kyi dam bca' ba'i don chos dang chos can gyis spyi 'dzi pa'i dus su nang du 'du ba ma yin no //
translated: In the same way, when you indicate a subject, the meaning of the thesis is not included in the action of indicating the subject and the property.

original: de'i phyir khyad par ni dam bcas pa'i don ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par ni dam bcas pa'i don ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the distinction is not the meaning of the thesis.

original: khyad par gyi mtshan nyid kyi chos de ni sgra zhes bya ba'i chos can las tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par gyi mtshan nyid kyi chos de ni sgra zhes bya ba'i chos can las tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The property that has the characteristic of a distinction is different from the subject called “sound.”

original: tha dad pa med na ni 'dir mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tha dad pa med na ni 'dir mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If it were not different, it would not be the meaning of “here.”

original: bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba ni phal che bas bstan pa ste /
analyzed: bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba ni phal che bas bstan pa ste /
translated: The so-called intermediate verse is taught by most.

original: 'di'i dang po ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i dang po ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa nyid yin no //
translated: The first of these is the verse of summary itself.

original: de'i phyir de ltar phyogs kyi chos nyid ma grub na ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang bar bstan nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar phyogs kyi chos nyid ma grub na ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang bar bstan nas /
translated: Thus, when the property of the position is not established, it is taught that the reason is like a nonestablished apparent reason.

original: the tshom za na ma grub pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: the tshom za na ma grub pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: If there is doubt, it is nonestablished.

original: rang nyid bdag nyid dam gtan tshigs de'i gzhi chos can la the tshom za na ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin no //
analyzed: rang nyid bdag nyid dam gtan tshigs de'i gzhi chos can la the tshom za na ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin no //
translated: If there is doubt about the subject, the basis of the reason itself, then the reason is like a nonestablished apparent reason.🔽What is that like?

original: @140a * // de ci lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: @140a * // de ci lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: It is explained:

original: bshad pa / dper na me bsgrub pa la blangs pa la sogs pa'i dngos po the tshom za ba'i 'byung ba 'dus pa du ba zhes bya bar rab tu sbyar ba ni the tshom za ba'i ma grub pa yin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: bshad pa / dper na me bsgrub pa la blangs pa la sogs pa'i dngos po the tshom za ba'i 'byung ba 'dus pa du ba zhes bya bar rab tu sbyar ba ni the tshom za ba'i ma grub pa yin pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, in the proof of fire, the application of the reason “because of smoke” to a thing such as a mirage, about which there is doubt, is a nonestablished reason due to doubt.

original: de bzhin du gzhi la the tshom za na ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang bar 'gyur ba yang dper na ri sul 'di na zhes bya ba ni chos can no //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhi la the tshom za na ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang bar 'gyur ba yang dper na ri sul 'di na zhes bya ba ni chos can no //
translated: Likewise, if there is doubt about the basis, the reason appears to be unestablished. For example, in the statement In this mountain valley, the subject is stated.

original: rma bya yod do zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rma bya yod do zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: There is a peacock, is what is to be proven.

original: rma bya'i sgra grag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: rma bya'i sgra grag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
translated: Because the sound of a peacock is heard, is the reason.

original: 'di ltar the tshom za ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ltar the tshom za ba yin zhe na /
translated: Here is the doubt:

original: rma bya'i sgra grag pa de'i yul te gang nas 'ongs pa ste /
analyzed: rma bya'i sgra grag pa de'i yul te gang nas 'ongs pa ste /
translated: The sound of a peacock is heard. From where does it come?

original: de'i 'byung khungs su gyur pa'i yul de la 'khrul bas so //
analyzed: de'i 'byung khungs su gyur pa'i yul de la 'khrul bas so //
translated: In which place is it the source? There is confusion about that place.

original: ri sul mang po yod pa na gang gi tshe rma bya'i sgra thos nas khyad par can gyi ri sul gyi gzhir bsgrub bya ma nges la /
analyzed: ri sul mang po yod pa na gang gi tshe rma bya'i sgra thos nas khyad par can gyi ri sul gyi gzhir bsgrub bya ma nges la /
translated: When the sound of a peacock is heard in a place with many mountain valleys, the basis of the special mountain valley is not ascertained.

original: gzhi khyad par can gyi rma bya ba sgrub par 'dod pa de'i gzhi la the tshom za bas the tshom za ba'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin te /
analyzed: gzhi khyad par can gyi rma bya ba sgrub par 'dod pa de'i gzhi la the tshom za bas the tshom za ba'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin te /
translated: Since there is doubt about the basis of the one who wishes to prove the special basis of the peacock, it is a reason of doubt because there is doubt about the basis.

original: rang gi ngo bo ni nges pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ni nges pa yin no //
translated: Its own nature is ascertained.

original: de bzhin du bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can ma grub na yang ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can ma grub na yang ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin no //
translated: In the same way, when the subject to be established is not established, the reason is a fallacious reason because of nonestablishment.

original: dper brjod smras pa ni /
analyzed: dper brjod smras pa ni /
translated: An example is stated:

original: dper na bdag ni khyab pa yin te /
analyzed: dper na bdag ni khyab pa yin te /
translated: For example, it is like saying, “The self is all-pervading,

original: bde ba la sogs pa'i yon tan thams cad na yod pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa'i yon tan thams cad na yod pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: because it is the cause of all the qualities such as pleasure.”

original: bdag thams cad du song ba nyid du bsgrub pa la /
analyzed: bdag thams cad du song ba nyid du bsgrub pa la /
translated: In the proof of the self as all-pervading,

original: de'i yon tan bde ba la sogs pa thams cad du dmigs pa nyid gtan tshigs su gzhag go //
analyzed: de'i yon tan bde ba la sogs pa thams cad du dmigs pa nyid gtan tshigs su gzhag go //
translated: the observation of all its qualities such as pleasure is posited as the reason.

original: chos can bdag de yang ma grub pas yin no //
analyzed: chos can bdag de yang ma grub pas yin no //
translated: But that subject, the self, is not established.

original: de ltar na zhes bya ba ni mjug sdud pa'o //🔽phyogs kyi chos ma grub pa'am the tshom za nam grub pa'i ming can gyi gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ste /
analyzed: de ltar na zhes bya ba ni mjug sdud pa'o // phyogs kyi chos ma grub pa'am the tshom za nam grub pa'i ming can gyi gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ste /
translated: Thus is a summary.🔽When the property of the position is not established or is doubted, the reason is a fallacious reason because of nonestablishment.

original: ma 'brel par las mi rtogs pa'i phyir mi rtogs pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: ma 'brel par las mi rtogs pa'i phyir mi rtogs pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: Because an effect is not understood without a connection, it is a cause of nonunderstanding.

original: de bzhin du tshul gzhan gcig ldog pa ma grub pa 'am the tshom za na ma nges pa zhes bya ba'i ming can the tshom gyi rgyur 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshul gzhan gcig ldog pa ma grub pa 'am the tshom za na ma nges pa zhes bya ba'i ming can the tshom gyi rgyur 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Likewise, if the other mode is not established or is doubted, it is called “uncertain” and is a cause of doubt.

original: de la re zhig ma grub pa ni /
analyzed: de la re zhig ma grub pa ni /
translated: Among these, first, non-establishment is as follows:

original: thun mong pa rnam pa bzhi dper brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: thun mong pa rnam pa bzhi dper brjod par bya'o //
translated: Four types of common non-establishment will be given as examples.

original: 'di ltar gang gi tshe gtan tshigs mi mthun pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa de'i tshe mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar gang gi tshe gtan tshigs mi mthun pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa de'i tshe mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa ma grub pa yin no //
translated: Thus, when a reason engages in the discordant class, non-establishment of the discordant class is at that time.

original: thun mong ba rnam pa bzhi yang mthun pa'i phyogs @140b dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: thun mong ba rnam pa bzhi yang mthun pa'i phyogs @140b dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa yin no //
translated: The four types of common non-establishment engage in both the concordant class and the discordant class.

original: de yang phyogs chos kyi rab tu dbye bar bstan pa nyid do //
analyzed: de yang phyogs chos kyi rab tu dbye bar bstan pa nyid do //
translated: And that has been taught as a division of the property of the subject.

original: sgra rtag ste gzhal bya'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sgra rtag ste gzhal bya'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la /
translated: Sound is permanent because it is an object of comprehension.

original: gzhal bya nyid ni gnyi ga la khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhal bya nyid ni gnyi ga la khyab pa yin no //
translated: Being an object of comprehension pervades both.

original: sgra ni rtsol ba las byung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra ni rtsol ba las byung ba ma yin te /
translated: Sound is not produced by effort.

original: mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la mi rtag pa nyid mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la yod la mi mthun pa'i phyogs la khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la mi rtag pa nyid mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la yod la mi mthun pa'i phyogs la khyab pa yin no //
translated: The reason because of impermanence is a reason that is inconclusive because of the presence of a similar instance in only one part of the homogeneous set and because of the pervasion of the heterogeneous set.

original: sgra ni rtsol ba las byung ste mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sgra ni rtsol ba las byung ste mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la /
translated: Sound is impermanent because it is produced by effort.

original: mi rtag pa nyid mthun pa'i phyogs la khyab pa yin la mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi ni phyogs gcig la yod pa yin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid mthun pa'i phyogs la khyab pa yin la mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi ni phyogs gcig la yod pa yin no //
translated: The reason because of impermanence is a reason that is inconclusive because of the pervasion of the homogeneous set and because of the presence of a similar instance in only one part of the heterogeneous set.

original: sgra rtag ste lus can ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /🔽lus can ma yin pa nyid gnyi ga'i phyogs de la yod pa yin te /
analyzed: sgra rtag ste lus can ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la / lus can ma yin pa nyid gnyi ga'i phyogs de la yod pa yin te /
translated: Sound is permanent because it is not a substance.🔽 The reason because of not being a substance is a reason that is inconclusive because of the presence of a similar instance in both the homogeneous and heterogeneous sets.

original: 'di ni thun mong gi ma nges pa rnam pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: 'di ni thun mong gi ma nges pa rnam pa bzhi'o //
translated: These are the four types of inconclusive reasons that are shared.

original: ldog pa nyid la the tshom za ba'i ma nges pa ni /🔽dper na brjod par 'dod pa'i skyes bu ni chos can no //🔽thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ldog pa nyid la the tshom za ba'i ma nges pa ni / dper na brjod par 'dod pa'i skyes bu ni chos can no // thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: An inconclusive reason that is doubtful with regard to the reversal is as follows:🔽The person who is the subject is not omniscient,

original: thams cad rig pa ma yin pa ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad rig pa ma yin pa ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: because of the doubt as to whether or not he is omniscient.🔽 The reason because of the doubt as to whether or not he is omniscient is a reason that is inconclusive because of the doubt as to whether or not there is a reversal.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin te zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba gzhan yin no //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin te zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba gzhan yin no //
translated: “Possessed of desire, etc.” is the other probandum.

original: smra ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya gnyi ga'i thun mong gi gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: smra ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya gnyi ga'i thun mong gi gtan tshigs so //
translated: “Because of speaking” is the common reason for both probandums.

original: sogs pa smos pas ni bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / mig 'byed pa dang 'dzums pa la sogs pa bzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa smos pas ni bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / mig 'byed pa dang 'dzums pa la sogs pa bzung ngo //
translated: The phrase “etc.” includes such actions as bending, stretching, opening and closing the eyes, and so on.

original: gtan tshigs 'dir ldog pa la the tshom za ba yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'dir ldog pa la the tshom za ba yin no //
translated: Here, there is doubt about the pervasion.

original: gal te thams cad mkhyen pa smra ba ma dmigs pa'i phyir ma dmigs pa las ldog pa grub po zhe na /
analyzed: gal te thams cad mkhyen pa smra ba ma dmigs pa'i phyir ma dmigs pa las ldog pa grub po zhe na /
