original: 'o na skyon med pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba la yang snying rje la sogs pa yod du chug mod /
analyzed: 'o na skyon med pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba la yang snying rje la sogs pa yod du chug mod /
translated: Well then, compassion and so on exist for those who are free from attachment because they are faultless.

original: de lta na yang snying rje can gyis gzhan gyi don rtsom pa 'bras bu med pa yang phyin ci log nyid las yin no //
analyzed: de lta na yang snying rje can gyis gzhan gyi don rtsom pa 'bras bu med pa yang phyin ci log nyid las yin no //
translated: Even so, the compassionate one who undertakes for the sake of others is not mistaken, even though there is no result.

original: 'di ltar rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa ni 'bras bu med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa ni 'bras bu med pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the engagement of one who has this realization is not without result.

original: skad cig ma 'bras bu dang ldan pa ma yin te mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig ma 'bras bu dang ldan pa ma yin te mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The moment is not endowed with a result, because it does not endure.

original: de'i phyir bdag nyid yun ring du gnas pa gzhan gyi don gyi 'og tu 'bras bu ldan par mthong nas 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag nyid yun ring du gnas pa gzhan gyi don gyi 'og tu 'bras bu ldan par mthong nas 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, one sees that the result is endowed with the welfare of others, which endures for a long time, and then engages in it.

original: de lta yin dang phyin ci log nyid la 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de lta yin dang phyin ci log nyid la 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then engagement is mistaken.

original: de lta ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta ni ma yin no //
translated: That is not so.

original: gang gi phyir gal te gzhan gyi don las ma gtogs pa bdag nyid la gnas pa'i 'bras bur 'dod pa yin na ni phyin ci log las 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gal te gzhan gyi don las ma gtogs pa bdag nyid la gnas pa'i 'bras bur 'dod pa yin na ni phyin ci log las 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the result were accepted as enduring for the sake of the self, apart from the welfare of others, then engagement would be mistaken.

original: 'dod pa ni ma yin te gzhan gyi don de nyid 'jug pa'i 'bras bur 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa ni ma yin te gzhan gyi don de nyid 'jug pa'i 'bras bur 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But that is not accepted, because the welfare of others is accepted as the result of engagement.

original: 'dod mod de nyid 'bras bur ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'dod mod de nyid 'bras bur ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But how can that be the result?

original: 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the definition of result is that which is desired.

original: gang zhig mngon par 'dod pa de nyid 'bras bu yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig mngon par 'dod pa de nyid 'bras bu yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: That which is desired is the result, not something else.

original: des na gzhan gyi don la 'jug pa phyin ci log ma yin no //
analyzed: des na gzhan gyi don la 'jug pa phyin ci log ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, engaging in the welfare of others is not erroneous.

original: de'i phyir snying rjes tha snyad du 'gyur ba'i 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa'i dbang gis chags pa dang bcas pa lta bur 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir tshig gi khyad par las 'dod chags rjes su dpog pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir snying rjes tha snyad du 'gyur ba'i 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa'i dbang gis chags pa dang bcas pa lta bur 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir tshig gi khyad par las 'dod chags rjes su dpog pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, because of the power of conventional freedom from attachment and so on, compassion is like one who is attached. Attachment is not inferred from the special words of the Buddha,

original: 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽gal @147a * //
analyzed: 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ro // gal @147a * //
translated: because they are not the result.

original: te 'dod chags kyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir tshig las 'dod chags rjes su dpog pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: te 'dod chags kyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir tshig las 'dod chags rjes su dpog pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: If attachment is not inferred from the words of the Buddha because they are the result of attachment,

original: 'on kyang smra ba po bdag la 'dod chags la sogs pa smra ba po nyid dang lhan cig spyod par mthong bas gzhan la yang smra ba po nyid mthong ba las lhan cig spyod pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa rjes su dpog pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on kyang smra ba po bdag la 'dod chags la sogs pa smra ba po nyid dang lhan cig spyod par mthong bas gzhan la yang smra ba po nyid mthong ba las lhan cig spyod pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa rjes su dpog pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But since one sees attachment and so on coexisting with the speaker, the self, one infers the existence of attachment and so on coexisting with the speaker, even though one does not see it.

original: 'di las smra ba po bdag la dkar sham nyid mthong ba'i phyir smra ba po nag po la yang dkar sham nyid rjes su dpog pas ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'di las smra ba po bdag la dkar sham nyid mthong ba'i phyir smra ba po nag po la yang dkar sham nyid rjes su dpog pas ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad zin to //
translated: We have already explained that it is absurd to infer the existence of attachment and so on coexisting with the speaker, since one sees the speaker, the self, to be white.

original: 'on te tshig dkar sham nyid la 'khrul pa'i phyir rjes su mi dpog na 'dod chags la sogs pa rjes su dpog pas na 'di la yang mi 'khrul bar ci ltar nges /
analyzed: 'on te tshig dkar sham nyid la 'khrul pa'i phyir rjes su mi dpog na 'dod chags la sogs pa rjes su dpog pas na 'di la yang mi 'khrul bar ci ltar nges /
translated: But if one does not infer the existence of attachment and so on coexisting with the speaker, since one is mistaken about the speaker’s whiteness, then how can one be certain that one is not mistaken about the inference of attachment and so on?

original: ma mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: ma mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because one does not see them.

original: mthong ba la yang zhugs pa dang the tshom za ba dag gis mi 'khrul par nges pa med par mtshungs so zhes gong nyid du bshad zin to //
analyzed: mthong ba la yang zhugs pa dang the tshom za ba dag gis mi 'khrul par nges pa med par mtshungs so zhes gong nyid du bshad zin to //
translated: But we have already explained that it is the same for seeing, since one is not certain that one is not mistaken about seeing, since one is engaged in seeing and doubts it.

original: gzhan yang dkar sham dang dkar sham ma yin pa bltar rung ba'i bdag nyid dag ni 'gal ba med pa'i phyir lhan cig tu 'gyur ba 'am /
analyzed: gzhan yang dkar sham dang dkar sham ma yin pa bltar rung ba'i bdag nyid dag ni 'gal ba med pa'i phyir lhan cig tu 'gyur ba 'am /
translated: Moreover, since the nature of the visible, white and non-white, is not contradictory, they would be simultaneous.

original: rang bzhin 'gal ba'i phyir dang rgyu 'gal ba'i phyir lhan cig tu 'gyur ba ma yin par mthong gi /
analyzed: rang bzhin 'gal ba'i phyir dang rgyu 'gal ba'i phyir lhan cig tu 'gyur ba ma yin par mthong gi /
translated: But since their natures are contradictory and their causes are contradictory, they are not seen to be simultaneous.

original: lkog tu gyur pa dbang po las 'das pa 'dod chags dang bral ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan par rjes su dpag kyang med par nges pa rnyed par dka'o //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa dbang po las 'das pa 'dod chags dang bral ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan par rjes su dpag kyang med par nges pa rnyed par dka'o //
translated: But it is difficult to ascertain the non-existence of the invisible, the imperceptible, the dispassionate, even though one infers that it is associated with passion, etc.🔽Thus, when one is associated with passion, at that time one is not dispassionate, but it is difficult to ascertain the non-existence of passion in the continuum of one who is associated with passion, because the cause of dispassion is not seen.

original: 'di ltar phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i phyir gang gi tshe chags pa dang bcas pa de nyid kyi tshe 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin yang 'dod chags dang bral bltar mi rung ba'i rgyu ma mthong ba'i phyir 'dod chags can gyi rgyud la dus gzhan gyi🔽tshe skye ba med par nges pa ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: 'di ltar phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i phyir gang gi tshe chags pa dang bcas pa de nyid kyi tshe 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin yang 'dod chags dang bral bltar mi rung ba'i rgyu ma mthong ba'i phyir 'dod chags can gyi rgyud la dus gzhan gyi🔽tshe skye ba med par nges pa ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: For, since they are mutually exclusive, there is no certainty that passion will not arise at another time in the continuum of one who is associated with passion.

original: de'i phyir rgyu 'gal ba mthong ba med pas na rgyud gcig la rim gyis 'byung ba'i 'dod chags dang lhan cig tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu 'gal ba mthong ba med pas na rgyud gcig la rim gyis 'byung ba'i 'dod chags dang lhan cig tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, since there is no seeing of a contradictory cause, attachment arises simultaneously in a single continuum.

original: gang gi phyir bdag la lhan cig spyod pa las rjes su dpog pa ma yin pa'i rgyu de'i phyir tshig gis ni lce rtse la sogs pa'i yon tan brjod par nus pa dang / don dang ldan pa las ni brjod par 'dod pa rnam pa gnyis rjes su dpog par byed la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bdag la lhan cig spyod pa las rjes su dpog pa ma yin pa'i rgyu de'i phyir tshig gis ni lce rtse la sogs pa'i yon tan brjod par nus pa dang / don dang ldan pa las ni brjod par 'dod pa rnam pa gnyis rjes su dpog par byed la /
translated: Since the cause of the word is not inferred from the co-occurrence of the word and the object, the word is able to express the qualities of the tongue tip, etc., and from the meaningful word, the two types of intended expression are inferred.

original: don med pas ni sgra brjod par 'dod pa nyid rjes su dpog par byed do //
analyzed: don med pas ni sgra brjod par 'dod pa nyid rjes su dpog par byed do //
translated: But from the meaningless word, only the speaker’s intention to express is inferred.

original: gal te rjes su dpag pa 'dir yang smra ba po bdag la byed pa'i yon tan la sogs pa mthong bas @147b thams cad la rjes su dpog pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i thal ba 'di mtshungs so zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rjes su dpag pa 'dir yang smra ba po bdag la byed pa'i yon tan la sogs pa mthong bas @147b thams cad la rjes su dpog pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i thal ba 'di mtshungs so zhe na /
translated: If you say, “In this inference as well, since the speaker is seen to have the qualities of an agent, etc., the absurd consequence that it is not inferred in all cases is the same,”

original: mtshungs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mtshungs pa ma yin te /
translated: it is not the same.

original: tshig dang brjod par 'dod pa de dag rang gi rgyud 'dir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du grub pa gang yin pa des rgyud gzhan la yang rjes su dpog pa rgyu'i phyir ro //🔽byed pa'i yon tan dang brjod par 'dod pa yod pa'am /
analyzed: tshig dang brjod par 'dod pa de dag rang gi rgyud 'dir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du grub pa gang yin pa des rgyud gzhan la yang rjes su dpog pa rgyu'i phyir ro // byed pa'i yon tan dang brjod par 'dod pa yod pa'am /
translated: The relation of cause and effect is established by the presence and absence of the effect in the presence and absence of the cause. This relation is inferred in other cases as well.🔽The presence of the effect is due to the presence of the cause, and the absence of the effect is due to the absence of the cause.

original: khyad par du gyur na tshig yod pa dang khyad par du 'gyur ba'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid du nges pas gzhan du rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: khyad par du gyur na tshig yod pa dang khyad par du 'gyur ba'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid du nges pas gzhan du rtogs par byed do //
translated: The relation of cause and effect is ascertained by the presence of the effect when the cause is present and by the absence of the effect when the cause is absent. Thus, the relation is inferred in other cases as well.

original: dper na tshang bang du me dang du ba dag rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid du mthong bas sa phyogs su ma grub pa rjes su rtogs par byed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na tshang bang du me dang du ba dag rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid du mthong bas sa phyogs su ma grub pa rjes su rtogs par byed pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, when fire and smoke are seen to be related as cause and effect in a kitchen, this relation is inferred in other places as well, even where it has not been observed.

original: mi sdug pa la dga' ba 'dod chags dang bdag tu lta ba zhes bya ba'i phyin ci log dang tshig ni lhan cig de ltar bskyed bya skyed byed kyi dngos po rang gi rgyud la grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mi sdug pa la dga' ba 'dod chags dang bdag tu lta ba zhes bya ba'i phyin ci log dang tshig ni lhan cig de ltar bskyed bya skyed byed kyi dngos po rang gi rgyud la grub pa ma yin no //
translated: The perversions called “pleasure in the unlovely” and “belief in a self” are not things established in one’s own stream of consciousness as the producer and the produced.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bdag nyid la gzhan du zhes bya ba phyin ci log dang / mi sdug pa la dga' ba med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid la gzhan du zhes bya ba phyin ci log dang / mi sdug pa la dga' ba med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no “other” in one’s own self, and because there is no pleasure in the unlovely.

original: gal te de ltar na 'dod chags nyid tshig las mi dpog gi /
analyzed: gal te de ltar na 'dod chags nyid tshig las mi dpog gi /
translated: If that is so, then attachment is not inferred from the word.

original: 'on kyang 'dod chags skyed par rung ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'dod chags skyed par rung ba nyid do //
translated: But it is suitable to generate attachment.

original: 'dod chags bzhin du 'dod chags skyed par rung ba nyid la ni tshig 'khrul pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dod chags bzhin du 'dod chags skyed par rung ba nyid la ni tshig 'khrul pa ma yin te /
translated: As for the suitability to generate attachment, like attachment itself, the word is not mistaken.

original: rung ba nyid med par tshig ma mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rung ba nyid med par tshig ma mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because there is no word without suitability.

original: de zhes smos te /
analyzed: de zhes smos te /
translated: He says “that” .

original: tshig las rung ba nyid de rjes su dpog par khas len na 'dod chags skyed par rung ba nyid dang bral ba la smra ba ma mthong ba'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du grub par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni med pa nyid do //
analyzed: tshig las rung ba nyid de rjes su dpog par khas len na 'dod chags skyed par rung ba nyid dang bral ba la smra ba ma mthong ba'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du grub par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni med pa nyid do //
translated: If you accept that the absence of the capacity to generate passion is inferred from the absence of the words, then the cause and effect are not established as you assert, because you have not seen the words in the absence of the capacity to generate passion.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rung ba nyid med na tshig ldog par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rung ba nyid med na tshig ldog par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if the capacity does not exist, the absence of the words is not established.

original: ci ltar ma grub /
analyzed: ci ltar ma grub /
translated: How is it not established?

original: gang gi phyir sems pa med pa dag las 'dod chags dag skyed par rung ba nyid log na tshig ldog pa'i phyir sems med pa nyid ldog pa'i yul yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sems pa med pa dag las 'dod chags dag skyed par rung ba nyid log na tshig ldog pa'i phyir sems med pa nyid ldog pa'i yul yin no zhe na /
translated: Because if the capacity to generate passion from insentient things is refuted, the words are refuted. Therefore, the object of the refutation is the absence of sentience.

original: gang gi phyir 'di 'dra ba'i ldog pas ni rgyu'i 'bras bu skyed par nus pa mi 'grub po //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di 'dra ba'i ldog pas ni rgyu'i 'bras bu skyed par nus pa mi 'grub po //
translated: Because such a refutation does not establish the capacity of the cause to generate the effect.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it not established?

original: 'di ltar zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ltar zhe na /
translated: Because it is like this.

original: 'di ltar nus pa shes par bya ba gcig po de las gzhan pa'i rgyu dag yod pa na 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ltos pas bya ba gzhan rjes su dpog par byed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar nus pa shes par bya ba gcig po de las gzhan pa'i rgyu dag yod pa na 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ltos pas bya ba gzhan rjes su dpog par byed do //
translated: Thus, since the effect does not exist when the other causes, apart from the cause that is known to be capable, exist, the activity of the other causes is inferred from the dependence of the effect.

original: de'i phyir 'di 'dra ba rgyu gzhan mtha' dag nye ba med pa'i ldog pa ni rgyu nyid @148a * //🔽du 'grub pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di 'dra ba rgyu gzhan mtha' dag nye ba med pa'i ldog pa ni rgyu nyid @148a * // du 'grub pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the mere absence of all other causes is not the reason for establishing the cause.

original: rgyu gzhan mtha' dag nye ba dang ldan pa'i ldog pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu gzhan mtha' dag nye ba dang ldan pa'i ldog pa yin no //
translated: The absence of all other causes is the reason for establishing the cause.

original: rnam pa 'di lta bu ni sems med pa dag la mi 'grub po //
analyzed: rnam pa 'di lta bu ni sems med pa dag la mi 'grub po //
translated: This kind of reason is not established for insentient things.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de dag la sems pa dang byed pa'i yon tan dang / brjod par 'dod pa sgra skyed pa la nus pa mthong ba'i rgyu nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag la sems pa dang byed pa'i yon tan dang / brjod par 'dod pa sgra skyed pa la nus pa mthong ba'i rgyu nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because in them, the cause is not seen to have the capacity for the qualities of intention and action, or for producing sound, which is the expression of what is intended.

original: de lta yin dang ci nus pa mthong ba'i rgyu med pa'i phyir tshig med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de lta yin dang ci nus pa mthong ba'i rgyu med pa'i phyir tshig med pa yin nam /
translated: If that is so, is it because the cause is not seen to have the capacity, that there is no expression?

original: 'on te 'dod chags skyed par rung ba nyid med pas yin zhes the tshom za ba'i rgyu nyid du nges pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on te 'dod chags skyed par rung ba nyid med pas yin zhes the tshom za ba'i rgyu nyid du nges pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Or is it because the capacity to generate attachment does not exist?

original: gzhan yang 'dod chags skyed par rung ba nyid tshig gi rgyu yin na 'dod chags dang tshig gnyis tshogs pa gcig la rag las bas dngos su yin nam /🔽rung ba nyid kyi 'bras bu 'dod chags tshig gi rgyu yin pas brgyud nas yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dod chags skyed par rung ba nyid tshig gi rgyu yin na 'dod chags dang tshig gnyis tshogs pa gcig la rag las bas dngos su yin nam / rung ba nyid kyi 'bras bu 'dod chags tshig gi rgyu yin pas brgyud nas yin /
translated: If the capacity to generate attachment is the cause of speech, is it the direct cause of speech?🔽Or is it the indirect cause of speech?

original: de la gal te dngos su rgyu yin na 'dod chags kyis phan mi 'dogs na ci ltar 'dod chags de'i nus pas phan 'dogs te tshig skyed pa las byed pa 'jug /'di ltar gnas dang byed pa 'phrod pa'i rgyu yin pa'i sgo nas de ma thag pa'i rkyen🔽tshig gi rgyur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gal te dngos su rgyu yin na 'dod chags kyis phan mi 'dogs na ci ltar 'dod chags de'i nus pas phan 'dogs te tshig skyed pa las byed pa 'jug /'di ltar gnas dang byed pa 'phrod pa'i rgyu yin pa'i sgo nas de ma thag pa'i rkyen tshig gi rgyur 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is the direct cause of speech, how does attachment benefit speech by its capacity, since it does not benefit it?

original: de ma thag pa'i rkyen de las 'dod chags skad cig gnyis pa las 'gyur la /
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i rkyen de las 'dod chags skad cig gnyis pa las 'gyur la /
translated: If it is the indirect cause of speech, then the second moment of attachment would be the cause of speech, because the first moment of attachment is the cause of the second moment of attachment.

original: byed pa 'phrod pa ni skad cig du ma khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: byed pa 'phrod pa ni skad cig du ma khyab pa yin no //
translated: The action is the cause of the many moments.

original: des na ci ltar tshig brjod par 'dod pa'i rgyu can yin pa de bzhin du 'dod chags kyi 'bras bu yang yin te /
analyzed: des na ci ltar tshig brjod par 'dod pa'i rgyu can yin pa de bzhin du 'dod chags kyi 'bras bu yang yin te /
translated: Thus, just as the expression is the cause of the desire, so also the desire is the result of the expression,

original: gnyi ga'i yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi ga'i yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the existence and nonexistence of both follow one another.

original: 'on te gnyi ga yang skad cig gnyis pa la yang 'gyur ba yin no /
analyzed: 'on te gnyi ga yang skad cig gnyis pa la yang 'gyur ba yin no /
translated: But if both are in the second moment,

original: de lta na yang rjod par byed pa yi ge'i tshogs skad cig du mar gnas pa yin pa'i phyir 'dod chags kyi 'bras bu nyid du 'grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: de lta na yang rjod par byed pa yi ge'i tshogs skad cig du mar gnas pa yin pa'i phyir 'dod chags kyi 'bras bu nyid du 'grub pa nyid do //
translated: then also the expression is established as the result of the desire, because the collection of letters that expresses the desire endures for many moments.

original: 'dod chags kyi 'bras bu yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi 'bras bu yang ma yin te /
translated: But it is not the result of the desire,

original: des na tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa'i phyir 'dod chags skyed par rung ba nyid tshig gi rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: des na tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa'i phyir 'dod chags skyed par rung ba nyid tshig gi rgyu ma yin no //
translated: because it is not possible that the desire is the cause of the expression, since it depends on a single collection.

original: 'dod chags kyis dngos su phan mi 'dogs na de'i nus pa brgyud pas kyang phan 'dogs par 'gyur pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyis dngos su phan mi 'dogs na de'i nus pa brgyud pas kyang phan 'dogs par 'gyur pa ma yin no //
translated: If the desire does not directly benefit, it will not benefit through a series.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'bras bu'i rang gi ngo bo yon tan skyed par byed pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos rgyu nus pa la nye bar btags pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rang gi ngo bo yon tan skyed par byed pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos rgyu nus pa la nye bar btags pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: The effect is the cause in the sense that the cause is figuratively designated as the effect because it generates the effect’s own entity, qualities, and so on.

original: 'bras bu gang la 'bras bu'i rang gi ngo bo des mi nus pa de la rgyu'i nus pas kyang nus par brtag @148b pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu gang la 'bras bu'i rang gi ngo bo des mi nus pa de la rgyu'i nus pas kyang nus par brtag @148b pa ma yin no //
translated: If the effect is not able to generate its own entity by itself, then it is not able to generate its own entity through the power of the cause.

original: brgyud pa 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig gi skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba ni med de /
analyzed: brgyud pa 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig gi skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba ni med de /
translated: There is no such thing as one thing generating another through some sort of continuum.

original: de med kyang chod pa'i 'bras bu ni thams cad kyi tshe gzhan las yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med kyang chod pa'i 'bras bu ni thams cad kyi tshe gzhan las yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even if there were no such thing as a continuum, an effect would still exist at all times from another cause.

original: de'i phyir rgyu'i rgyu yin pas nye bar btags nas rgyur brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu'i rgyu yin pas nye bar btags nas rgyur brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, because it is the cause of the cause, it is figuratively called the cause.

original: 'bras bus phan mi 'dogs na ni sa bon med pa'i phyir rgyu nus pa yin no zhes brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bus phan mi 'dogs na ni sa bon med pa'i phyir rgyu nus pa yin no zhes brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: If the effect does not benefit it, then it is not possible to say that the seed is the cause because it has the power to generate the effect.

original: gal te tshogs pa gang las tshig 'jug pa de brgyud nas 'dod chags la rung ba yin par rjes su dpog go zhe na /
analyzed: gal te tshogs pa gang las tshig 'jug pa de brgyud nas 'dod chags la rung ba yin par rjes su dpog go zhe na /
translated: If you infer that the collection of causes and conditions is suitable to generate desire because it is the cause of the generation of desire, then it is not tenable to say that the effect is generated from the cause.

original: de yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: de yang mi rigs te /
translated: That is not so.

original: gang gi phyir 'dod chags ni bdag tu lta ba las yin na bdag tu lta ba tshig gi rgyu ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dod chags ni bdag tu lta ba las yin na bdag tu lta ba tshig gi rgyu ni ma yin no //
translated: Because attachment is from the view of self, the view of self is not the cause of the words.

original: des na rgyu'i tshogs pa med pa'i phyir rung ba nyid rjes su dpag pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na rgyu'i tshogs pa med pa'i phyir rung ba nyid rjes su dpag pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, because the collection of causes does not exist, suitability is not inferred.

original: tshogs pa yin yang gegs byed pa srid pa'i phyir nges par 'dod chags rjes su dpog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshogs pa yin yang gegs byed pa srid pa'i phyir nges par 'dod chags rjes su dpog pa ma yin no //
translated: Even if there is a collection, because it is possible that there is an obstruction, attachment is not necessarily inferred.

original: gang gi phyir ldog pa la the tshom za bas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid ma yin pa de pas na ldog pa nges pa med na mi 'byung ba gang yin pa de nyid rgyu yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ldog pa la the tshom za bas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po nyid ma yin pa de pas na ldog pa nges pa med na mi 'byung ba gang yin pa de nyid rgyu yin la /
translated: Because there is doubt about the reversal, there is no causal relation. Therefore, when there is no certainty about the reversal, that which is not produced is the cause.

original: de yang 'bras bus rjes su dpog par byed do //
analyzed: de yang 'bras bus rjes su dpog par byed do //
translated: And that is inferred from the effect.

original: de'i phyir rgyu nyid rjes su dpog par byed de /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu nyid rjes su dpog par byed de /
translated: Therefore, the cause is inferred.

original: 'bras bu der 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu der 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is related to the effect.

original: gzhan 'bras bu ma yin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan 'bras bu ma yin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that another which is not an effect is so.

original: gal te bsgrub bya med pa la ma mthong ba gang yin pa de ni go bar byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub bya med pa la ma mthong ba gang yin pa de ni go bar byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you think that the non-seeing of the probandum is the proof,

original: bshad pa / bsgrub par bya ba med pa la ma mthong yang go bar byed pa cung zad ma yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa / bsgrub par bya ba med pa la ma mthong yang go bar byed pa cung zad ma yin no //
translated: then we reply: Even if the probandum does not exist, the non-seeing is not a proof.

original: gang gi phyir bsgrub par bya ba med pa la gtan tshigs med par go bar byed pas ma mthong ba gtan tshigs go bar byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bsgrub par bya ba med pa la gtan tshigs med par go bar byed pas ma mthong ba gtan tshigs go bar byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Because the probandum does not exist, the proof is not seen. Therefore, the non-seeing is not a proof.

original: rang gi ngo bo tsam gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo tsam gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that the proof is not seen because of its own nature.

original: thams cad gzigs pa'i gzigs pa log pas ni ma mthong ba thams cad med par go bar byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: thams cad gzigs pa'i gzigs pa log pas ni ma mthong ba thams cad med par go bar byed pa yin gyi /
translated: The non-seeing of all things by the seeing of the Omniscient One is a proof of the non-existence of all things.

original: gzhan gyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ni ma yin no //
translated: But the non-seeing of others is not.

original: de'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs la ma mthong yang gtan tshigs go bar byed pa ma yin no ;
analyzed: de'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs la ma mthong yang gtan tshigs go bar byed pa ma yin no ;
translated: Therefore, even if the proof is not seen in the discordant side, it is still a proof.

original: gal te rnam par shes par rigs drug yod la /
analyzed: gal te rnam par shes par rigs drug yod la /
translated: If you think that the six types of consciousness exist,

original: de dag kyang thams cad 'dod chags skyed par rung bar mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: de dag kyang thams cad 'dod chags skyed par rung bar mthong ba yin no //
translated: and that they are seen to be capable of generating attachment,

original: des na rtogs pa'i rang bzhin ltar 'dod chags la sogs pa skyed par rung ba nyid kyang shes pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin mthong ba yin la /🔽tshig rnams de lta @149a * //
analyzed: des na rtogs pa'i rang bzhin ltar 'dod chags la sogs pa skyed par rung ba nyid kyang shes pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin mthong ba yin la / tshig rnams de lta @149a * //
translated: Therefore, just as the nature of the realization is suitable to generate attachment, etc., all consciousnesses see the nature of the object.

original: bu'i 'bras bu yin pa des na gzhan du ma mthong ba'i phyir ldog par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: bu'i 'bras bu yin pa des na gzhan du ma mthong ba'i phyir ldog par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Since the words are the effect of that, they are not seen as other.

original: de ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: de ni mi rigs so //
translated: That is not correct.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: yul lam / dus la na de ltar zhes bya ba bskal pa dang tshad chung du na du mthong ba rnams kyang yul gyi khyad par dang / dus kyi khyad par dang / 'du bya ba'i khyad par las gzhan du zhes bya ba dang rab dang 'bras bu chen por snang ba'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul lam / dus la na de ltar zhes bya ba bskal pa dang tshad chung du na du mthong ba rnams kyang yul gyi khyad par dang / dus kyi khyad par dang / 'du bya ba'i khyad par las gzhan du zhes bya ba dang rab dang 'bras bu chen por snang ba'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the difference in the object or the time, the object is seen in that way. Even in a short time, the difference in the object, the difference in the time, and the difference in the formation cause the appearance of the effect to be different.

original: dper na skyu ru ra'i shing dag 'o mas bcus pa'i 'du bya ba'i khyad par gyis ni 'bras bu ro mngar po 'chags la /
analyzed: dper na skyu ru ra'i shing dag 'o mas bcus pa'i 'du bya ba'i khyad par gyis ni 'bras bu ro mngar po 'chags la /
translated: For example, the difference in the formation of the mango tree being watered with milk causes the fruit to be sweet.

original: phal cher ni de ltar 'bras bu mngar po chags par mi snang ba lta bu'o //🔽des na la lar 'ga' zhig phal cher mthong ba de ltar thams cad du 'gyur ba 'am /
analyzed: phal cher ni de ltar 'bras bu mngar po chags par mi snang ba lta bu'o // des na la lar 'ga' zhig phal cher mthong ba de ltar thams cad du 'gyur ba 'am /
translated: But in most cases, the fruit does not appear to be sweet.🔽Therefore, we say that in some cases, one sees that most [fruits] are sweet, but not that all [fruits] are sweet.

original: ci ltar ma mthong ba de ltar mi 'gyur ba yang ma yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: ci ltar ma mthong ba de ltar mi 'gyur ba yang ma yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: Or, one sees that some [fruits] are not sweet, but not that all [fruits] are not sweet.

original: de bzhin du yul gyi khyad par gyis 'bras bu go srid pa dang / dus kyi khyad par gyis me tog la sogs pa srid pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du yul gyi khyad par gyis 'bras bu go srid pa dang / dus kyi khyad par gyis me tog la sogs pa srid pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, the fruit is possible due to the particularity of the object, and the flower, etc. are possible due to the particularity of time.

original: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 'ga' zhig smra pa la rung ba nyid yang 'dod chags skyed par rung ba la rung ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 'ga' zhig smra pa la rung ba nyid yang 'dod chags skyed par rung ba la rung ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, some consciousnesses are suitable for speech, but not suitable for arousing attachment.

original: 'di ltar gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin skyu ru ra la lar gzugs dang ro dang chen po nyid la sogs pa gzhan du mthong yang /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin skyu ru ra la lar gzugs dang ro dang chen po nyid la sogs pa gzhan du mthong yang /
translated: Thus, the nature of form, etc. is seen differently in different places. In a myrobalan fruit, form, taste, and magnitude, etc. are seen differently.

original: 'du byed pa'i bye brag gis tha dad par 'gyur pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa rtogs pa'i rang bzhin can 'ga' zhig res 'ga' 'dod chags skyed par rung ba nyid du mthong yang rgyu'i stobs kyis gzhan du rung ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du byed pa'i bye brag gis tha dad par 'gyur pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa rtogs pa'i rang bzhin can 'ga' zhig res 'ga' 'dod chags skyed par rung ba nyid du mthong yang rgyu'i stobs kyis gzhan du rung ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as the various actions of the body are different, so too, although one sometimes sees that a consciousness which has the nature of understanding is suitable to generate attachment, it is not suitable to generate another by the power of the cause.

original: 'di ltar 'o mas bcus pa bzhin du rnam pa mi gsal ba'i shes pa gsal ba'i rgyu ni goms pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'o mas bcus pa bzhin du rnam pa mi gsal ba'i shes pa gsal ba'i rgyu ni goms pa yin no //
translated: Thus, just as something unclear becomes clear by being washed with milk, the cause of the clarity of a unclear consciousness is habituation.

original: bdag med pa dmigs pa'i shes pa gsal bar snang ba nyid ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin la /
analyzed: bdag med pa dmigs pa'i shes pa gsal bar snang ba nyid ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin la /
translated: The clarity of the appearance of a consciousness that observes selflessness is freedom from attachment.

original: chos thams cad skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa la dmigs pa gsal bar snang ba'i shes pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad skad cig ma nyid la sogs pa la dmigs pa gsal bar snang ba'i shes pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin no //
translated: The clarity of the appearance of a consciousness that observes the momentariness of all phenomena and so on is omniscience.

original: gal te rtogs pa bzhin du 'dod chags kyi rung ba rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yin na /
analyzed: gal te rtogs pa bzhin du 'dod chags kyi rung ba rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yin na /
translated: If, as you say, the suitability of attachment is the nature of consciousness,

original: rnam par shes pa gang yang goms ba las gsal bar snang bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gang yang goms ba las gsal bar snang bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then no consciousness would become clear through habituation.

original: de bas na mngon sum du byas pa'i gsal bar snang ba goms pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis 'phel ba nyid 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rung ba shes pa'i rang bzhin @149b yin pa la gnod par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na mngon sum du byas pa'i gsal bar snang ba goms pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis 'phel ba nyid 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rung ba shes pa'i rang bzhin @149b yin pa la gnod par byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the reason for the increase of the clear appearance that is made manifest is the nature of the cognition of the suitability of passion, etc.

original: gang gi phyir gzhan du mthong ba yang rgyu'i stobs kyis gzhan du yang 'gyur ba de yang tshig tsam las ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhan du mthong ba yang rgyu'i stobs kyis gzhan du yang 'gyur ba de yang tshig tsam las ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Because it is seen elsewhere that by the power of a cause, something else occurs, that is not just mere words.

original: 'on kyang bdag lta bu smra ba po bdag dang 'dra ba'i khyad par can gyi smra ba las 'dod chags kyi rung ba nyid rjes su dpag par rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang bdag lta bu smra ba po bdag dang 'dra ba'i khyad par can gyi smra ba las 'dod chags kyi rung ba nyid rjes su dpag par rigs pa yin no //
translated: However, it is reasonable to infer the suitability of passion from the speech of a speaker who is like me, who has a special similarity to me.

original: de las kyang ci ltar rigs she na /
analyzed: de las kyang ci ltar rigs she na /
translated: How is that reasonable?

original: bshad pa / de dang 'dra ba'i smra ba po ni 'dod chags skye ba'i rgyu bdag tu lta ba dang / log pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / de dang 'dra ba'i smra ba po ni 'dod chags skye ba'i rgyu bdag tu lta ba dang / log pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is said: The speaker who is like that has the view of self, which is the cause of the arising of passion, and he possesses wrong conceptual thoughts.

original: 'o na 'di nyid khyad par du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na 'di nyid khyad par du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Well, this itself would be the distinction.

original: gang gi tshe la lar khyad par 'di 'dra ba 'grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe yang smra ba po nye bar bkod  pa ni don med do //
analyzed: gang gi tshe la lar khyad par 'di 'dra ba 'grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe yang smra ba po nye bar bkod  pa ni don med do //
translated: When someone does establish such a distinction, then the statement of the proponent of the thesis is pointless.

original: khyad par 'di ni 'ga' zhig tu yang grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par 'di ni 'ga' zhig tu yang grub pa ma yin te /
translated: This distinction is not established in any case,

original: thabs med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thabs med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no method for establishing it.

original: de'i phyir 'di yang ma mthong ba yod kyang ldog pa la the tshom za ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di yang ma mthong ba yod kyang ldog pa la the tshom za ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is also a case where, although the reason is present, there is doubt about the counter pervasion.

original: ldog pa las the tshom za ba'i phyir ma nges pa yin no //🔽tshul re re ma grub pa dang / ma nges pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang bar brjod nas /
analyzed: ldog pa las the tshom za ba'i phyir ma nges pa yin no // tshul re re ma grub pa dang / ma nges pa'i gtan tshigs ltar snang bar brjod nas /
translated: Because there is doubt about the counter pervasion, the reason is indefinite.🔽Having described the fallacies of reasons that are unestablished with respect to one or the other of the two members of a dichotomy,

original: gnyis ma grub pa 'am the tshom zan ci rigs par brjod pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: gnyis ma grub pa 'am the tshom zan ci rigs par brjod pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: he explains the fallacies that are unestablished or doubtful with respect to both members of a dichotomy.

original: tshul gnyis ma grub na 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: tshul gnyis ma grub na 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'o //
translated: If both members of a dichotomy are not established, then the reason is a fallacy of contradiction.

original: dper brjod pa smra ba ni dper na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dper brjod pa smra ba ni dper na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement of an example is “for example.”

original: rtag pa nyid sgrub pa la rang bzhin byas pa nyid dang / 'bras bu rtsol ba las byung ba nyid ni 'gal ba yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid sgrub pa la rang bzhin byas pa nyid dang / 'bras bu rtsol ba las byung ba nyid ni 'gal ba yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, in the proof of permanence, the reason “being produced” and the reason “having an effect that arises from effort” are contradictory.

original: ci ltar 'di la tshul gnyis ma grub ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar 'di la tshul gnyis ma grub ce na /
translated: How are the two modes not established in this case?

original: gang gi phyir gtan tshigs de dag ni mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa nyid dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la yod pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gtan tshigs de dag ni mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa nyid dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la yod pa yin te /
translated: Because those reasons do not exist in the similar class and exist in the dissimilar class.

original: de'i phyir tshul gnyis ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir tshul gnyis ma grub pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the two modes are not established.

original: gal te ma grub pa tsam gyis ni 'gal ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te ma grub pa tsam gyis ni 'gal ba ma yin gyi /
translated: If something is not established, it is not contradictory.

original: 'on kyang phyin ci log tu grub pa las ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'on kyang phyin ci log tu grub pa las ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But is it not established in the opposite way?

original: bden te / 'on kyang gang du gang zhig phyin ci log tu grub pa de der ma grub pa yang yin te /
analyzed: bden te / 'on kyang gang du gang zhig phyin ci log tu grub pa de der ma grub pa yang yin te /
translated: That is true, but if something is established in the opposite way in a certain place, it is not established in that place.

original: de na ma grub pas phyin ci log tu grub pa mtshon ba yin no //
analyzed: de na ma grub pas phyin ci log tu grub pa mtshon ba yin no //
translated: Because it is not established there, it is indicated as established in the opposite way.

original: des na phyin ci log tu grub po zhes ci srid brjod pa de srid ma grub par brjod do //
analyzed: des na phyin ci log tu grub po zhes ci srid brjod pa de srid ma grub par brjod do //
translated: Therefore, as long as it is said to be established in the opposite way, it is said not to be established.

original: gang gi phyir phyin ci log tu grub pa des na gtan tshigs 'di dag bsgrub par bya ba phyin ci log tu sgrub par byed pa de'i phyir 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs yin no /
analyzed: gang gi phyir phyin ci log tu grub pa des na gtan tshigs 'di dag bsgrub par bya ba phyin ci log tu sgrub par byed pa de'i phyir 'gal ba'i gtan tshigs yin no /
translated: Since the reason is established in a contradictory way, it proves the probandum in a contradictory way. Therefore, it is a contradictory reason.

original: @150a * // de bas na ma grub pa na phyin ci log tu grub pa yin na //🔽gal te bsgrub bya phyin ci log tu grub pa'i 'gal ba 'di gnyis las gzhan 'dod pa'i bsgrub par bya ba la gnod par byed pa ste /
analyzed: @150a * // de bas na ma grub pa na phyin ci log tu grub pa yin na // gal te bsgrub bya phyin ci log tu grub pa'i 'gal ba 'di gnyis las gzhan 'dod pa'i bsgrub par bya ba la gnod par byed pa ste /
translated: Since it is not established, it is established in a contradictory way.

original: 'gog pa'i 'gal pa gsum pa yang yod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'gog pa'i 'gal pa gsum pa yang yod pa ma yin nam /
translated: If this contradiction of proving the probandum in a contradictory way is different from the two, then is there a third contradiction that contradicts the probandum that is accepted?

original: de ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: de ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is that like?

original: dper na zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is like this.

original: mig la sogs pa ni chos can te /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa ni chos can te /
translated: The subject is the eye and so on.

original: gzhan gyi don yin no zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don yin no zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The probandum is that it is for the benefit of others.

original: 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
translated: The reason is because it is a collection.

original: dper na ma la cha dang stan dang skyes bu'i nye bar spyod pa'i yan lag 'dus pa'i rang bzhin gzhan rung ba bzhin te /
analyzed: dper na ma la cha dang stan dang skyes bu'i nye bar spyod pa'i yan lag 'dus pa'i rang bzhin gzhan rung ba bzhin te /
translated: For example, it is like the nature of the collection of parts of a chariot, a seat, and the limbs of a person, which are suitable for other uses.

original: 'di ni 'dod pa la gnod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dod pa la gnod par byed pa'o //
translated: This is the contradiction that undermines the desire.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it so?

original: de ni 'dod pa 'dus pa yin pa gzhan gyi don byed pa las phyin ci log 'dus pa gzhan gyi don byed pa de sgrub pa'i phyir 'dod pa la gnod par byed pa'i 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: de ni 'dod pa 'dus pa yin pa gzhan gyi don byed pa las phyin ci log 'dus pa gzhan gyi don byed pa de sgrub pa'i phyir 'dod pa la gnod par byed pa'i 'gal ba yin no //
translated: That is the collection of the desire, which is the opposite of the performance of the purpose of another. The contradiction that undermines the desire is in order to establish the other performance of the purpose of another.

original: khyod kyis kyang de'i phyir ma smos she na /
analyzed: khyod kyis kyang de'i phyir ma smos she na /
translated: Why did you not mention that?

original: gtan tshigs bshad pa /
analyzed: gtan tshigs bshad pa /
translated: The reason is stated.

original: 'dod pa dang smras pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khyad par med pa'i rgyu'i phyir ma smos so //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang smras pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khyad par med pa'i rgyu'i phyir ma smos so //
translated: Because there is no difference in the reason for establishing the desire and the statement, it is not mentioned.

original: mdor gzhag pa'i tshig 'di nyid rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: mdor gzhag pa'i tshig 'di nyid rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: In order to explain just this statement of the summary, it is said:

original: gang gi phyir de dag las 'di bsgrub par bya ba phyin ci log tu sgrub pa nyid ni bye brag yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de dag las 'di bsgrub par bya ba phyin ci log tu sgrub pa nyid ni bye brag yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because there is no difference in the establishment of this from those, the establishment in the opposite way is not a difference.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: gang gi phyir 'dod pa dang smras pa dag bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khyad par 'ga' yang med do zhes phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyi skabs su bshad zin to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dod pa dang smras pa dag bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khyad par 'ga' yang med do zhes phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyi skabs su bshad zin to //
translated: Because there is not the slightest difference between what is asserted and what is said in terms of their being the probandum, as has already been explained in the section on the characteristics of the position.

original: de bas na bsgrub bya phyin ci log tu sgrub pa'i phyir 'di 'gal ba de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par logs shig tu ma brjod do //🔽'dod pa dang smras pa dag bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khyad par yod pa khas len na ni ci ltar 'dod pa la gnod par byed pa'i 'gal ba logs shig tu brjod pa de bzhin du 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs kyang bsgrub bya sgrub
analyzed: de bas na bsgrub bya phyin ci log tu sgrub pa'i phyir 'di 'gal ba de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par logs shig tu ma brjod do // 'dod pa dang smras pa dag bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khyad par yod pa khas len na ni ci ltar 'dod pa la gnod par byed pa'i 'gal ba logs shig tu brjod pa de bzhin du 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs kyang bsgrub bya sgrub
translated: Therefore, because it proves the opposite of the probandum, it is included within contradiction itself, and so is not mentioned separately.

original: pa'i gtan tshigs las logs shig tu brjod par 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: pa'i gtan tshigs las logs shig tu brjod par 'gyur ro ;
translated: If one accepts that there is a difference in terms of what is asserted and what is said being the probandum, then just as contradiction is mentioned separately as what harms what is asserted, in the same way, a reason that proves what is asserted would also be mentioned separately from a reason that proves the probandum.

original: brjod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: brjod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: But that is not mentioned.

original: des na bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs gcig nyid kyi tshig gis bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khyad par med par bstan to /
analyzed: des na bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs gcig nyid kyi tshig gis bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khyad par med par bstan to /
translated: Therefore, the very words of the reason that proves the probandum indicate that there is no difference in the probandum.

original: gang gi phyir bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khyad par med ba de nyid kyi phyir de phyin ci log tu sgrub pa'i 'gal ba yang gcig @150b nyid do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khyad par med ba de nyid kyi phyir de phyin ci log tu sgrub pa'i 'gal ba yang gcig @150b nyid do //
translated: And because there is no difference in the probandum, therefore the contradiction that proves the probandum in a perverse way is the same.

original: gal te bsgrub bya phyin ci log tu sgrub pa'i 'gal ba gcig nyid yin na /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub bya phyin ci log tu sgrub pa'i 'gal ba gcig nyid yin na /
translated: If the contradiction that proves the probandum in a perverse way is the same,

original: 'o na ci ltar 'dod pa la gnod pa byed ba'i 'gal ba gzhan du bshad ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar 'dod pa la gnod pa byed ba'i 'gal ba gzhan du bshad ce na /
translated: then why is the contradiction that harms what is desired explained as being different?

original: bshad pa / 'gal bde'i tha dad pa ni sbyor ba sgra'i byed pa'i bye drag la ste /
analyzed: bshad pa / 'gal bde'i tha dad pa ni sbyor ba sgra'i byed pa'i bye drag la ste /
translated: In response to this, we say: The difference between these two contradictions is due to the difference in the function of the words that express them.

original: gang du sgras nye bar bkod pa'i bsgrub bya gnod pa de ni 'gal ba yin la /
analyzed: gang du sgras nye bar bkod pa'i bsgrub bya gnod pa de ni 'gal ba yin la /
translated: Where the probandum that is expressed by the words is harmed, that is contradiction.

original: gang du don gyis thob pa gnod par byas pa der ni 'dod pa la gnod par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gang du don gyis thob pa gnod par byas pa der ni 'dod pa la gnod par byed pa yin no //
translated: Where the meaning that is implicitly understood is harmed, there the contradiction harms what is desired.

original: gang du 'dod pa la gnod par byed pa der yang dper na 'di dag ni 'dus pa ma yin pa'i yul can gzhan gyi don byed pa yin no zhes bya ba lta bur gal te 'dod pa de chos kyi khyad par du byed pa de'i tshe ni chos🔽kyi khyad par phyin ci log tu sgrub pa'i 'gal ba yin la /
analyzed: gang du 'dod pa la gnod par byed pa der yang dper na 'di dag ni 'dus pa ma yin pa'i yul can gzhan gyi don byed pa yin no zhes bya ba lta bur gal te 'dod pa de chos kyi khyad par du byed pa de'i tshe ni chos kyi khyad par phyin ci log tu sgrub pa'i 'gal ba yin la /
translated: If the desire is to make a distinction of the predicate, then it is a contradiction that establishes a predicate that is the opposite of the predicate.

original: gang gi tshe 'dod pa de chos can gyi khyad par du byed pa de'i tshe chos can gyi khyad par phyin ci log tu sgrub pa'i 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'dod pa de chos can gyi khyad par du byed pa de'i tshe chos can gyi khyad par phyin ci log tu sgrub pa'i 'gal ba yin no //
translated: If the desire is to make a distinction of the subject, then it is a contradiction that establishes a subject that is the opposite of the subject.

original: gal te sbyor ba'i bye brag las tha dad pa yin na de bzhin du gtan tshigs kyang ci ste tha dad par mi 'dod ces dogs na /
analyzed: gal te sbyor ba'i bye brag las tha dad pa yin na de bzhin du gtan tshigs kyang ci ste tha dad par mi 'dod ces dogs na /
translated: If it is different due to the difference of the application, then why is it not accepted that the reason is also different?

original: bshad pa / gtan tshigs rnam par 'byed par byed pa la su zhig 'gog / gal te gtan tshigs kyang tha dad par byed pa yin na 'o na ci ltar 'gal ba nyid tha dad par brjod ce na /
analyzed: bshad pa / gtan tshigs rnam par 'byed par byed pa la su zhig 'gog / gal te gtan tshigs kyang tha dad par byed pa yin na 'o na ci ltar 'gal ba nyid tha dad par brjod ce na /
translated: We reply: Who is there to stop the differentiation of the reason? If the reason is also differentiated, then why is it said that the contradiction is differentiated?

original: bshad pa / don gyis 'phangs pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa'i dngos po ma brjod pa yang pha rol pos bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: bshad pa / don gyis 'phangs pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa'i dngos po ma brjod pa yang pha rol pos bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir la /
translated: Response: The meaning that is implied is not stated because the opponent asserts it to be the object of affirmation.🔽The meaning that is stated is the object of the opponent’s critique.

original: brjod pa'i don nyid la gzhan gyi skyon brjod par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: brjod pa'i don nyid la gzhan gyi skyon brjod par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: But it is not the object that is implied.

original: don gyis 'phangs pa la ni yin no zhes sems pa na ;
analyzed: don gyis 'phangs pa la ni yin no zhes sems pa na ;
translated: This is what you think.

original: de'i bsam pa'i dbang gis 'dod pa la gnod par byed pa'i 'gal ba brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i bsam pa'i dbang gis 'dod pa la gnod par byed pa'i 'gal ba brjod pa yin te /
translated: But in terms of your thought, we state a contradiction that undermines your assertion.🔽Just as the meaning that is implied is your object of affirmation, in the same way, because the meaning that is implied is undermined, we state that your reason is contradictory.

original: ci ltar don gyis 'phangs pa khyed kyi bsgrub bya yin pa de bzhin du don gyis 'phangs pa la gnod pa'i phyir khyed kyi gtan tshigs 'gal ba yin par nged brjod do zhes rtsod pa 'di tsam gyis na 'dod pa la gnod pa byed pa logs shig tu
analyzed: ci ltar don gyis 'phangs pa khyed kyi bsgrub bya yin pa de bzhin du don gyis 'phangs pa la gnod pa'i phyir khyed kyi gtan tshigs 'gal ba yin par nged brjod do zhes rtsod pa 'di tsam gyis na 'dod pa la gnod pa byed pa logs shig tu
translated: This is the extent of the dispute. This is a separate statement that undermines your assertion.

original: brjod kyi / 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de tha dad pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
analyzed: brjod kyi / 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de tha dad pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not because the definition of contradiction is different.

original: gang gi phyir mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i phyir ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i phyir ni ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not because of a difference in characteristics.

original: 'on kyang dogs pa gzhan gyis logs shig tu brjod pa de nyid @151a * //
analyzed: 'on kyang dogs pa gzhan gyis logs shig tu brjod pa de nyid @151a * //
translated: But because of another doubt, it is stated separately.

original: kyi phyir gtan tshigs kyang logs shig tu bstan pa ma yin par snga ma nyid du bshad do //
analyzed: kyi phyir gtan tshigs kyang logs shig tu bstan pa ma yin par snga ma nyid du bshad do //
translated: For that very reason, the reason is not taught separately, as was explained earlier.

original: mtshan nyid tha dad na ni gtan tshigs kyang logs shig tu bstan par bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan nyid tha dad na ni gtan tshigs kyang logs shig tu bstan par bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If there were a difference in characteristics, the reason would have to be taught separately.

original: gal te gtan tshigs 'di ma nges pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs 'di ma nges pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: If this reason is not uncertain?

original: ci'i phyir zhe na ;
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na ;
translated: Why?

original: 'dus pa rnams 'dus pa lam yin pa'i gzhan gang yin pa de la phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid du ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dus pa rnams 'dus pa lam yin pa'i gzhan gang yin pa de la phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid du ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not certain that whatever is other than the collection of causes and conditions is a benefactor.

original: de'i phyir 'gal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'gal ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not contradictory.

original: 'di ltar bsgrub par bya ba las phyin ci log gis khyab pa 'gal ba yin na nges par med pa'i phyir phyin ci log gis khyab pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar bsgrub par bya ba las phyin ci log gis khyab pa 'gal ba yin na nges par med pa'i phyir phyin ci log gis khyab pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, if there were a contradiction in the pervasion by the opposite of the probandum, then there would be no certainty. Therefore, there is no pervasion by the opposite.

original: ci ltar nges pa med ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar nges pa med ce na /
translated: How is there no certainty?

original: gang gi phyir 'dus pa gzhan la phan 'dogs par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di la nges pa ci zhig yod de /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dus pa gzhan la phan 'dogs par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di la nges pa ci zhig yod de /
translated: What certainty is there that the assembly of causes and conditions benefits another?

original: cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: cung zad kyang med do //
translated: None at all.

original: kha cig tu ni 'dus pa rnams gzhan la phan 'dogs par mi byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: kha cig tu ni 'dus pa rnams gzhan la phan 'dogs par mi byed pa nyid do //
translated: In some cases, the assembly does not benefit another.

original: gang dag gzhan la phan 'dogs par byed pa tsam du nges pa de dag kyang 'dus pa gzhan la phan 'dogs par nges par ga la 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang dag gzhan la phan 'dogs par byed pa tsam du nges pa de dag kyang 'dus pa gzhan la phan 'dogs par nges par ga la 'gyur te /
translated: And how could those that are ascertained to benefit another be ascertained to benefit another assembly?

original: de'i phyir 'gal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'gal ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, there is no contradiction.

original: gal te 'bras bu gcig la mngon du phyogs pa'i rgyu tshogs pa 'dus pa yin pas de ci'i phyir 'bras bu nges pa med ce na /
analyzed: gal te 'bras bu gcig la mngon du phyogs pa'i rgyu tshogs pa 'dus pa yin pas de ci'i phyir 'bras bu nges pa med ce na /
translated: If the assembly of causes and conditions is directed to a single effect, why is the effect not certain?

original: gal te yang 'bras bu 'ga' zhig la rang gi rgyu las mngon du phyogs pa'i nus pa rnams tshogs shing phrad pa 'dus pa yin pa de lta na yang nus pa'i gnas skabs las sngar gags byed pa dang ma tshang ba srid pa'i phyir rgyu rnams gdon mi
analyzed: gal te yang 'bras bu 'ga' zhig la rang gi rgyu las mngon du phyogs pa'i nus pa rnams tshogs shing phrad pa 'dus pa yin pa de lta na yang nus pa'i gnas skabs las sngar gags byed pa dang ma tshang ba srid pa'i phyir rgyu rnams gdon mi
translated: Even if the potencies that are directed toward some effect were to assemble, since it is possible that the conditions that obstruct and are incomplete existed prior to the occasion of the potencies, the causes are not necessarily producers.🔽

original: za bar 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin no //
analyzed: za bar 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin no //
translated: But even if the potencies of some effects are assembled and meet in the presence of their causes, still, prior to the occasion of the potencies, it is possible that there is an obstruction and incompleteness. Therefore, the causes are not necessarily related to the effects.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa de bas na 'khrul pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa de bas na 'khrul pa nyid yin no //
translated: Since this is so, it is a mistake.

original: 'di snyam du 'o na thogs pa med par phan 'dogs pa mi la sogs pa tha ma'i gnas skabs thob pa gang yin pa de dag ni nges par gzhan la phan 'dogs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du 'o na thogs pa med par phan 'dogs pa mi la sogs pa tha ma'i gnas skabs thob pa gang yin pa de dag ni nges par gzhan la phan 'dogs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you think that those who benefit others without obstruction, such as the Buddha, definitely benefit others,

original: bden mod kyi /
analyzed: bden mod kyi /
translated: this is true.

original: 'on kyang phyogs de la yang 'dus pa la phan 'dogs par bya ba la 'brel pa nges pa med do //
analyzed: 'on kyang phyogs de la yang 'dus pa la phan 'dogs par bya ba la 'brel pa nges pa med do //
translated: But even in that case, there is no definite relation to that which is to be benefited in the assembly.

original: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is it like?

original: 'di dag ni 'dus pa gzhan la phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid do zhes bya ba 'di 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'dus pa gzhan la phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid do zhes bya ba 'di 'dra ba'o //
translated: These are the same as those that benefit other collections.

original: 'di ltar de mtha' dag las mig gi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gcig nyid skye ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar de mtha' dag las mig gi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gcig nyid skye ba yin te /
translated: Thus, from all of them, only one eye consciousness is produced,

original: @151b de'i phyir 'dir yang 'dus pa gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i nges pa med do //
analyzed: @151b de'i phyir 'dir yang 'dus pa gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i nges pa med do //
translated: and therefore, in this case, there is no certainty that it benefits other collections.

original: de ltar la lar phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid med pa'i phyir dang / la lar ni 'dus pa ma yin pa la phan 'dogs par byed pa'i phyir 'dus pa'i rang bzhin la 'dus pa gzhan gyi don byed pas ma khyab pa'i phyir ci ltar 'gal ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar la lar phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid med pa'i phyir dang / la lar ni 'dus pa ma yin pa la phan 'dogs par byed pa'i phyir 'dus pa'i rang bzhin la 'dus pa gzhan gyi don byed pas ma khyab pa'i phyir ci ltar 'gal ba yin zhe na /
translated: Since it is not always beneficial, and since it sometimes benefits that which is not a collection, the nature of a collection does not necessarily benefit other collections. How is this contradictory?

original: slob dpon gyis de dag la nye bar sbyor ba re re zhes len 'debs so //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis de dag la nye bar sbyor ba re re zhes len 'debs so //
translated: The Master replies, “Each of them is applied to them.”

original: nub pa thogs pa med pa'i mig la sogs pa skad cig re re zhing nye bar sbyor ba dang nye bar sbyor ba la phan 'dogs par bya ba mig gi rnam par shes pa la skad cig dang skad cig la rang bzhin gzhan skye ba'i rgyu'i phyir /
analyzed: nub pa thogs pa med pa'i mig la sogs pa skad cig re re zhing nye bar sbyor ba dang nye bar sbyor ba la phan 'dogs par bya ba mig gi rnam par shes pa la skad cig dang skad cig la rang bzhin gzhan skye ba'i rgyu'i phyir /
translated: The eye and so on that are unimpeded in their engagement with objects are the cause of the momentary arising of a different nature in the eye consciousness that is to be benefited and that is engaged with or engaged in the act of being benefited.

original: de ltar de 'dus pa 'am rim gyis nye bar sbyor ba mig la sogs pa rnams cig car ram cig car ma yin yang rung ste /
analyzed: de ltar de 'dus pa 'am rim gyis nye bar sbyor ba mig la sogs pa rnams cig car ram cig car ma yin yang rung ste /
translated: Thus, whether the eye and so on are engaged with objects simultaneously or not,

original: khyad par med par rang bzhin du mar gyur pa'i phan par byed pa nyid sgrub par byed pa 'di yin gyi /
analyzed: khyad par med par rang bzhin du mar gyur pa'i phan par byed pa nyid sgrub par byed pa 'di yin gyi /
translated: this is the proof of their nature as multiple entities that are not different in their function of benefiting.

original: dus gcig tu du ma'i phan pa sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dus gcig tu du ma'i phan pa sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But they are not the proof of their function of benefiting many at one time.

original: 'dir rnam par shes pa sngon po'i rnam pa dang / rtogs pa'i rang bzhin dang / gzugs 'dzin par nges pa nyid du skye ba de'i phyir skad cig gcig nyid la /
analyzed: 'dir rnam par shes pa sngon po'i rnam pa dang / rtogs pa'i rang bzhin dang / gzugs 'dzin par nges pa nyid du skye ba de'i phyir skad cig gcig nyid la /
translated: Here, consciousness arises with the aspect of blue, the nature of realization, and the certainty of apprehending form. Therefore, in one moment,

original: mig la sogs pa du ma'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i phan 'dogs par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa du ma'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i phan 'dogs par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di ni ma yin te /
translated: But this is not the meaning of the statement, “The eye and so on are the benefactors that have a multiple nature.”

original: gang gi phyir rang bzhin du ma nyid ni rnam par shes pa gcig la sgro btags pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rang bzhin du ma nyid ni rnam par shes pa gcig la sgro btags pa yin te /
translated: Because the multiple nature is imputed to a single consciousness.

original: des na 'di 'dra ba'i 'dus pa gzhan gyi don byed pa ni dngos po pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na 'di 'dra ba'i 'dus pa gzhan gyi don byed pa ni dngos po pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, such an assembly that performs a benefit is not a real thing.

original: 'di ni 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: But this is not accepted.

original: dus gcig tu rang bzhin du ma grub par byed pa ni ma yin no zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: dus gcig tu rang bzhin du ma grub par byed pa ni ma yin no zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
translated: It is not that a multiple nature is produced at one time.🔽This is what was explained.

original: gang gi phyir nye bar sbyor ba re re zhing rang bzhin gzhan skye ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di ni gtan tshigs yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir nye bar sbyor ba re re zhing rang bzhin gzhan skye ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di ni gtan tshigs yin la /
translated: The statement, “Because each application produces a different nature,” is the reason.

original: rang bzhin du ma'i phan pa sgrub par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rang bzhin du ma'i phan pa sgrub par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: It is the multiple nature that accomplishes the benefit.

original: dus gcig tu du ma'i phan pa sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di bsgrub bya'i gzhung yin pa dang // bsdu ba'i don nam smos pa yang med pa de'i phyir gzhung snga mar ni chos du ma byed par bshad la /
analyzed: dus gcig tu du ma'i phan pa sgrub par byed pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di bsgrub bya'i gzhung yin pa dang // bsdu ba'i don nam smos pa yang med pa de'i phyir gzhung snga mar ni chos du ma byed par bshad la /
translated: Since the meaning of the treatise is not stated, it is suspected that in the former passage many phenomena are explained to be created,🔽but in the latter passage it is explained that they are not created gradually.

original: phyi mar ni rim gyis rang bzhin du ma byed par bshad pa yin no zhes bya bar dogs pa de yang legs pa ma @152a * //
analyzed: phyi mar ni rim gyis rang bzhin du ma byed par bshad pa yin no zhes bya bar dogs pa de yang legs pa ma @152a * //
translated: But that is not good.

original: yin no // de lta na yang snga ma nyid kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no //
analyzed: yin no // de lta na yang snga ma nyid kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no //
translated: Even so, the former is faultless.

original: 'di snyam du don gang la mig la sogs pas rim gyis phan pa byas pa de las phan pa don gzhan byed pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du don gang la mig la sogs pas rim gyis phan pa byas pa de las phan pa don gzhan byed pa yin te /
translated: If you think that the benefit that is created by the eye and so on in sequence is different from the benefit that is created from that,

original: des na rang bzhin gzhan byed pa ma yin no snyam na /
analyzed: des na rang bzhin gzhan byed pa ma yin no snyam na /
translated: then the eye and so on would not create another nature.

original: de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te /
translated: That is illogical.

original: phan pa don gzhan nyid yin par khas len na phan pa 'di phan gdags par bya ba de'i phan pa yin no zhes 'brel par mi 'gyur ba dang phan pa gzhan khas len na thug pa med par thal ba dang phan pa tsam byed pa yin par 'gyur
analyzed: phan pa don gzhan nyid yin par khas len na phan pa 'di phan gdags par bya ba de'i phan pa yin no zhes 'brel par mi 'gyur ba dang phan pa gzhan khas len na thug pa med par thal ba dang phan pa tsam byed pa yin par 'gyur
translated: If you accept that benefit is something else, then it will not be related to the benefit of that which is benefited, and if you accept that benefit is something else, then there will be an infinite regress, and benefit will be the mere doing of benefit.

original: ro zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: ro zhes bshad zin to //
translated: This has already been explained.

original: tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med par gnyi ga ma yin par byed pa ni cung zad kyang mi byed pa gnyis kyis cung zad kyang don med pa yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med par gnyi ga ma yin par byed pa ni cung zad kyang mi byed pa gnyis kyis cung zad kyang don med pa yin no //
translated: If it is neither different nor non-different, then it does not do anything at all, and the two are meaningless.

original: don med pa'i phyir mngon par 'dod pa'i don byed pa de'i don du sgrub par byed pa 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: don med pa'i phyir mngon par 'dod pa'i don byed pa de'i don du sgrub par byed pa 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Because it is meaningless, it is contradictory to establish it for the sake of the intended purpose of doing benefit.

original: de'i phyir mig la sogs pa phan 'dogs pa ni khyad par skyed pa nyid kyis phan 'dogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir mig la sogs pa phan 'dogs pa ni khyad par skyed pa nyid kyis phan 'dogs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the benefit of the eye, etc. is benefit by the mere production of a special state.

original: khyad par skyed pa de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par skyed pa de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that production of a special state?

original: nye bar sbyor ba so so la ngo bo nyid du mar gyur pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar sbyor ba so so la ngo bo nyid du mar gyur pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the many individual natures of application.

original: khyad par skyed pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs de bas na rang bzhin du mar gyur pa'i phyir khyab pa grub pas 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: khyad par skyed pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs de bas na rang bzhin du mar gyur pa'i phyir khyab pa grub pas 'gal ba yin no //
translated: In particular, the reason of production is contradictory because the pervasion is established by the fact that it has a nature that is multiple.

original: tshig le'ur byas par smos pa'i ngang gi sgras don gang bsdus pa de bshad pa ni gnyis las gcig ma grub la /
analyzed: tshig le'ur byas par smos pa'i ngang gi sgras don gang bsdus pa de bshad pa ni gnyis las gcig ma grub la /
translated: The meaning that is included by the word “only” in the verse is explained as follows: If one of the two is not established,

original: gzhan la the tshom za na 'khrul pa can nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan la the tshom za na 'khrul pa can nyid do //
translated: and there is doubt about the other, then it is mistaken.

original: dper brjod pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba 'am zhes bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: dper brjod pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba 'am zhes bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: The example is “one who is free from attachment” and “omniscient,” which are the probandum.

original: smra ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: smra ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
translated: “Because he speaks” is the reason.

original: dpe ni 'dod pa'i skyes bu yin te /
analyzed: dpe ni 'dod pa'i skyes bu yin te /
translated: The example is “a man who desires.”

original: des na smra ba po de nyid dper 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na smra ba po de nyid dper 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, that speaker himself becomes the example.

original: smra ba po de bdag nyid thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa la smra ba mthong pa de'i phyir gtan tshigs 'di la ldog pa ma grub pa /
analyzed: smra ba po de bdag nyid thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa la smra ba mthong pa de'i phyir gtan tshigs 'di la ldog pa ma grub pa /
translated: Because that speaker is seen to speak while not being omniscient himself and while possessing attachment and so on, this reason is not established as excluding the opposite.

original: rjes su 'gro ba la ni the tshom za ba yin no /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba la ni the tshom za ba yin no /
translated: but he is in doubt about the concomitance.

original: rgyu bshad pa ni sems kyi khyad par thams cad mkhyen pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba la bskal pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rgyu bshad pa ni sems kyi khyad par thams cad mkhyen pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba la bskal pa'i phyir te /
translated: The reason is stated: because the difference of mind is known to be free from attachment,

original: de la tshig la sogs pa yod pa'am med pa nyid du the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la tshig la sogs pa yod pa'am med pa nyid du the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because he is in doubt about the existence or nonexistence of the words, etc.

original: gnyis la the tshom za ba yin na 'khrul pa can de ma nges pa yin no //
analyzed: gnyis la the tshom za ba yin na 'khrul pa can de ma nges pa yin no //
translated: If he is in doubt about the two, then the error is that the reason is not ascertained.

original: 'dir gnyis @152b zhes bya ba med pa yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir gnyis @152b zhes bya ba med pa yin nam zhe na /
translated: Here, the two do not exist.

original: gnyis zhes snyegs so zhes smos te /
analyzed: gnyis zhes snyegs so zhes smos te /
translated: The two are referred to.🔽If the two are not established, then the two in the context of the contradiction are referred to here.

original: gnyis ma grub na 'gal ba dang zhes bya ba'i skabs kyi gnyis zhes bya ba de 'dir ltos par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnyis ma grub na 'gal ba dang zhes bya ba'i skabs kyi gnyis zhes bya ba de 'dir ltos par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they should be considered.

original: phyogs kyi chos gang la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog par the tshom za ba de yang ma nges pa yin no //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos gang la rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog par the tshom za ba de yang ma nges pa yin no //
translated: The property of the position is stated: that about which there is doubt as to whether there is concomitance or nonconcomitance is also not ascertained.

original: dper brjod pa smras pa ni dper na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dper brjod pa smras pa ni dper na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The example is stated: for example.

original: gson po'i lus ni zhes bya ba ni chos can te /
analyzed: gson po'i lus ni zhes bya ba ni chos can te /
translated: The living body is the subject.

original: shi ba'i lus la bdag yod par mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shi ba'i lus la bdag yod par mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not accepted that the dead body has a self.

original: bdag dang bcas pa yin te zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bdag dang bcas pa yin te zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: It has a self is what is to be proven.

original: srog la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: srog la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
translated: Because it possesses life and so on is the reason.

original: 'di rgyu gnyis kyis rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa la the tshom za ba the tshom gyi rgyur 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di rgyu gnyis kyis rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa la the tshom za ba the tshom gyi rgyur 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: This is a reason that creates doubt about the pervasion and counter-pervasion.

original: bye brag gang dag la gtan tshigs the tshom za ba de dag gis dngos po thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir dang / de dag las gcig la yang nges pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa'o //
analyzed: bye brag gang dag la gtan tshigs the tshom za ba de dag gis dngos po thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir dang / de dag las gcig la yang nges pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa'o //
