original: bltar rung ba'i bdag nyid kyang tha dad ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽de ni bltar rung ba dang mi rung ba ma yin la /
analyzed: bltar rung ba'i bdag nyid kyang tha dad ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro // de ni bltar rung ba dang mi rung ba ma yin la /
translated: it is not different because it is visible.🔽It is not visible or invisible.

original: gang du lan cig ma yin par mthong ba de yang dmigs ba med do //🔽'o na rang gi rten dang dbang po 'brel ba @171a * //
analyzed: gang du lan cig ma yin par mthong ba de yang dmigs ba med do // 'o na rang gi rten dang dbang po 'brel ba @171a * //
translated: It is not perceived as something that is seen again and again.

original: med pa'i phyir thams cad du gsal ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: med pa'i phyir thams cad du gsal ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not clear everywhere because it is not connected to its own support and the sense organ,

original: bshad pa / spyi'i rang gi brten te rang gi rten de dang dbang po 'brel pa yang tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / spyi'i rang gi brten te rang gi rten de dang dbang po 'brel pa yang tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: we reply: It is not different because it is connected to its own support and the sense organ.

original: spyi gcig yin pa'i phyir rten gcig dbang po dang 'brel ba yin na gang du yang rten dbang po de dang ma 'brel par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spyi gcig yin pa'i phyir rten gcig dbang po dang 'brel ba yin na gang du yang rten dbang po de dang ma 'brel par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Because they are the same in general, if one basis is related to a sense faculty, it cannot be that anywhere it is not related to that sense faculty.

original: de lta na ni 'o na rang bzhin ci srid rten dang 'brel pa de srid nyid dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na rang bzhin ci srid rten dang 'brel pa de srid nyid dmigs pa yin te /
translated: If that is so, then the object is only that which is related to a basis for as long as it has a nature.

original: des na thams cad du mngon par gsal ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na thams cad du mngon par gsal ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it is not manifest everywhere.🔽In response, Nāgārjuna explains:

original: bshad pa / rten dang 'du ba med pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba yang tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro ;
analyzed: bshad pa / rten dang 'du ba med pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba yang tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro ;
translated: Because it is not different from that which lacks a nature that is not related to a basis.

original: gcig po de la rang gi rten dang 'du ba'i rang bzhin mi 'du ba'i rang bzhin ni med do //
analyzed: gcig po de la rang gi rten dang 'du ba'i rang bzhin mi 'du ba'i rang bzhin ni med do //
translated: In that single thing, the nature that is related to its own basis is not a nature that is not related.

original: 'di snyam du spyi dang yul mtshungs pa'i spyi'i rten dbang po dang sbyor ba la ltos te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du spyi dang yul mtshungs pa'i spyi'i rten dbang po dang sbyor ba la ltos te /
translated: If you think that the object of a sense consciousness is a universal, and the basis of a universal that is similar to its object is related to a sense faculty,

original: spyi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: spyi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: then a universal is an object of observation.

original: spyi ni gang na bdag nyid dang mtshungs pa'i rten dbang po dang sbyor ba yod pa der gsal bar 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: spyi ni gang na bdag nyid dang mtshungs pa'i rten dbang po dang sbyor ba yod pa der gsal bar 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: If a universal becomes manifest in that which has a basis that is similar to itself and is related to a sense faculty,🔽then it is not tenable that a universal is not manifest everywhere.

original: gsal ba'i bar dag na ni dbang po dang ldan pa'i rten yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gsal ba'i bar dag na ni dbang po dang ldan pa'i rten yod pa ma yin te /
translated: But in the interval between the clear and unclear cognitions, there is no basis that possesses the sense faculty.

original: de'i phyir der spyi dmigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir der spyi dmigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the universal is not observed there.

original: gal te de lta na spyi 'di rten dang yul mtshungs pa'i rang bzhin dang / rten dang yul mi mtshungs pa'i rang bzhin du thal la ;
analyzed: gal te de lta na spyi 'di rten dang yul mtshungs pa'i rang bzhin dang / rten dang yul mi mtshungs pa'i rang bzhin du thal la ;
translated: If that is so, then it follows that this universal has a nature that is the same as its basis and object, and a nature that is not the same as its basis and object.

original: 'gal ba'i chos dag la tha dad pa med par 'gal lo //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i chos dag la tha dad pa med par 'gal lo //
translated: It is contradictory for things that are mutually exclusive to be not different.

original: de bzhin du bltar rung ba dang mi rung ba nyid la sogs pa sngar brjod pa thams cad du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du bltar rung ba dang mi rung ba nyid la sogs pa sngar brjod pa thams cad du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, it follows that all the previously mentioned attributes, such as being visible or not visible, would also be contradictory.

original: rten gyi dbang gis bltar rung ba dang mi rung ba'i bdag nyid ni gcig par 'gal lo zhes bstan nas /
analyzed: rten gyi dbang gis bltar rung ba dang mi rung ba'i bdag nyid ni gcig par 'gal lo zhes bstan nas /
translated: Having shown that it is contradictory for something to be both visible and not visible due to the power of its basis,

original: mjug sdud par byed pa ni de bas na mi dmigs pa 'di 'dra ba 'di dang / sngar bshad pa'i rang bzhin ni phan tshun 'gal ba'i don bsgrub pa yin la /
analyzed: mjug sdud par byed pa ni de bas na mi dmigs pa 'di 'dra ba 'di dang / sngar bshad pa'i rang bzhin ni phan tshun 'gal ba'i don bsgrub pa yin la /
translated: he concludes, Therefore, this kind of nonobservation and the nature explained earlier establish mutually exclusive meanings.

original: gcig la 'gal ba'i chos 'du bar yang mi 'thad pa des na /
analyzed: gcig la 'gal ba'i chos 'du bar yang mi 'thad pa des na /
translated: It is not tenable for contradictory attributes to be present in a single thing.

original: 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can dag ni the tshom skyed par byed do //
analyzed: 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can dag ni the tshom skyed par byed do //
translated: Contradictory and non-erroneous [reasons] generate doubt.

original: gal te ma mthong ba dang cig car mngon par 'brel ba dag ma khyab pa dang / thams cad du song ba 'gal ba gnyis kyis khyab pa ni dngos po la 'gal ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te ma mthong ba dang cig car mngon par 'brel ba dag ma khyab pa dang / thams cad du song ba 'gal ba gnyis kyis khyab pa ni dngos po la 'gal ba ma yin nam /
translated: If non-observation and simultaneous connection are not pervasives, and the two pervasives, non-connection and going everywhere, are contradictory, are they not contradictory in reality?

original: de ci'i phyir bstan bcos byed pas smras pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir bstan bcos byed pas smras pa yin zhe na /
translated: Why did the author of the treatise say that?

original: bshad pa / de dag dngos su 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ma dmigs @171b pa dang / thams cad dang 'brel pa can dag gis 'gal ba ma khyab pa dang / thams cad du song ba dag med na mi 'byung ba nyid ma mthong bas chos de gnyis bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa / de dag dngos su 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ma dmigs @171b pa dang / thams cad dang 'brel pa can dag gis 'gal ba ma khyab pa dang / thams cad du song ba dag med na mi 'byung ba nyid ma mthong bas chos de gnyis bshad pa yin te /
translated: It is explained: Because those two are not directly contradictory, non-observation and connection with everything are not pervasives, and going everywhere is not seen to be a necessary consequence, those two phenomena are explained.

original: des na 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa can srid do //
analyzed: des na 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa can srid do //
translated: Therefore, it is possible for contradictory and non-erroneous [reasons] to exist.

original: dngos po dang 'brel pa'i rjes su dpag pa la ni tshul 'di ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po dang 'brel pa'i rjes su dpag pa la ni tshul 'di ma yin te /
translated: This method does not apply to inference related to reality.

original: gang gi phyir deng ni tshad mas grub pa'i chos gzung bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir deng ni tshad mas grub pa'i chos gzung bar bya ba yin no //
translated: Because now, the established phenomena by valid cognition are to be apprehended.

original: ci ltar 'gal ba'i dngos po dag gcig la mi srid pa de bzhin du de dag gis khyab pa dag kyang gcig la mi srid pa de yin pa de'i phyir 'ga' bas khyab pa de dag gcig la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ci ltar 'gal ba'i dngos po dag gcig la mi srid pa de bzhin du de dag gis khyab pa dag kyang gcig la mi srid pa de yin pa de'i phyir 'ga' bas khyab pa de dag gcig la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Just as contradictory things cannot occur in one place, so too the pervasions by those cannot occur in one place. Therefore, those pervasions do not exist in one place.

original: des na 'dir dngos po dang 'brel pa'i rjes su dpag pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na 'dir dngos po dang 'brel pa'i rjes su dpag pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, here it is not an inference related to a thing.

original: de bas na 'gal ba ni mi 'khrul pa can 'di ni khas blangs pa'i stobs kyis 'jug pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de bas na 'gal ba ni mi 'khrul pa can 'di ni khas blangs pa'i stobs kyis 'jug pa yin gyi /
translated: Thus contradiction is nonerroneous. It is engaged by the power of assertion.

original: dngos po la brten pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po la brten pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not based on things.

original: 'o na ji ltar byas pa nyid 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa can gyi dper brjod ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar byas pa nyid 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa can gyi dper brjod ce na /
translated: Well then, how is it that “being produced” is an example of nonerroneous contradiction?

original: phyogs tsam zhig bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs tsam zhig bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is merely an illustration.

original: gal te byas pa nyid lung las grub pa gzung ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te byas pa nyid lung las grub pa gzung ba yin na /
translated: If “being produced” were accepted as established by scripture,

original: de sgra nyid bzhin du dper brjod pa'i phyir 'di ni phyogs tsam yin no //
analyzed: de sgra nyid bzhin du dper brjod pa'i phyir 'di ni phyogs tsam yin no //
translated: then it would be an example like “sound” itself. Therefore this is merely an illustration.

original: sgra rtag ste mnyan bya yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba 'di la ni tshad ma can ma yin pa'i dngos po gsum ste /
analyzed: sgra rtag ste mnyan bya yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba 'di la ni tshad ma can ma yin pa'i dngos po gsum ste /
translated: In the syllogism, “Sound is permanent because of being audible,” there are three non-quantified entities.

original: sgra las tha dad pa'i sgra nyid dang / dbang pos rtogs par bya ba dar /
analyzed: sgra las tha dad pa'i sgra nyid dang / dbang pos rtogs par bya ba dar /
translated: Sound is different from sound, it is an object of the sense faculties,

original: rtag pa ste /
analyzed: rtag pa ste /
translated: and it is permanent.

original: tshad ma can ma yin pa gsum po de las sgra rtag ste mnyan bya yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tshad ma 'di 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma can ma yin pa gsum po de las sgra rtag ste mnyan bya yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tshad ma 'di 'jug pa yin no //
translated: This syllogism, “Sound is permanent because of being audible,” is based on these three non-quantified entities.🔽Therefore, although it is presented, it does not contradict the quantified trimodal evidence of being a product.

original: de'i phyir nye bar bkod kyang 'di ni tshad mas grub pa'i tshul gsum pa byas pa nyid kyis gegs byed pa ma yin no byas pa nyid nye bar 'god pa'i skabs su ni 'di srid pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir nye bar bkod kyang 'di ni tshad mas grub pa'i tshul gsum pa byas pa nyid kyis gegs byed pa ma yin no byas pa nyid nye bar 'god pa'i skabs su ni 'di srid pa yang ma yin no //
translated: This is not possible in the context of presenting being a product as the reason.

original: gang gi phyir 'di lung la brten pa dang / dngos pos byas pa nye bar 'god pa ni lung la brten pa ma yin pa'i phyir lung nye bar dgod pa mi rigs pa de'i phyir gang gis byas pa nyid gegs byed par 'gyur ba 'di ga la srid /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di lung la brten pa dang / dngos pos byas pa nye bar 'god pa ni lung la brten pa ma yin pa'i phyir lung nye bar dgod pa mi rigs pa de'i phyir gang gis byas pa nyid gegs byed par 'gyur ba 'di ga la srid /
translated: Because this is based on scripture and because the establishment of what is done by an entity is not based on scripture, it is not reasonable to cite scripture. Therefore, how could it be possible that what is done by an entity would be an obstruction?

original: sgra nyid ci skad bshad pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa tshad mas grub pa de lta na yang /
analyzed: sgra nyid ci skad bshad pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa tshad mas grub pa de lta na yang /
translated: Even though sound itself is established by valid cognition as possessing the qualities that are explained,

original: mnyan bya nyid dang bsgrub par bya ba rtag par bya ba ni 'brel pa ni 'brel pa yin te /
analyzed: mnyan bya nyid dang bsgrub par bya ba rtag par bya ba ni 'brel pa ni 'brel pa yin te /
translated: it is still necessary to prove that what is heard is permanent.

original: 'ba' zhig tu ni lhan cig pa tsam gyis ni gang mnyan bya de ni rtag pa nyid do @172a * //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig tu ni lhan cig pa tsam gyis ni gang mnyan bya de ni rtag pa nyid do @172a * //
translated: But merely by the mere simultaneity of the two, it is not established that what is heard is permanent.

original: zhes de dag de ltar mi 'khrul pa can du mi 'grub po //
analyzed: zhes de dag de ltar mi 'khrul pa can du mi 'grub po //
translated: Thus, they are not established as being non-erroneous in that way.

original: des na mnyan bya nyid ni byas pa'i gegs byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'di ni phyogs tsam yin no //
analyzed: des na mnyan bya nyid ni byas pa'i gegs byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'di ni phyogs tsam yin no //
translated: Therefore, since what is heard is not an obstruction to what is done, this is merely a partial position.

original: de'i phyir de ltar le'u gnyis par gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'di ni sbyor pa dang / gtan tshigs ltar snang ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid bshad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar le'u gnyis par gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'di ni sbyor pa dang / gtan tshigs ltar snang ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid bshad do //
translated: Therefore, the characteristics of reasons and the formulations of reasons and the characteristics of fallacious reasons are explained in the second chapter.

original: de la gtan tshigs kyi sbyor ba dpe dang bcas pa nyid yin pa des na ci ltar dpe'i mtshan nyid mi brjod ce na /
analyzed: de la gtan tshigs kyi sbyor ba dpe dang bcas pa nyid yin pa des na ci ltar dpe'i mtshan nyid mi brjod ce na /
translated: If the formulation of a reason must be accompanied by an example, why is the definition of an example not stated?

original: bshad pa / gtan tshigs mtshan nyid gsum yin phyir //
analyzed: bshad pa / gtan tshigs mtshan nyid gsum yin phyir //
translated: Response: Because a reason has three characteristics,

original: dpe ni gtan tshigs las logs shig brjod bya min /
analyzed: dpe ni gtan tshigs las logs shig brjod bya min /
translated: an example is not a separate object of expression from a reason.

original: gal te gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid gsum min mod /
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid gsum min mod /
translated: If a reason does not have three characteristics,

original: dpe go ci ste mi brjod ce na /
analyzed: dpe go ci ste mi brjod ce na /
translated: why is an example not stated?

original: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid gsum bshad pa zhes smos so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid gsum bshad pa zhes smos so //
translated: The three characteristics of a reason are stated.

original: 'di snyam du de tsam gyis don mi rtogs pas so snyam na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du de tsam gyis don mi rtogs pas so snyam na /
translated: If you think that the meaning is not understood by just that,

original: bshad pa / de tsam gyis bsgrub bar bya ba'i don rtogs te /
analyzed: bshad pa / de tsam gyis bsgrub bar bya ba'i don rtogs te /
translated: Response: The meaning of the probandum is understood by just that.

original: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir dpe zhes bya ba grub pa'i yan lag gzhan ni yod pa ma yin ba gang yin pa des na dpe de'i mtshan nyid logs shig tu ma bshad de /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir dpe zhes bya ba grub pa'i yan lag gzhan ni yod pa ma yin ba gang yin pa des na dpe de'i mtshan nyid logs shig tu ma bshad de /
translated: Because that is so, there is no other member called “example.” Therefore, the definition of the example is not explained separately.

original: sgrub pa'i yan lag gzhan med mod /
analyzed: sgrub pa'i yan lag gzhan med mod /
translated: Although there is no other member of proof,

original: gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro ldog sgrub par byed pa gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma de ni dpe la brten bar bshad de /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi rjes su 'gro ldog sgrub par byed pa gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma de ni dpe la brten bar bshad de /
translated: the proof of the forward and reverse pervasion of the reason is explained as depending on the example, and that is the means of refutation.

original: des na de'i mtshan nyid logs su bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: des na de'i mtshan nyid logs su bshad par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, its definition should be explained separately.

original: zhe na brjod par mi bya ste /
analyzed: zhe na brjod par mi bya ste /
translated: We reply: Do not say that,

original: dpe brjod pa'i 'bras bu ni grub zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe brjod pa'i 'bras bu ni grub zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the purpose of stating the example is already established.

original: dpe de kho na nyid ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid shes pa nyid kyis shes la /
analyzed: dpe de kho na nyid ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid shes pa nyid kyis shes la /
translated: The reality of the example is known just by knowing the definition of the reason.

original: mtshan nyid brjod pa'i dgos pa yang de kho na shes pa yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid brjod pa'i dgos pa yang de kho na shes pa yin no //
translated: And the purpose of stating the definition is just to know that.

original: ci ltar gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid las dpe shes ba de ltar bstan pa'i phyir bshad ba /
analyzed: ci ltar gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid las dpe shes ba de ltar bstan pa'i phyir bshad ba /
translated: In order to show how the example is known from the definition of the reason, it is said:

original: gtan tshigs ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la yod pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad las ldog pa'i tshul du bye brag med par bshad la /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la yod pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad las ldog pa'i tshul du bye brag med par bshad la /
translated: The reason is explained as being in the discordant side and as being in the manner of being the opposite of all discordant sides.

original: nges pa na yang gsal ba'i bye brag la khyad bar can du 'gyur ba yin pas /
analyzed: nges pa na yang gsal ba'i bye brag la khyad bar can du 'gyur ba yin pas /
translated: And when it is ascertained, it becomes a distinctive feature of the particular instance.

original: des na 'bras bu bsgrub par bya ba las skye ba dang / rang bzhin bsgrub bar bya ba sgrub par byed pa tsam gyis rjes su 'brel pa'i khyad par can gyi tshul du bstan bar bya bar bshad do //
analyzed: des na 'bras bu bsgrub par bya ba las skye ba dang / rang bzhin bsgrub bar bya ba sgrub par byed pa tsam gyis rjes su 'brel pa'i khyad par can gyi tshul du bstan bar bya bar bshad do //
translated: Therefore, it is explained that the reason is to be taught in the manner of a distinctive relation, by merely establishing the effect to be proven and the nature to be proven.

original: de lta ma yin na spyi bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //🔽thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i tshul de yang gang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa rjes su 'gro ba'i @172b ngag gam /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na spyi bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir ro // thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i tshul de yang gang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa rjes su 'gro ba'i @172b ngag gam /
translated: If it were not so, the universal could not be taught.🔽That common and uncommon manner is also taught by the statement “wherever” and so on, which is a statement of concomitance.

original: ldog pa'i ngag gis ston par byed pas tshang mang dang gzhan ba dag gam /
analyzed: ldog pa'i ngag gis ston par byed pas tshang mang dang gzhan ba dag gam /
translated: Or it is taught by the statement “whatever is not,” which is a statement of the reverse.

original: bum pa dang nam mkha' dag bstan par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: bum pa dang nam mkha' dag bstan par bya ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, the kitchen and the non-kitchen, or the pot and space, are to be taught.

original: gang du mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa'i sgrub par byed pa can rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po gnas ba tshang mang la sogs pa de ni mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa'i tshad ma'i yul du bstan par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gang du mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa'i sgrub par byed pa can rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po gnas ba tshang mang la sogs pa de ni mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa'i tshad ma'i yul du bstan par bya ba yin te /
translated: Where there is a basis for the establishment of perception and non-perception, the existence of cause and effect, such as a kitchen, that is to be taught as the domain of valid cognition of perception and non-perception.

original: de lta ma yin na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rgyu mtshan 'brel ba nyid mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rgyu mtshan 'brel ba nyid mi 'grub bo //
translated: Otherwise, the reason of positive and negative concomitance would not be established as the relation itself.

original: ldog pa'i ngag la yang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos bo nyid kyis me log na du ba ldog pa'i yul gzhan mtshe'u chen po la sogs pa yang bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: ldog pa'i ngag la yang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos bo nyid kyis me log na du ba ldog pa'i yul gzhan mtshe'u chen po la sogs pa yang bstan par bya'o //
translated: In the case of negative concomitance, when the effect is absent, the cause is also absent. The domain of the absence of smoke due to the absence of fire is to be taught as a great lake and so on.

original: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi dngos po thams cad kyi yul can gnod par byed pa'i tshad mas rang gi bsgrub byas khyab par bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi dngos po thams cad kyi yul can gnod par byed pa'i tshad mas rang gi bsgrub byas khyab par bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: In the case of a reason of nature, the domain of all things is to be established as pervaded by the probandum by a valid cognition that contradicts it.

original: des na de dag gi nang nas bum pa la sogs pa'i chos can gang yang rung ste /
analyzed: des na de dag gi nang nas bum pa la sogs pa'i chos can gang yang rung ste /
translated: Therefore, any subject such as a pot, from among those,

original: gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma'i yul nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma'i yul nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir bstan par bya'o //
translated: The object of the valid cognition that refutes is indicated.

original: de'i bdag nyid yin pa nyid kyis mi rtag pa log na byas pa ldog pa'i yul nam mkha' la sogs par bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid yin pa nyid kyis mi rtag pa log na byas pa ldog pa'i yul nam mkha' la sogs par bstan par bya'o //
translated: If impermanence is refuted because of being of the same nature, the object of the refutation of being produced is indicated to be space and so on.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni 'brel ba sgrub byed kyi tshad ma'i yul rab tu ma bstan na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni 'brel ba sgrub byed kyi tshad ma'i yul rab tu ma bstan na /
translated: Otherwise, if the object of the valid cognition that proves the relation is not indicated,

original: mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag la yod pa dang med pa dag bstan par mi nus te ;
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag la yod pa dang med pa dag bstan par mi nus te ;
translated: then it is not possible to indicate the presence and absence in the similar and dissimilar classes,

original: khyad par ma rtogs par spyi mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par ma rtogs par spyi mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the universal is not understood without understanding the particular.

original: bsgrub bya'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin rang gi bsgrub bya la nges pa'i 'bras bu'am rang gi bsgrub bya'i rang gi ngo bos khyab pa yang bstan par mi nus te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin rang gi bsgrub bya la nges pa'i 'bras bu'am rang gi bsgrub bya'i rang gi ngo bos khyab pa yang bstan par mi nus te /
translated: It is also not possible to indicate the result that is the nature of the object of affirmation as ascertained with respect to its object of affirmation, or the pervasion by the nature of the object of affirmation,

original: 'brel pa sgrub byed kyi tshad ma rab tu ma bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa sgrub byed kyi tshad ma rab tu ma bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the valid cognition that proves the relation is not indicated.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the problem with that?

original: des na spyi dang khyad par gyi rang bzhin gyi don bstan par bya ba 'di bstan na yang dpe bstan pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na spyi dang khyad par gyi rang bzhin gyi don bstan par bya ba 'di bstan na yang dpe bstan pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, even if this topic of the nature of the general and particular is taught, it would be merely an example.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir dpe'i tshul ni 'di tsam du zad pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dpe'i tshul ni 'di tsam du zad pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the method of example is just this much.

original: spyi dang khyad par gyi mtshan nyid bsgrub pa'i rang bzhin du zad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi dang khyad par gyi mtshan nyid bsgrub pa'i rang bzhin du zad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is just the nature of establishing the characteristics of the general and particular.

original: spyi dang khyad par gyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba ston par nus pa'i don gang yin pa de nyid ni dpe yin no //
analyzed: spyi dang khyad par gyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba ston par nus pa'i don gang yin pa de nyid ni dpe yin no //
translated: That which is able to teach the topic to be taught, the characteristics of the general and particular, is itself the example.

original: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid bsgrub pa'i yul dpe 'dis ni dpe ltar snang ba yang gsal ba yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid bsgrub pa'i yul dpe 'dis ni dpe ltar snang ba yang gsal ba yin te /
translated: This example, the object of establishing the definition of a reason, also clarifies the semblance of an example.

original: gtan tshigs kyi khyab pa bsgrub pa'i phyir nye bar bkod pa der mi nus pa ni dpe ltar snang ba'o zhes don @173a * //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi khyab pa bsgrub pa'i phyir nye bar bkod pa der mi nus pa ni dpe ltar snang ba'o zhes don @173a * //
translated: That which is unable to establish the pervasion of the reason when it is presented there is a semblance of an example.

original: gyis bshad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gyis bshad par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is explained by the meaning.

original: dpe'i nyes pa de dag nyid dper brjod pa'i phyir bshad pa ni /
analyzed: dpe'i nyes pa de dag nyid dper brjod pa'i phyir bshad pa ni /
translated: In order to illustrate those very faults of the example, it is explained:

original: dper na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: For example.

original: sgra rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin zhing /
analyzed: sgra rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin zhing /
translated: Sound is the object to be established as permanent.

original: lus can ma yin pa gtan tshigs su bkod pa na /
analyzed: lus can ma yin pa gtan tshigs su bkod pa na /
translated: Non-embodiment is the reason.

original: las dang rdul phra rab dang bum pa rnams bsgrub par bya ba la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag gis stong pa yin no //
analyzed: las dang rdul phra rab dang bum pa rnams bsgrub par bya ba la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag gis stong pa yin no //
translated: It is empty of all those things that are the object to be established, such as action, atoms, and pots.

original: las ni bsgrub par bya ba rtag pas stong pa yin no //
analyzed: las ni bsgrub par bya ba rtag pas stong pa yin no //
translated: Action is empty of the object to be established, permanence.

original: rdul phra rab ni sgrub par byed pas stong pa ste /
analyzed: rdul phra rab ni sgrub par byed pas stong pa ste /
translated: Atoms are empty of the proof.

original: lus can rdzas thams cad du song ba ma yin pa'i tshad ni rdul phra rab la yod de /
analyzed: lus can rdzas thams cad du song ba ma yin pa'i tshad ni rdul phra rab la yod de /
translated: The measure of non-embodiment, which is the absence of all substantial embodiment, exists in atoms.

original: lus can ma yin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: lus can ma yin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But non-embodiment does not.

original: bum pa ni mi rtag pa dang lus can yin pa des na gnyis kas stong pa yin no //
analyzed: bum pa ni mi rtag pa dang lus can yin pa des na gnyis kas stong pa yin no //
translated: A pot is empty of both, because it is impermanent and embodied.

original: the tshom za ba yang bsgrub bar bya ba la sogs pa nyid la the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: the tshom za ba yang bsgrub bar bya ba la sogs pa nyid la the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Doubt is also empty of the object to be established, because it is doubtful.

original: dper brjod pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan par bsgrub par bya zhing /
analyzed: dper brjod pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan par bsgrub par bya zhing /
translated: An example is the establishment of being endowed with attachment, etc.

original: gtan tshigs smra ba la sogs pa la lam po che'i mi ni bsgrub bya'i chos la the tshom za ba yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs smra ba la sogs pa la lam po che'i mi ni bsgrub bya'i chos la the tshom za ba yin no //
translated: The man on the road is in doubt about the property to be established.

original: 'chi ba'i chos can du bsgrub pa la ni lam po che'i mi la 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid du the tshom za ba yin no //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i chos can du bsgrub pa la ni lam po che'i mi la 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid du the tshom za ba yin no //
translated: In the proof of being a mortal as the reason, the man on the road is in doubt about being endowed with attachment, etc.

original: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa gtan tshigs su byas pa la ni lam po che'i mi gnyi ga la the tshom za ba yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa gtan tshigs su byas pa la ni lam po che'i mi gnyi ga la the tshom za ba yin no //
translated: In the same way, in the proof of being non-omniscient, attachment, etc. are the reason, and the man on the road is in doubt about both.

original: de bzhin du rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i dpe dang rjes su 'gro ba yod kyang gang la skyes bus rjes su 'gro ba ma bstan pa de ni rjes su 'gro ba ma bstan pa'i dpe'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i dpe dang rjes su 'gro ba yod kyang gang la skyes bus rjes su 'gro ba ma bstan pa de ni rjes su 'gro ba ma bstan pa'i dpe'o //
translated: In the same way, an example that does not have concomitance is an example that does not show concomitance, even though it has concomitance, where the person does not show the concomitance.

original: rjes su 'gro ba med pa dper brjod pa ni dper na gang cung zad smra ba de ni 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa ste zhes khyad par bstan pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i mi dper byas pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba med pa dper brjod pa ni dper na gang cung zad smra ba de ni 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa ste zhes khyad par bstan pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i mi dper byas pa'o //
translated: The example of non-pervasion is like the example of a man of desire, which is given to show the distinction, “Whatever speaks is endowed with desire, etc.”

original: gal te bdag rang nyid la smra ba nyid dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid mthong ba de lta na yang 'dir don thams cad nye bar bsdus pas rjes su 'gro ba bstan par ni mi nus pas rjes su 'gro ba med pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te bdag rang nyid la smra ba nyid dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid mthong ba de lta na yang 'dir don thams cad nye bar bsdus pas rjes su 'gro ba bstan par ni mi nus pas rjes su 'gro ba med pa yin no //
translated: Even though one sees that speaking and being endowed with desire, etc. are in oneself, still, because all the meanings are not included here, pervasion cannot be shown, so it is non-pervasion.

original: sgra mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba la dpe bum pa ni rjes su 'gro ba rab tu ma bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba la dpe bum pa ni rjes su 'gro ba rab tu ma bstan pa yin no //
translated: In the syllogism, “Sound is impermanent because of being produced,” the example, pot, is not shown to be pervaded.

original: 'dir don gang bstan pa'i phyir dpe nye bar blangs pa rjes su 'gro ba rab tu bstan bar 'gyur ba rjes su 'gro ba'i ngag sbyor ba med @173b do ;
analyzed: 'dir don gang bstan pa'i phyir dpe nye bar blangs pa rjes su 'gro ba rab tu bstan bar 'gyur ba rjes su 'gro ba'i ngag sbyor ba med @173b do ;
translated: Here, the example is cited to show the meaning, and the pervasion would be shown by the statement of the pervasion.

original: / don dam par ni rjes su 'gro ba yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: / don dam par ni rjes su 'gro ba yod pa nyid do //
translated: But ultimately, there is concomitance.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni smra ba po'i skyon yin na //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni smra ba po'i skyon yin na //
translated: Therefore, this is the fault of the speaker.

original: dpe bum pa la mi rtag pa nyid la mi 'khrul bar shes pa'i byas pa nyid las sgra mi rtag bar rtogs pa yin na /
analyzed: dpe bum pa la mi rtag pa nyid la mi 'khrul bar shes pa'i byas pa nyid las sgra mi rtag bar rtogs pa yin na /
translated: If the sound is understood to be impermanent because of being produced, like a pot, which is known to be impermanent without error,

original: 'dir ni mi rtag pa nyid la byas pa mi 'khrul par ma brjod do //
analyzed: 'dir ni mi rtag pa nyid la byas pa mi 'khrul par ma brjod do //
translated: here, it is not said that production is not in error with respect to impermanence.

original: 'on kyang ngag 'di la ni chos mthun pas byas pa'i lhan cig spyod par brjod de /
analyzed: 'on kyang ngag 'di la ni chos mthun pas byas pa'i lhan cig spyod par brjod de /
translated: But in this statement, concomitance is expressed by similarity.

original: ci ltar bum pa byas pa mi rtag pa de bzhin du sgra yang byas pa yin pas ni rtag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci ltar bum pa byas pa mi rtag pa de bzhin du sgra yang byas pa yin pas ni rtag par 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as a pot, which is produced, is impermanent, so sound, which is produced, is impermanent.

original: chos 'ga' zhig gis chos mthun pa tsam gyis ni gzhan gyi chos gzhan gyis kyang mtshungs par ni 'os pa ma yin te /
analyzed: chos 'ga' zhig gis chos mthun pa tsam gyis ni gzhan gyi chos gzhan gyis kyang mtshungs par ni 'os pa ma yin te /
translated: But it is not proper that another property of something is the same as another property of something else, just by similarity of property.

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that would lead to absurdity.

original: de bzhin du dpe gang la rjes su 'gro ba phyin ci log yod pa de ni de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dpe gang la rjes su 'gro ba phyin ci log yod pa de ni de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Similarly, an example is said to have a reversed concomitance when it is the opposite of that.

original: 'di skad gang byas pa de ni mi rtag pa nyid do zhes byas pa nyid mi rtag pa nyid la nges par bstan par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad gang byas pa de ni mi rtag pa nyid do zhes byas pa nyid mi rtag pa nyid la nges par bstan par bya ba yin te /
translated: This is what is said: “Whatever is produced is impermanent” is a statement that definitely teaches that what is produced is impermanent.

original: de lta na ni de las bsgrub bya rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni de las bsgrub bya rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, the probandum would be understood from that.

original: gang gi tshe gang mi rtag pa de ni byas pa nyid do zhes byas pa nyid la mi rtag pa nges par byas pa de'i tshe ni byas pa mi rtag pa la nges par ma brjod pa des na gzhan la yang 'jug par dogs pas go bar byed🔽par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe gang mi rtag pa de ni byas pa nyid do zhes byas pa nyid la mi rtag pa nges par byas pa de'i tshe ni byas pa mi rtag pa la nges par ma brjod pa des na gzhan la yang 'jug par dogs pas go bar byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But when “Whatever is impermanent is produced” is stated, and “Whatever is produced is impermanent” is definitely taught, then at that time, since the statement “Whatever is produced is impermanent” is not stated, it would not be understood because of the doubt that it applies to something else.

original: de'i phyir rang bzhin gang gis gtan tshigs go bar byed pa'i rang bzhin de dpes ma bstan pa'i phyir smra ba po'i nyes pas dpe skyon chags pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang bzhin gang gis gtan tshigs go bar byed pa'i rang bzhin de dpes ma bstan pa'i phyir smra ba po'i nyes pas dpe skyon chags pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, since the nature by which the reason is understood is not taught by the example, the example is faulty due to the fault of the speaker.

original: dpe skyon dgu bo 'di dag ni chos mthun pa yin no //
analyzed: dpe skyon dgu bo 'di dag ni chos mthun pa yin no //
translated: These nine faults of the example are in the case of a similar example.

original: chos mi mthun pas kyang gang rtag pa ma yin pa de ni lus can ma yin pa ma yin no zhes bsgrub bya log pas sgrub byed ldog pa la /
analyzed: chos mi mthun pas kyang gang rtag pa ma yin pa de ni lus can ma yin pa ma yin no zhes bsgrub bya log pas sgrub byed ldog pa la /
translated: By the dissimilar, the opposite of the probandum is negated by the opposite of the probans: Whatever is not permanent is not nonembodiment.

original: rdul phra rab dang las dang nam mkha'i dpe rnams ni bsgrub par bya ba la sogs pa ldog pa med pa can yin no //
analyzed: rdul phra rab dang las dang nam mkha'i dpe rnams ni bsgrub par bya ba la sogs pa ldog pa med pa can yin no //
translated: The examples of the atom, action, and space are not devoid of the opposite of the probandum, etc.

original: rdul phra rab ni rtag pas rtag pa nyid log pa med do //
analyzed: rdul phra rab ni rtag pas rtag pa nyid log pa med do //
translated: The atom is permanent, so the opposite of permanence does not exist.

original: las ni lus can ma yin pas lus can ma yin pa med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: las ni lus can ma yin pas lus can ma yin pa med pa ma yin no //
translated: Action is nonembodied, so the opposite of nonembodiment does not exist.

original: nam mkha' ni rtag pa dang lus can ma yin pas gnyi ga ldog pa med do //
analyzed: nam mkha' ni rtag pa dang lus can ma yin pas gnyi ga ldog pa med do //
translated: Space is permanent and nonembodied, so the opposite of both does not exist.

original: dpe gang la ldog pa la the tshom za ba de la sogs pa yang brjod pa ste /
analyzed: dpe gang la ldog pa la the tshom za ba de la sogs pa yang brjod pa ste /
translated: The example is doubtful when the opposite of the probans is doubtful.

original: des na rigs pa'i thigs pa ci lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: des na rigs pa'i thigs pa ci lta ba bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, it is just as in the Drop of Logic.

original: ldog pa rab tu ma bstan pa ni sgra mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir nam mkha' bzhin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ldog pa rab tu ma bstan pa ni sgra mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir nam mkha' bzhin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The probans is not well-defined when the opposite of the probandum is not taught, as in “Sound is impermanent because it is produced, like space.”

original: ldog pa phyin ci log pa ni gang ma byas pa de ni rtag pa ste /
analyzed: ldog pa phyin ci log pa ni gang ma byas pa de ni rtag pa ste /
translated: The opposite of the non-eternal is the eternal.

original: dper na nam mkha' bzhin no zhes brjod ba yin no //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha' bzhin no zhes brjod ba yin no //
translated: For example, space.

original: gang gi phyir @174a * //
analyzed: gang gi phyir @174a * //
translated: For this reason,

original: chos mi mthun pa'i dpe la ni bsgrub par bya ba log pa sgrub byed log pa la nges par bstan par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa'i dpe la ni bsgrub par bya ba log pa sgrub byed log pa la nges par bstan par bya ba yin te /
translated: in the case of a dissimilar example, the opposite of the probandum is taught to be the opposite of the proof.

original: de ltar na gang na sgrub byed yod pa der bsgrub bya 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na gang na sgrub byed yod pa der bsgrub bya 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, where there is the proof, there is the probandum.

original: 'dir gcig la ni ci ltar nam mkha' rtag bar byas pa ma yin pa de bzhin du sgra ni byas pa ma yin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir gcig la ni ci ltar nam mkha' rtag bar byas pa ma yin pa de bzhin du sgra ni byas pa ma yin pa ma yin te /
translated: Here, just as space is not made, sound is not non-made.

original: 'on kyang byas pa yin no zhes ma byas pa nyid kyis chos mi mtshungs pa tsam zhig bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang byas pa yin no zhes ma byas pa nyid kyis chos mi mtshungs pa tsam zhig bstan pa yin no //
translated: But rather, it is made. Thus, it is taught that non-making is merely a dissimilar quality.

original: chos gcig gis chos mi mthun pa tsam gyis ni chos thams cad kyi chos mi mthun par nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: chos gcig gis chos mi mthun pa tsam gyis ni chos thams cad kyi chos mi mthun par nges pa ma yin te /
translated: By merely one dissimilar quality, all qualities are not ascertained as dissimilar.

original: thams cad thams cad dang chos mthun pa dang mi mthun par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad thams cad dang chos mthun pa dang mi mthun par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all things are seen to be both similar and dissimilar to all things.

original: de'i phyir go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi ldog pas bstan pa'i phyir skyes bu'i nyes pas dpe skyon chags pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir go bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi ldog pas bstan pa'i phyir skyes bu'i nyes pas dpe skyon chags pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the fault of the example is due to the fault of the person, because the reason for understanding is taught by the contraposition.

original: gzhan la ni sgrub byed log pa bsgrub bya ldog pa la nges par bstan to //
analyzed: gzhan la ni sgrub byed log pa bsgrub bya ldog pa la nges par bstan to //
translated: In the other case, the contraposition of the probandum is definitely taught from the contraposition of the proof.

original: gang ma byas pa de ni zhes sgrub byed log pa rjes su brjod nas /
analyzed: gang ma byas pa de ni zhes sgrub byed log pa rjes su brjod nas /
translated: After repeating the contraposition of the proof, “That which is not produced,”

original: des ni rtag pa'o zhes bsgrub bya log pa bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des ni rtag pa'o zhes bsgrub bya log pa bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: he says, “It is permanent,” in order to prove the contraposition of the probandum.

original: gal te bsgrub bya rtsol ba las byung ba nyid yod pa las sgrub byed mi rtag pa nyid ldog pa med pa de lta na yang mi rtag ba nyid go bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te bsgrub bya rtsol ba las byung ba nyid yod pa las sgrub byed mi rtag pa nyid ldog pa med pa de lta na yang mi rtag ba nyid go bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: If the probandum, “arisen from effort,” exists, then the contraposition of the proof, “impermanent,” is not possible. Even so, impermanence is not the reason.

original: des na ldog pa phyin ci log kyang skyes bu'i nyes pa las yin no //
analyzed: des na ldog pa phyin ci log kyang skyes bu'i nyes pa las yin no //
translated: Therefore, even the contraposition is due to the fault of the person.

original: yang ci'i phyir 'di dag skyon chags pa yin zhing ci ltar na gsal ba yin zhe na /🔽gang gi phyir 'di dag gis ni gtan tshigs kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag la yod ba dang med pa nyid dam /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir 'di dag skyon chags pa yin zhing ci ltar na gsal ba yin zhe na / gang gi phyir 'di dag gis ni gtan tshigs kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid mthun pa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag la yod ba dang med pa nyid dam /
translated: Why are these fallacious? How are they clear?🔽Because these cannot demonstrate the general characteristic of a reason, its presence in similar instances and absence in dissimilar instances,

original: bye brag gi mtshan nyid de'i bdag dang de las byung ba bstan par mi nus te /
analyzed: bye brag gi mtshan nyid de'i bdag dang de las byung ba bstan par mi nus te /
translated: or the particular characteristic, that it be the property of the subject, or that it arise from that.

original: de'i phyir don gyi 'ongs pas de dag gsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir don gyi 'ongs pas de dag gsal bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, they are clear in terms of their meaning.

original: gal te dpe gtan tshigs kyi tshul gyis gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma'i yul nyid la ma reg par de yan lag ma yin par rang rgyud nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag yin na de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te dpe gtan tshigs kyi tshul gyis gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma'i yul nyid la ma reg par de yan lag ma yin par rang rgyud nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag yin na de'i tshe /
translated: If the example is not in contact with the domain of the valid cognition that refutes it by means of the method of the reason, and it is a part of the proof that is not a part of the syllogism,

original: gtan tshigs kyi tshul la ma reg pa yin na'ang bsgrub bya'i don dang dpe ma 'brel pa'i phyir dpe don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi tshul la ma reg pa yin na'ang bsgrub bya'i don dang dpe ma 'brel pa'i phyir dpe don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: then, even though it is not in contact with the method of the reason, because it is not related to the meaning of the probandum and the example, the example would be meaningless.

original: de nyid dgrol ba'i phyir bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid dgrol ba'i phyir bshad pa ni /
translated: In order to explain that very point, it is said:

original: gal te de'i tshe tshad ma'i yul ston pa'i dpe de'i bdag nyid dang / de las byung bas byas pa bsgrub par bya ba la mi 'khrul ba nyid mi ston na /
analyzed: gal te de'i tshe tshad ma'i yul ston pa'i dpe de'i bdag nyid dang / de las byung bas byas pa bsgrub par bya ba la mi 'khrul ba nyid mi ston na /
translated: If at that time the example, which reveals the domain of valid cognition, does not show the non-erroneous establishment of the effect by the identity of the cause and by origination from that,

original: bsgrub bya bsgrub pa la dpe nye bar mkho ba @174b cung zad kyang med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya bsgrub pa la dpe nye bar mkho ba @174b cung zad kyang med par 'gyur te /
translated: then there would be no need at all for an example in the establishment of the probandum.

original: bsgrub bya dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there would be no connection with the probandum.

original: gal te dpe ni bsgrub bya sgrub byed dang bcas par bsgrub pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te dpe ni bsgrub bya sgrub byed dang bcas par bsgrub pa yin te /
translated: If the example is established along with the establishment of the probandum,

original: de'i phyir sgrub par byed pa'i chos kyi chos can de yang dpe'i chos can bzhin du bsgrub bya'i chos dang yang ldan par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'dra ba las bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pa la nye bar mkho ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgrub par byed pa'i chos kyi chos can de yang dpe'i chos can bzhin du bsgrub bya'i chos dang yang ldan par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'dra ba las bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pa la nye bar mkho ba yin no //
translated: then the subject of the property of the proof would also possess the probandum, just as the subject of the example does. Therefore, similarity is needed for the establishment of the probandum.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang 'dra ba nyid kyang dpe'i bsgrub par bya ba dang 'brel ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang 'dra ba nyid kyang dpe'i bsgrub par bya ba dang 'brel ba yin no zhe na /
translated: And the similarity to the probandum is connected with the probandum of the example.

original: 'di ni snying po yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni snying po yod pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not substantial.

original: gang gi phyir gang gis na nye bar 'jal ba las don 'ga' zhig 'grub par 'gyur ba don rnams don 'ga' zhig dang rnam pa 'ga' zhes bya ba'i dngos po nyid la sogs pa'i chos gcig dang 'dra ba tsam gang yin pa des rang bzhin gzhan du nges🔽pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gang gis na nye bar 'jal ba las don 'ga' zhig 'grub par 'gyur ba don rnams don 'ga' zhig dang rnam pa 'ga' zhes bya ba'i dngos po nyid la sogs pa'i chos gcig dang 'dra ba tsam gang yin pa des rang bzhin gzhan du nges pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, there is no such thing as the ascertainment of a different nature.

original: ci'i phyir 'dra ba las rang bzhin gzhan du mi nges she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'dra ba las rang bzhin gzhan du mi nges she na /
translated: Why is it that a different nature is not ascertained by means of analogy?

original: gang gi phyir don 'ga' zhig dang / rnam pa 'ga' zhes bya ba tha na gzhal bya nyid kyis mi mtshungs pa'i don ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir don 'ga' zhig dang / rnam pa 'ga' zhes bya ba tha na gzhal bya nyid kyis mi mtshungs pa'i don ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: Because there is no object whatsoever that is not similar to some other object, even in terms of being an object of knowledge.

original: 'on kyang mtshungs pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'on kyang mtshungs pa nyid de /
translated: But they are similar.

original: mtshungs pa des na gang dang gang mtshungs pa'i don de'i bdag nyid yin na /
analyzed: mtshungs pa des na gang dang gang mtshungs pa'i don de'i bdag nyid yin na /
translated: If the object that is similar to something is the same nature as that object,

original: don thams cad thams cad kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur na de ni mngon sum dang 'gal te /
analyzed: don thams cad thams cad kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur na de ni mngon sum dang 'gal te /
translated: then all objects would have the nature of all objects. But that contradicts direct perception.

original: des na rang bzhin gzhan nges pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na rang bzhin gzhan nges pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, there is no ascertainment of a different nature.

original: 'dra ba tsam gyi rang bzhin gzhan nges pa ma yin pa de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa des khyab pa'i chos gang yin pa byas pa nyid la sogs pa dang de dang ldan pa nyid las sgra la sogs pa bsgrub par
analyzed: 'dra ba tsam gyi rang bzhin gzhan nges pa ma yin pa de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa des khyab pa'i chos gang yin pa byas pa nyid la sogs pa dang de dang ldan pa nyid las sgra la sogs pa bsgrub par
translated: Because the nature of mere similarity is not ascertained as another, therefore, the probandum, impermanence, etc., and the property that pervades it, such as being produced, and the possession of that, are established in sound, etc.

original: bya ba dang ldan pa yin gyi gzhan las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bya ba dang ldan pa yin gyi gzhan las ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not from another.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs 'di'i bsgrub bya rtogs pa'i yan lag bsgrub byas khyab pa dper khyab pa'i tshad ma rab tu bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs 'di'i bsgrub bya rtogs pa'i yan lag bsgrub byas khyab pa dper khyab pa'i tshad ma rab tu bstan pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the example is taught to be the valid means of knowledge that pervades the probandum in the proof of this reason.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bsgrub bya sgrub byed dang ldan bar rab tu grub pa tsam gyis ni khyab pa rab tu ston pa'i yul dpe ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bsgrub bya sgrub byed dang ldan bar rab tu grub pa tsam gyis ni khyab pa rab tu ston pa'i yul dpe ma yin te /
translated: For that very reason, the example is not the domain of teaching pervasion by merely establishing the possession of the probandum by the probandum.

original: dper na smra ba dang thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pa dang ldan yang 'dod pa skyes bu dpe ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na smra ba dang thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pa dang ldan yang 'dod pa skyes bu dpe ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, although speaking and not being omniscient are possessed, a desired person is not an example.

original: bsgrub bya ma grub pas dpe ma yin pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya ma grub pas dpe ma yin pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it that the example is not established because the probandum is not established.

original: sgrub par byed pa dang ldan par grub pa la gal te khyab par bsgrub pa'i mtshan ma'i yul yin na dper 'gyur te /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa dang ldan par grub pa la gal te khyab par bsgrub pa'i mtshan ma'i yul yin na dper 'gyur te /
translated: If it is the property of the probandum that is the reason for the pervasion, then it is an example.

original: dper na yod pa dang skad cig ma nyid la bum pa zhes don gyis brjod par 'gyur ba bzhin no //🔽gang gi phyir bsgrub bya khyab pa'i chos dang @175a * //
analyzed: dper na yod pa dang skad cig ma nyid la bum pa zhes don gyis brjod par 'gyur ba bzhin no // gang gi phyir bsgrub bya khyab pa'i chos dang @175a * //
translated: For example, it is like the expression “the pot is momentary” in the statement “The pot is momentary.”

original: ldan pa las bsgrub bya sgrub par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: ldan pa las bsgrub bya sgrub par 'gyur gyi /
translated: Because the probandum is established by the property of the pervasion,🔽not by anything else.

original: gzhan las ni ma yin pa des na 'dir rang rgyud pa dngos su bsgrub bya las nye bar mkho ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan las ni ma yin pa des na 'dir rang rgyud pa dngos su bsgrub bya las nye bar mkho ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, in this case, the autonomous is not actually necessary for the probandum.

original: gtan tshigs de dang ma 'brel ba'i phyir don med par mi 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de dang ma 'brel ba'i phyir don med par mi 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
translated: And it is not the case that it is meaningless because it is not related to the reason.

original: dngos su nye bar mkho ba ma yin mod /
analyzed: dngos su nye bar mkho ba ma yin mod /
translated: It is not actually necessary.

original: ma 'brel na don med par go ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ma 'brel na don med par go ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But if it is not related, how can it be understood to be meaningless?

original: gtan tshigs de nyid kyis bsgrub bya 'grub pa'i rang bzhin gyi don yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de nyid kyis bsgrub bya 'grub pa'i rang bzhin gyi don yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the reason itself completely fulfills the meaning of the probandum.

original: de'i phyir dpe ni gtan tshigs kyi don gyi nang du 'dun pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir dpe ni gtan tshigs kyi don gyi nang du 'dun pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the example is included in the meaning of the reason.

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dang bcas  pa brjod pa na /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dang bcas  pa brjod pa na /
translated: When the fallacious reason is stated,

original: sun 'byin pa ltar snang ba dang bcas pa'i skabs su bab nas brjod pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: sun 'byin pa ltar snang ba dang bcas pa'i skabs su bab nas brjod pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: the occasion for the fallacious refutation is at hand, so it is stated.

original: ma tshang ba la sogs pa ma nges pa'i mthar thug pa gang brjod pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: ma tshang ba la sogs pa ma nges pa'i mthar thug pa gang brjod pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: The incomplete, etc., are the ultimate of the indefinite.

original: 'dis brjod pa'i phyir tshig go //
analyzed: 'dis brjod pa'i phyir tshig go //
translated: Because it is stated by this, it is a statement.

original: de ni sun 'byin pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni sun 'byin pa yin no //
translated: That is the refutation.

original: 'di nyid dgrol ba'i phyir bshad pa ni ma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid dgrol ba'i phyir bshad pa ni ma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In order to explain just this, it is said: “the incomplete, etc.”

original: 'dis brjod pa'i phyir brjod tshig go //
analyzed: 'dis brjod pa'i phyir brjod tshig go //
translated: Because it is stated by this, it is a statement.

original: yang ji ltar sun 'byin pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ji ltar sun 'byin pa yin zhe na /
translated: Moreover, how is it a refutation?

original: brjod pa des pha rol bo 'dod pa'i don grub pa gang yin pa de la gegs byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod pa des pha rol bo 'dod pa'i don grub pa gang yin pa de la gegs byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that statement obstructs the establishment of the object desired by the opponent.

original: gal te skyon ma brjod kyang gtan tshigs kyi don nyid skyon chags pa'i phyir nus pa med pas de las pha rol po'i 'dod pa'i don 'grub pa'o mi 'gyur bam yin nam /
analyzed: gal te skyon ma brjod kyang gtan tshigs kyi don nyid skyon chags pa'i phyir nus pa med pas de las pha rol po'i 'dod pa'i don 'grub pa'o mi 'gyur bam yin nam /
translated: Even if the fault is not stated, since the meaning of the reason itself is faulty, it is powerless. Therefore, how could the meaning of the opponent’s thesis be established?

original: de ci ltar skyon brjod pa sun 'byin pa yin zhes brjod ce na /🔽don nyid nus pa med pas 'dod pa mi 'grub pa de ni de ltar yin mod kyi /
analyzed: de ci ltar skyon brjod pa sun 'byin pa yin zhes brjod ce na / don nyid nus pa med pas 'dod pa mi 'grub pa de ni de ltar yin mod kyi /
translated: How could stating a fault be a response?🔽It is true that the meaning itself is powerless and the thesis is not established.

original: 'on kyang sgrub par byed pas bsgrub bya'i rang bzhin grub par byed pa'am /
analyzed: 'on kyang sgrub par byed pas bsgrub bya'i rang bzhin grub par byed pa'am /
translated: However, the proof does not establish the nature of the probandum,

original: sun 'byin pas grub pa ldog par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sun 'byin pas grub pa ldog par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: and the refutation does not reverse the establishment.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: byas pa dang mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa de dag ni thams cad du snga ma'i rang bzhin nyid dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byas pa dang mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa de dag ni thams cad du snga ma'i rang bzhin nyid dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the probandum, such as being produced and impermanent, always has the same nature.

original: 'o na ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: sgrub pa dang sun 'byin pas ni go rims bzhin du rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i rnam par gnas pa'i dngos po gsal bar byed pa'i nus pa grub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sgrub pa dang sun 'byin pas ni go rims bzhin du rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i rnam par gnas pa'i dngos po gsal bar byed pa'i nus pa grub par byed pa yin no //
translated: The proof and the refutation, respectively, establish the ability to clarify the object that is the basis of the dispute and the counter-dispute.

original: rgol bas ni rtags 'ga' zhig bsgrub bya 'grub pa la nus par 'grub pa yin la /
analyzed: rgol bas ni rtags 'ga' zhig bsgrub bya 'grub pa la nus par 'grub pa yin la /
translated: The disputant establishes that some evidence is able to prove the probandum.

original: phyir rgol bas ni mi nus par ro //
analyzed: phyir rgol bas ni mi nus par ro //
translated: The counter-disputant establishes that it is not able to.

original: nus pa dang mi nus par de yang rang bzhin gnas pa yin no //🔽rnam par gnas par byed sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa 'grub pa de @175b yang gang gi phyir tshig med par mi 'grub pa de'i phyir rgol ba de lta bu nyid du 'gyur pa'i rtags ston par byed pa na /
analyzed: nus pa dang mi nus par de yang rang bzhin gnas pa yin no // rnam par gnas par byed sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa 'grub pa de @175b yang gang gi phyir tshig med par mi 'grub pa de'i phyir rgol ba de lta bu nyid du 'gyur pa'i rtags ston par byed pa na /
translated: That ability or inability is a natural property.🔽Since that establishment of the ability to clarify the basis of the dispute is not established without words, therefore, when the disputant presents evidence that is able to prove the probandum,

original: bsgrub bya de'i byed pa po sgrub par byed pa po yin ba de dang de'i tshig ni byed par brjod pa dang / phyir rgol ba de lta bu nyid du gyur pa'i rtags nus pa med par ston pa na /
analyzed: bsgrub bya de'i byed pa po sgrub par byed pa po yin ba de dang de'i tshig ni byed par brjod pa dang / phyir rgol ba de lta bu nyid du gyur pa'i rtags nus pa med par ston pa na /
translated: the words of the proof of the agent of that probandum are called “the statement of the proof.” When the counter-disputant presents evidence that is not able to prove the probandum,

original: bsgrub bya mi nges pa de'i byed pa po sun 'byin pa po dang / de'i tshig sun 'byin par byed pa yin par brjod kyi /
analyzed: bsgrub bya mi nges pa de'i byed pa po sun 'byin pa po dang / de'i tshig sun 'byin par byed pa yin par brjod kyi /
translated: The proponent of the thesis is the one who refutes the opponent, and his words are the refutation.

original: rnam par mi gnas par byed pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par mi gnas par byed pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not because he makes the opponent’s position untenable.

original: gal te de lta na gal te nyes pa brjod pa na ma tshang pa med pa dang / grub pa la sogs pa'i tshig gis yang lan btab pa na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na gal te nyes pa brjod pa na ma tshang pa med pa dang / grub pa la sogs pa'i tshig gis yang lan btab pa na /
translated: If that is so, if the proponent of the thesis replies to the opponent’s statement with words such as “You have not completed your argument” or “This is established,”

original: ngag de de'i tshe 'dod pa'i gegs yod pa ma yin pas sngar brjod pa de sun 'byin pa ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: ngag de de'i tshe 'dod pa'i gegs yod pa ma yin pas sngar brjod pa de sun 'byin pa ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: then at that time there is no impediment to the proponent’s statement, so the previous statement would not be a refutation.

original: 'di ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not logical.

original: gang gi phyir ma tshang ba med pa la sogs pa'i tshig gis brjod pa gang yin pa de ni sgrub par byed pa gzhan yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ma tshang ba med pa la sogs pa'i tshig gis brjod pa gang yin pa de ni sgrub par byed pa gzhan yin la /
translated: Because the words “You have not completed your argument” and so on are a different proof,

original: sngar gyi grub par byed pa ni sun phyung ba nyid do //
analyzed: sngar gyi grub par byed pa ni sun phyung ba nyid do //
translated: the previous proof is refuted.

original: gal te de lta na sgrub par byed pa'i ngag yongs su ma rdzogs pa nyid du sun 'byin pa pos cung zad smras pa gang yin pa de sun 'byin pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na sgrub par byed pa'i ngag yongs su ma rdzogs pa nyid du sun 'byin pa pos cung zad smras pa gang yin pa de sun 'byin pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the refuter has refuted something when he has said something about the incompleteness of the proof,

original: de lta ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ni ma yin te /
translated: then that is not so.

original: gang gi phyir gal te phyogs snga ma smra ba ltos pa dang bcas pa yin na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gal te phyogs snga ma smra ba ltos pa dang bcas pa yin na /
translated: For if the opponent is dependent,

original: sun 'byin pa'i skabs ma yin no //
analyzed: sun 'byin pa'i skabs ma yin no //
translated: then it is not the occasion for refutation.

original: gang las ltos pa dang bcas par rtogs she na /
analyzed: gang las ltos pa dang bcas par rtogs she na /
translated: From what is it understood that he is dependent?

original: ngag ma rdzogs pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: ngag ma rdzogs pa nyid kyis so //
translated: From the incompleteness of his statement.

original: 'o na nam sun 'byin pa'i skabs yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na nam sun 'byin pa'i skabs yin zhe na /
translated: When is it the occasion for refutation?

original: ngag rdzogs pa na zhes smos so //
analyzed: ngag rdzogs pa na zhes smos so //
translated: When the statement is complete.

original: tshig 'phro rdzogs pa na de la skyon rjod par byed pa ni sun 'byin pa nyid do //
analyzed: tshig 'phro rdzogs pa na de la skyon rjod par byed pa ni sun 'byin pa nyid do //
translated: When the statement is complete, the one who points out the fault is the refuter.

original: rgol bas yang lan brgya btab kyang sngar gyi sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa de ni sun dbyung ba nyid la /
analyzed: rgol bas yang lan brgya btab kyang sngar gyi sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa de ni sun dbyung ba nyid la /
translated: Even if the opponent replies a hundred times, the original proof is the refutation.

original: phyogs brjod ba ni sgrub par byed pa gzhan yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyogs brjod ba ni sgrub par byed pa gzhan yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: The statement of the position is a different proof.

original: der snang ba ni zhes bya ba ni sun 'byin pa bzhin du snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der snang ba ni zhes bya ba ni sun 'byin pa bzhin du snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “There, the appearance” is as if refuting.

original: ltag chod ces bya ba ni sun 'byin pa dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: ltag chod ces bya ba ni sun 'byin pa dang 'dra'o //
translated: “Inconclusive” is like a refutation.

original: ltag chod kyi sgra ni 'dra ba'i tshig yin te /
analyzed: ltag chod kyi sgra ni 'dra ba'i tshig yin te /
translated: The word “inconclusive” is a word of similarity.

original: des na lan dang 'dra ba'i tshig gang yin pa da dag ni ltag chod ces brjod do //
analyzed: des na lan dang 'dra ba'i tshig gang yin pa da dag ni ltag chod ces brjod do //
translated: Therefore, whatever words are similar to an answer are called “inconclusive.”

original: de dag kyang gang zhe na bshad pa /
analyzed: de dag kyang gang zhe na bshad pa /
translated: What are they? It is said:

original: log pa'i lan la mtha' med pa'i rgyu'i phyir de dag 'dir ni spro ba'i bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: log pa'i lan la mtha' med pa'i rgyu'i phyir de dag 'dir ni spro ba'i bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Because there is no end to the cause of a wrong answer, it is not the activity of elaboration here.

original: 'di nyid rnam par 'grel pa ni lan log pa ni ltag chod yin la /
analyzed: 'di nyid rnam par 'grel pa ni lan log pa ni ltag chod yin la /
translated: This is the commentary: A wrong answer is inconclusive.

original: ltag chod kyi rgyu log pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams gnas pa med pa ste @176a * //
analyzed: ltag chod kyi rgyu log pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams gnas pa med pa ste @176a * //
translated: The cause of an inconclusive argument is a wrong conception, which is groundless.

original: mthar thug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthar thug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it has no end.

original: kun brtags pa'i ltag chod dag la mtha' med pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: kun brtags pa'i ltag chod dag la mtha' med pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach that there is no end to imagined inconclusive arguments,

original: nang du ma 'dus pa'i lan log ba ston pa ni /
analyzed: nang du ma 'dus pa'i lan log ba ston pa ni /
translated: the teaching of a wrong answer that is not included is:

original: dper na rigs ba can dag bdag med do zhes bya ba ni 'dir dam bcas pa'i don nyid ni phan tshun 'gal bas na dam bcas pa dang 'gal ba zhes bya ba ni dam bcas pa'i skyon yin no zhes brjod do //
analyzed: dper na rigs ba can dag bdag med do zhes bya ba ni 'dir dam bcas pa'i don nyid ni phan tshun 'gal bas na dam bcas pa dang 'gal ba zhes bya ba ni dam bcas pa'i skyon yin no zhes brjod do //
translated: For example, the Naiyāyikas say, “The statement ‘There is no self’ is a fault of the thesis because the meaning of the thesis itself is mutually contradictory.”

original: 'gal ba de nyid ston pa ni bdag gi sgra'i don la skur ba 'debs na bdag gi sgra sbyor mi srid ba'i phyir bdag gi sgra sbyor ba'i rgol bas ni don nye bar 'jog pa yin la /
analyzed: 'gal ba de nyid ston pa ni bdag gi sgra'i don la skur ba 'debs na bdag gi sgra sbyor mi srid ba'i phyir bdag gi sgra sbyor ba'i rgol bas ni don nye bar 'jog pa yin la /
translated: To show that contradiction, since the meaning of the word self is denied, the word self cannot be used. Therefore, an opponent who uses the word self is positing a meaning.

original: med do zhes skur ba yang yin pa de'i phyir ngag gcig nyid la don de nyid sgrub pa dang 'gog pa ni 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: med do zhes skur ba yang yin pa de'i phyir ngag gcig nyid la don de nyid sgrub pa dang 'gog pa ni 'gal ba yin no //
translated: And since it is also a denial, saying “it does not exist,” the affirmation and negation of that very meaning in a single statement is contradictory.🔽Therefore, since the two words of the thesis are contradictory, this is a fault of the thesis.

original: des na dam bcas pa'i tshig gnyis dag 'gal bas 'di ni dam bcas pa'i skyon yin no zhes bya ba lta bu dang / de bzhin du gzhan dag gtan tshigs kyi skyon rtsol ba las byung ba'i sgra ni mi rtag ste /
analyzed: des na dam bcas pa'i tshig gnyis dag 'gal bas 'di ni dam bcas pa'i skyon yin no zhes bya ba lta bu dang / de bzhin du gzhan dag gtan tshigs kyi skyon rtsol ba las byung ba'i sgra ni mi rtag ste /
translated: Similarly, others say, “The sound produced by effort is impermanent.

original: rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs chos can gyi khyad par du nye bar bkod pa'i phyir dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin no zhes zer ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs chos can gyi khyad par du nye bar bkod pa'i phyir dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin no zhes zer ba lta bu'o //
translated: The phrase because it arises from effort is a part of the meaning of the thesis, since it is stated as a reason that qualifies the subject of the thesis.

original: de lta bu la sogs pa dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs kyi skyon dngos ma yin pa'i phyir ltag chod yin yang bstan pa'i mtshan nyid kyis ltag chod dag tu 'dul ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu la sogs pa dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs kyi skyon dngos ma yin pa'i phyir ltag chod yin yang bstan pa'i mtshan nyid kyis ltag chod dag tu 'dul ba ma yin no //
translated: Since such statements are not actual faults of a thesis or a reason, they are not included among the fallacies of a thesis or a reason.

original: 'di snyam du 'o na de lta bu dag sun 'byin pa nyid yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du 'o na de lta bu dag sun 'byin pa nyid yin no snyam na /
translated: If you think that such statements are refutations,

original: bshad pa / sun 'byin pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa / sun 'byin pa yang ma yin no //
translated: we reply that they are not refutations.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: sgra'i don la mi bsnyon pas so //
analyzed: sgra'i don la mi bsnyon pas so //
translated: Because they do not deny the meaning of the words.

original: gal te bdag gis sgras brjod par bya ba'i don rnam ba ci zhig ltar bsnyon nas de'i tshe 'gal bar 'gyur na sgra'i don ni mi bsnyon gyi /
analyzed: gal te bdag gis sgras brjod par bya ba'i don rnam ba ci zhig ltar bsnyon nas de'i tshe 'gal bar 'gyur na sgra'i don ni mi bsnyon gyi /
translated: If we denied the meaning of the words of our statement, then it would be contradictory. But we do not deny the meaning of the words.

original: de'i nye bar len par gyur ba rang gi mtshan nyid kho na 'gog pa yin no zhes yod med phyogs kyi bye brag gis zhes bya ba der bshad zin to //
analyzed: de'i nye bar len par gyur ba rang gi mtshan nyid kho na 'gog pa yin no zhes yod med phyogs kyi bye brag gis zhes bya ba der bshad zin to //
translated: The specific distinction between existence and non-existence is explained there.

original: de bzhin du dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs su brjod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs su brjod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: In the same way, it is not the case that a reason is stated in which one part of the proposition is not established.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bsgrub bar bya ba'i chos can las phyi rol tu 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub bar bya ba'i chos can las phyi rol tu 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would be outside the subject of the proposition.

original: de la sgra ni bsgrub pa'i chos can yin no //
analyzed: de la sgra ni bsgrub pa'i chos can yin no //
translated: Sound is the subject of the proposition.

original: rtsol ba las byung ba ni nye bar mtshon pa yin pas bsgrub bya'i dus ni mi gnas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang bshad zin to //
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba ni nye bar mtshon pa yin pas bsgrub bya'i dus ni mi gnas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang bshad zin to //
translated: Since “arisen from effort” is an illustration, it is not the time of the probandum, etc.

original: 'di snyam du gal te de dag kyang 'dra ba'i cha @176b 'gas te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du gal te de dag kyang 'dra ba'i cha @176b 'gas te /
translated: If you think that those are also similar parts,

original: 'dra ba 'ga' zhig las so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'dra ba 'ga' zhig las so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: the meaning is that they are similar to some.

original: 'o na brjod pa'i ltag chod 'di dag kyang 'dra ba'i cha 'gas phan tshun de ltar zhes bya ba nang du 'du bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na brjod pa'i ltag chod 'di dag kyang 'dra ba'i cha 'gas phan tshun de ltar zhes bya ba nang du 'du bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Well, then, it follows that these reductio arguments are similar in some respects, and therefore that they are included in the phrase “in that way.”

original: de'i phyir te ltag chod kyi dbye ba'i tshul mtha' yas ba dang 'dra ba'i cha'i skabs su ni gcig tu thal bas 'gyur ba'i phyir spyi'i mtshan nyid gcig nyid du cung zad brjod par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir te ltag chod kyi dbye ba'i tshul mtha' yas ba dang 'dra ba'i cha'i skabs su ni gcig tu thal bas 'gyur ba'i phyir spyi'i mtshan nyid gcig nyid du cung zad brjod par bya ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, since it would follow that there would be only one universal, it is not at all possible to state that there is only one universal.

original: khyad par gyi mtshan nyid byas na nang du mi 'du ba'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par gyi mtshan nyid byas na nang du mi 'du ba'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because if you state a particular characteristic, it is not included in the universal.

original: 'o na spyi'i mtshan nyid brjod cig ce na /🔽bshad pa / ltag chod kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid de ni sun 'byin par snang ba ltag chod do zhes brjod zin to /
analyzed: 'o na spyi'i mtshan nyid brjod cig ce na / bshad pa / ltag chod kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid de ni sun 'byin par snang ba ltag chod do zhes brjod zin to /
translated: Well, then, state the universal!🔽We have already stated that the universal of reductio arguments is a reductio argument that appears to refute.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i skyon brjod pa ni ltag chod do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i skyon brjod pa ni ltag chod do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The term “reductio argument” means “an expression of an incorrect fault.”

original: 'di snyam du bye brag gi mtshan nyid med na ci ltar ltag chod shes par nus she na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du bye brag gi mtshan nyid med na ci ltar ltag chod shes par nus she na /
translated: One might think, “If there is no specific definition, how can one understand a reductio?”

original: bshad pa / ltag chod de ni bsgrub pa dang sun 'byin pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa nyid las lan ltar snang ba nyid du bde blag tu shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / ltag chod de ni bsgrub pa dang sun 'byin pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa nyid las lan ltar snang ba nyid du bde blag tu shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Reply: That reductio is easily understood to be a mere semblance of an answer due to merely understanding the definition of proof and refutation.

original: ci ltar grub pa dang sun 'byin pa dag gi mtshan nyid shes pas lan ltar snang ba nyid shes she na /🔽yul ma yin pa tshul gsum pa'i rtags chad pa dang bral ba ma grub par byed pa'i mtshan nyid tshul gsum pa'i rtags chad pa nyid mi 'jug pa'i phyir bsgrub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ci ltar grub pa dang sun 'byin pa dag gi mtshan nyid shes pas lan ltar snang ba nyid shes she na / yul ma yin pa tshul gsum pa'i rtags chad pa dang bral ba ma grub par byed pa'i mtshan nyid tshul gsum pa'i rtags chad pa nyid mi 'jug pa'i phyir bsgrub pa ma yin no //
