translated: How is it that one understands a mere semblance of an answer due to understanding the definition of proof and refutation?🔽A proof is not a proof because the mere non-engagement of a sign having the three modes that proves the nonexistence of an object that is not an object, that is, that is not an object of knowledge, does not constitute a proof.

original: sgrub byed kyi dngos po ma yin par shes pa yang sun 'byin pa mtshan nyid kyi yul bden pa'i bsgrub bya rtogs pa'i gegs ma yin pa'i phyir ni sun 'byin pa ma yin la /
analyzed: sgrub byed kyi dngos po ma yin par shes pa yang sun 'byin pa mtshan nyid kyi yul bden pa'i bsgrub bya rtogs pa'i gegs ma yin pa'i phyir ni sun 'byin pa ma yin la /
translated: And a refutation is not a refutation because the mere understanding that the object of refutation is not a thing to be proven is not an obstacle to the understanding of the true object of refutation, which is the definition of a refutation.

original: gegs kyi khyad par gyi mtshan nyid gang bshad pa yin pa de dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ni khyad par du sun 'byin pa ma yin par shes so ;
analyzed: gegs kyi khyad par gyi mtshan nyid gang bshad pa yin pa de dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ni khyad par du sun 'byin pa ma yin par shes so ;
translated: Since it does not have the characteristics of the specific hindrances that have been explained, it is known to be a specific refutation.

original: rnam pa gzhan yang med pa'i phyir rang nyid kyis brtags nas lan ltar snang bar shes par nus so //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan yang med pa'i phyir rang nyid kyis brtags nas lan ltar snang bar shes par nus so //
translated: Moreover, since it does not have another form, it can be known as a mere semblance of an answer that is imagined by oneself.

original: 'di dag gi rab tu dbye ba khyad par gyi rnam par dbye ba ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa mtha' yas pas mtha' med la mtha' med pa'i phyir ni bstan par mi nus so //
analyzed: 'di dag gi rab tu dbye ba khyad par gyi rnam par dbye ba ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa mtha' yas pas mtha' med la mtha' med pa'i phyir ni bstan par mi nus so //
translated: Since the specific divisions of these are infinite due to the infinity of improper mental activity, they cannot be taught.

original: dper na yang dag pa'i shes pa bstan par bya ba la rtags brjod pa yang ston pa de bzhin du rtags 'gog pa brjod pa dang / 'gog par snang ba yang byis pa la bstan par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: dper na yang dag pa'i shes pa bstan par bya ba la rtags brjod pa yang ston pa de bzhin du rtags 'gog pa brjod pa dang / 'gog par snang ba yang byis pa la bstan par bya ba yin te /
translated: Just as the expression of a reason in the teaching of right knowledge is taught, so the expression of the refutation of a reason and the appearance of a refutation should be taught to the childish.

original: rtags yang dag par brjod pa la yang pha rol po rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar klan ka brjod pa na /
analyzed: rtags yang dag par brjod pa la yang pha rol po rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar klan ka brjod pa na /
translated: When the expression of a correct reason is criticized by the opponent in some way,

original: rgol ba la brjod @177a * //
analyzed: rgol ba la brjod @177a * //
translated: the expression to the opponent

original: pa la mi smos par bya ba'i phyir ram /🔽yang dag pa ma yin pa brjod la phyir rgol ba sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin pa brjod pa mi shes par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pa la mi smos par bya ba'i phyir ram / yang dag pa ma yin pa brjod la phyir rgol ba sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin pa brjod pa mi shes par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: or in order to avoid the fault of not mentioning the opponent’s position.🔽Or, in order to avoid the fault of not understanding the opponent’s position, which is not a branch of proof.

original: rgol ba dang phyir rgol bdag gis grangs bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ba brjod pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang bcas pa dang yan lag ma yin pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang bcas pa shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir sun 'byin
analyzed: rgol ba dang phyir rgol bdag gis grangs bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ba brjod pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang bcas pa dang yan lag ma yin pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang bcas pa shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir sun 'byin
translated: The opponent and the respondent should understand the position and the non-position, which are the branches of correct knowledge, respectively, and the position and the non-position, which are the branches of incorrect knowledge, respectively.

original: pa ltar snang ba dang bcas te bshad do //
analyzed: pa ltar snang ba dang bcas te bshad do //
translated: Therefore, it is explained together with apparent refutations.

original: ci ste gal te kun las btus pa bstan par 'dod na /
analyzed: ci ste gal te kun las btus pa bstan par 'dod na /
translated: If it is asserted that the Compendium of Abhidharma should be taught,

original: ci ltar de nyid la lar sbong ste /
analyzed: ci ltar de nyid la lar sbong ste /
translated: why is it omitted there?

original: dper na 'di ni nges par bya ba'i don yin te /
analyzed: dper na 'di ni nges par bya ba'i don yin te /
translated: For example, this has the meaning of a definitive statement.

original: med pa nyid la med pa yin gyi gzhan pa la ma yin la 'gal ba la yang ma yin no zhes tshul gsum pa nges pa'i don yin bar bshad la /
analyzed: med pa nyid la med pa yin gyi gzhan pa la ma yin la 'gal ba la yang ma yin no zhes tshul gsum pa nges pa'i don yin bar bshad la /
translated: It is said that the third mode is the definitive meaning, where the non-existent is non-existent, but not the other, and also not the contradictory.

original: khyod kyis ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gi sbyor ba shes par bya ba'i don du brjod pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: khyod kyis ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gi sbyor ba shes par bya ba'i don du brjod pa lta bu ste /
translated: But you know the application of the forward and reverse pervasions, and you say that it is like this:

original: de bzhin du yang sbyar ro zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang sbyar ro zhe na /
translated: “It is the same.”

original: bshad pa / mdo dag gis bstan gyi /
analyzed: bshad pa / mdo dag gis bstan gyi /
translated: We reply: The sutra teaches this,

original: 'grel bas ni ma yin gyi 'grel pa ni 'di nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'grel bas ni ma yin gyi 'grel pa ni 'di nyid ma yin no //
translated: but not the commentary. This is not the commentary.

original: dbang phyug sde dang de'i phyogs pa gzhan snga ma dag gis ni 'brel pa phyin ci log tu byas so //
analyzed: dbang phyug sde dang de'i phyogs pa gzhan snga ma dag gis ni 'brel pa phyin ci log tu byas so //
translated: Ishvarasena and other earlier members of his faction have made a false connection.

original: mdo ni 'grel pa'i dbang gis gzhung gzhan du bya bar mi nus pa de'i phyir de nyid bshad do //
analyzed: mdo ni 'grel pa'i dbang gis gzhung gzhan du bya bar mi nus pa de'i phyir de nyid bshad do //
translated: The sutra cannot be made into a different text by the power of the commentary. Therefore, we explain it.

original: ci ltar na de slob dpon gyi gzhung yang ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar na de slob dpon gyi gzhung yang ma yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that this is not even the master’s text?

original: gang gi phyir don yod de 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i lugs rtog ge'i tshul gang yin pa gzigs pa de'i phyir 'grel pa 'gal ba ni de'i ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir don yod de 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i lugs rtog ge'i tshul gang yin pa gzigs pa de'i phyir 'grel pa 'gal ba ni de'i ma yin no //
translated: Because he saw that the system of logicians is not without purpose, since it has a result, therefore the commentary is not contradictory.

original: gal te 'grel pa la yang yid mi rton na /
analyzed: gal te 'grel pa la yang yid mi rton na /
translated: If you do not rely on the commentary,

original: gang las lung thob nas 'chad ce na /
analyzed: gang las lung thob nas 'chad ce na /
translated: from what scripture do you obtain the explanation?

original: 'ga' las kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'ga' las kyang ma yin te /
translated: It is not from any scripture,

original: lung yang yal bar dor nas te /
analyzed: lung yang yal bar dor nas te /
translated: but having abandoned the scripture,

original: 'chad pa po rnams las 'ongs pa'i don yal bar dor nas bshad de /
analyzed: 'chad pa po rnams las 'ongs pa'i don yal bar dor nas bshad de /
translated: having abandoned the meaning that comes from the expounders,

original: de dag kyang mngon par mi brtsan pas blo bslad pa'i phyir yang dag par mthong ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag kyang mngon par mi brtsan pas blo bslad pa'i phyir yang dag par mthong ba ma yin no //
translated: they explain, because they are not very learned, and their minds are corrupted, and they do not see correctly.

original: gal te lung btang na ci ltar 'chad ce na /
analyzed: gal te lung btang na ci ltar 'chad ce na /
translated: If you abandon the scripture, how do you explain?

original: de na 'di rigs so zhes te ;
analyzed: de na 'di rigs so zhes te ;
translated: There it is reasonable to say,

original: de la de lta bur ro //
analyzed: de la de lta bur ro //
translated: in that case, it is like this.

original: lung yod dam med kyang bla ste /
analyzed: lung yod dam med kyang bla ste /
translated: Whether there is a scripture or not,

original: 'di'i don ni 'di yin bar tshad mas 'thad do zhes 'chad do //
analyzed: 'di'i don ni 'di yin bar tshad mas 'thad do zhes 'chad do //
translated: the meaning of this is established by valid cognition.

original: 'o na ni bsam pa 'di khyod nyid kyi yin gyi /
analyzed: 'o na ni bsam pa 'di khyod nyid kyi yin gyi /
translated: But this idea is yours alone,

original: slob dpon gyi ni ma yin te /
analyzed: slob dpon gyi ni ma yin te /
translated: it is not the master's.

original: slob ma brgyud pa ma chad pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: slob ma brgyud pa ma chad pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because there is no unbroken lineage of disciples.

original: rnam dag thugs zhes smos te /
analyzed: rnam dag thugs zhes smos te /
translated: The root text says, “because he has a pure mind.”

original: rnam @177b par dag pa'i thugs mnga' bas na /
analyzed: rnam @177b par dag pa'i thugs mnga' bas na /
translated: Because he has a pure mind,

original: slob dpon de'i dgongs pa nges bar te /
analyzed: slob dpon de'i dgongs pa nges bar te /
translated: the meaning of the master’s thought

original: gdon mi za bar 'di nyid yin no //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar 'di nyid yin no //
translated: is certainly this.

original: rnam bar dag pa'i blo mnga' ba ni /
analyzed: rnam bar dag pa'i blo mnga' ba ni /
translated: One who has a pure mind

original: tshad ma dang mi ldan ba'i don rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma dang mi ldan ba'i don rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: does not understand a meaning that is not supported by valid knowledge.

original: gal te de'i yang dgongs pa 'di nyid yin na /
analyzed: gal te de'i yang dgongs pa 'di nyid yin na /
translated: If this is the thought of that master,

original: ci ltar t'i ka byed pa de nyid kyis ma rtogs she na /
analyzed: ci ltar t'i ka byed pa de nyid kyis ma rtogs she na /
translated: why did the master himself not understand it?

original: mi gsal ba don gsal ba med pa'i blo gang la yod pa'i skye bo gang yin pa des dgongs pa 'di rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mi gsal ba don gsal ba med pa'i blo gang la yod pa'i skye bo gang yin pa des dgongs pa 'di rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: Those who have a mind that is unclear, that is, that does not understand the clear meaning, do not understand this thought.

original: shes rab gsal bas ni slob dpon gyi dgongs pa 'di nyid yin bar nges so //🔽de ltar phyogs nyams dogs pas gsung rab rgya mtsho yi //
analyzed: shes rab gsal bas ni slob dpon gyi dgongs pa 'di nyid yin bar nges so // de ltar phyogs nyams dogs pas gsung rab rgya mtsho yi //
translated: But those who have a clear mind, that is, who understand the clear meaning, understand this thought.

original: rigs gzigs rgya chen rnam nges 'di ni mi brten pa'i //
analyzed: rigs gzigs rgya chen rnam nges 'di ni mi brten pa'i //
translated: Those who have a clear mind, that is, who understand the clear meaning, understand this thought.🔽Those who have a clear mind, that is, who understand the clear meaning, understand this thought.🔽Those who have a clear mind, that is, who understand the clear meaning, understand this thought.🔽Those who have a clear mind, that is, who understand the clear meaning, understand this thought.🔽Those who have a clear mind, that is, who understand the clear meaning, understand this thought.🔽Those who have a clear mind, that is, who understand the clear meaning, understand this thought.🔽Those who have a clear mind, that is, who understand the clear meaning, understand this thought.

original: lta bar ltung bsam rtogs des de rab nus bzhin //
analyzed: lta bar ltung bsam rtogs des de rab nus bzhin //
translated: The one who has fallen into the view of the transitory collection,

original: bdag gis 'bad bas 'di byas byas rnams kho nas shes //
analyzed: bdag gis 'bad bas 'di byas byas rnams kho nas shes //
translated: who is not able to understand, will know it only through my effort.

original: bdag gis tshad mas phye bas ma phyed cung zad tsam yang rnam bkral bas //
analyzed: bdag gis tshad mas phye bas ma phyed cung zad tsam yang rnam bkral bas //
translated: I have explained a little bit, which was not explained by valid cognition.

original: 'di ltar thar pa phun tshogs 'bras can legs par bya ba byas 'gyur ba //
analyzed: 'di ltar thar pa phun tshogs 'bras can legs par bya ba byas 'gyur ba //
translated: In this way, I will have done what needs to be done to attain the perfect result of liberation.

original: legs spyad des ni 'gro rnams 'pho med go 'phang byang chub kun gyi ni //
analyzed: legs spyad des ni 'gro rnams 'pho med go 'phang byang chub kun gyi ni //
translated: By that good action, may all beings attain the stage of non-regression,🔽and having attained the supreme Dharma, may they cross the ocean of saṃsāra.

original: chos mchog thob nas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las ni rab tu rgal bar shog / grogs po rnams kyis bskul bas mi 'dod kyang //
analyzed: chos mchog thob nas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las ni rab tu rgal bar shog / grogs po rnams kyis bskul bas mi 'dod kyang //
translated: Though I do not wish to, urged on by my friends,

original: rnam par nges pa'i 'grel bshad nges byas te //
analyzed: rnam par nges pa'i 'grel bshad nges byas te //
translated: I have composed this commentary on the Viniścaya.

original: 'di ltar 'jig rten spro ba med pa yang //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'jig rten spro ba med pa yang //
translated: In this way, even those who are not interested in the world,

original: grogs pos lag gis 'jug nas 'bras la sbyor //
analyzed: grogs pos lag gis 'jug nas 'bras la sbyor //
translated: are led by the hand by their friends and brought to the fruit.

original: gzhan zer rjes 'jug shin tu cher sems mi mthun par ni gnas pa dag / rnam g-yeng skye mched des 'dir gal te legs bshad gzigs ma yod na der //
analyzed: gzhan zer rjes 'jug shin tu cher sems mi mthun par ni gnas pa dag / rnam g-yeng skye mched des 'dir gal te legs bshad gzigs ma yod na der //
translated: If they see a good explanation here, they should look at it.

original: gang dag zhal snga chos 'byung byin dang dge bsrungs zhes byas sa steng na //
analyzed: gang dag zhal snga chos 'byung byin dang dge bsrungs zhes byas sa steng na //
translated: Those who are called Bhāviveka and Guṇaprabha,

original: sgrib med rab grags de dag gis ni rtogs pa'i myu gu cung zad yin //
analyzed: sgrib med rab grags de dag gis ni rtogs pa'i myu gu cung zad yin //
translated: The sprouts of their understanding are a little bit on the surface of the earth.

original: legs 'brel phyogs gnas gzhan gyis bgrod pa yis //
analyzed: legs 'brel phyogs gnas gzhan gyis bgrod pa yis //
translated: Those who are connected with good friends, who live in a good place, who are not obstructed by others,

original: ring du spangs nas rab tu 'jug bgrod dka'i //
analyzed: ring du spangs nas rab tu 'jug bgrod dka'i //
translated: Who have abandoned the long path, who are engaged in the difficult path,

original: bgrod bya'i mthar phyin shes rab de dag gi //
analyzed: bgrod bya'i mthar phyin shes rab de dag gi //
translated: Who have reached the end of the path of wisdom,

original: tshul ni bya yi rgyal po dag dang mtshungs //
analyzed: tshul ni bya yi rgyal po dag dang mtshungs //
translated: Their way is like that of the king of birds.

original: nyi shar 'od 'joms mun stug gis bsgribs gangs rum du //
analyzed: nyi shar 'od 'joms mun stug gis bsgribs gangs rum du //
translated: When the sun rises, the thick darkness is destroyed,🔽How could the snow on the mountains or the frost on the lotus buds

original: gnas pa'i mi'am kha bas 'khyags pa'i padma dag / rab tu rgyas bar 'gyur ba dag ni ga la yod //
analyzed: gnas pa'i mi'am kha bas 'khyags pa'i padma dag / rab tu rgyas bar 'gyur ba dag ni ga la yod //
translated: Be fully melted?

original: @178a * // des na che rnams dpyod med bdag la mi mnyes med //
analyzed: @178a * // des na che rnams dpyod med bdag la mi mnyes med //
translated: Therefore, the great ones have no analysis, and I am not displeased.

original: stong phrag bzhi dang gsum dang bzhi //
analyzed: stong phrag bzhi dang gsum dang bzhi //

original: brgya phrag lnga dang drug dang gsum //
analyzed: brgya phrag lnga dang drug dang gsum //

original: nyi shu gnyis dang sum cu ste //
analyzed: nyi shu gnyis dang sum cu ste //

original: de ni gnyis drug gsum bcas so //
analyzed: de ni gnyis drug gsum bcas so //
translated: that is 2, 6, and 3.

original: slob dpon chos mchog gis sbyar ba rnam par nges pa'i t'i ka 'thad ldan zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon chos mchog gis sbyar ba rnam par nges pa'i t'i ka 'thad ldan zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
translated: The Tika of Valid Reasoning, the Correct System, composed by Master Dharmakirti, is complete.

original: // / bstan bcos chen po'i don dang tshig tu bcas //
analyzed: // / bstan bcos chen po'i don dang tshig tu bcas //
translated: The meaning and words of the great treatise,

original: legs rtogs 'gro na nyi bzhin gsal byed pa //
analyzed: legs rtogs 'gro na nyi bzhin gsal byed pa //
translated: well-realized, illuminate like the sun for beings.

original: tshul khrims gtsang ma'i dri dang ldan pa gang //
analyzed: tshul khrims gtsang ma'i dri dang ldan pa gang //
translated: Whoever possesses the scent of pure ethical discipline,🔽Master Dharmakirti, the supreme conqueror of bad arguments,

original: slob dpon chos mchog rtog ge ngan 'joms mchog / yang dag don gsal tshad ma'i bstan bcos 'di //
analyzed: slob dpon chos mchog rtog ge ngan 'joms mchog / yang dag don gsal tshad ma'i bstan bcos 'di //
translated: this treatise on valid cognition that illuminates the correct meaning,

original: legs bar bsgyur las byung ba'i bsod nams gang //
analyzed: legs bar bsgyur las byung ba'i bsod nams gang //
translated: whatever merit arises from properly translating it,

original: des ni log lta'i rgyun phyogs skye bo rnams //
analyzed: des ni log lta'i rgyun phyogs skye bo rnams //
translated: may that cause those born in the direction of the stream of wrong views

original: yang dag rigs pa'i lam du 'jug par shog / kha che'i pandi ta gzhan la phan pa bzang po la sogs pa dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba blo ldan shes rab kyis grong khyer dpe med du bsgyur ba'o /
analyzed: yang dag rigs pa'i lam du 'jug par shog / kha che'i pandi ta gzhan la phan pa bzang po la sogs pa dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba blo ldan shes rab kyis grong khyer dpe med du bsgyur ba'o /
translated: Lo-den-sharay.
